e8f9161848c9b14e2815421a33cfc6d8065da105.summary: Mike Tomlin has stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers after 19 seasons. The decision comes following the team's playoff defeat by the Houston Texans. Tomlin leaves with a record that includes a Super Bowl win and no losing seasons. The Steelers are now beginning their first head coach search since 2007.
e8f9161848c9b14e2815421a33cfc6d8065da105.headline: Mike Tomlin Steps Down as Steelers Head Coach After 19 Seasons

81d5d5f4d2a060a8da2774b7a5b4ff233325bf7b.summary: A construction crane collapsed onto a moving passenger train in northeastern Thailand on January 14, 2026, causing the train to derail and briefly catch fire. At least 29 people were killed and 64 others injured. The crane was part of a high-speed rail project, and nearly 200 people were on board the train at the time of the accident.
81d5d5f4d2a060a8da2774b7a5b4ff233325bf7b.headline: Crane Collapse on Train in Thailand Kills 29

cf2a9b49c337eb02ea9291e820bf6f8178997345.summary: South Korean prosecutors have requested the death penalty for former president Yoon Suk Yeol, who is on trial for insurrection charges related to his failed attempt to impose martial law in December 2024. The verdict is expected next month. If sentenced to death, it would mark South Korea's first execution in nearly 30 years.
cf2a9b49c337eb02ea9291e820bf6f8178997345.headline: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Yoon Suk Yeol in Insurrection Trial

520e92b5d5d18cbeeeeebe7d620010e8b8d0a7de.summary: Saks Global, the parent company of Saks Fifth Avenue, Neiman Marcus, and Bergdorf Goodman, filed for bankruptcy protection after struggling with high debt from its $2.7 billion merger last year. CEO Baker is set to leave the company. The filing marks one of the largest retail collapses since the pandemic and raises uncertainty about the future of US luxury fashion.
520e92b5d5d18cbeeeeebe7d620010e8b8d0a7de.headline: Saks Global Files for Bankruptcy Following Debt From Major Merger

c27db4dc510904325f82178cdadd100d217a2b9a.summary: Claudette Colvin, whose 1955 arrest for refusing to give up her seat on a segregated Montgomery bus helped spark the modern civil rights movement, has died at age 86.
c27db4dc510904325f82178cdadd100d217a2b9a.headline: Civil Rights Figure Claudette Colvin Dies at 86

49e540ef65e0ae283ad64504fdec3e698aa28180.summary: Iran's judiciary announced plans for swift trials and executions of detained protesters, despite warnings from the US. The reported death toll from the unrest has risen into the thousands. Some mobile phone call services have been restored in Iran, but texting and internet access remain limited.
49e540ef65e0ae283ad64504fdec3e698aa28180.headline: Iran Plans Fast Trials

443eac45a2c40f3befc51aac36be56bba5ccd959.summary: Greenland's prime minister stated that Greenland chooses Denmark and will not be governed by the US, ahead of a high-stakes meeting at the White House involving Denmark, Greenland, and Vance. The statement comes amid tensions over US efforts to take control of Greenland.
443eac45a2c40f3befc51aac36be56bba5ccd959.headline: Greenland Affirms Ties to Denmark Before White House Meeting

12f2973ada11f45d509390c81fe8cbf52284c3e1.summary: Manchester United have appointed Michael Carrick as head coach until the end of the season. The club's leadership chose Carrick to lead the team on an interim basis, aiming to reconnect with their coaching philosophy.
12f2973ada11f45d509390c81fe8cbf52284c3e1.headline: Michael Carrick Appointed Manchester United Head Coach Until Season

b482378048554d5aff6580333cea9dbc1fdc7301.summary: EU and US climate scientists report that 2025 was the third hottest year on record. Global average temperatures from 2023 to 2025 surpassed the 1.5°C threshold set in the Paris Agreement, and many regions experienced severe heatwaves. Experts do not expect relief from high temperatures in 2026.
b482378048554d5aff6580333cea9dbc1fdc7301.headline: 2025 Confirmed as Third Hottest Year Globally

e6f2232e2c34273a070517a4d09636a3923f4977.summary: Mike Johnson criticized Donald Trump's proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10%. Major banks, including JPMorgan Chase, have opposed the plan, warning it could harm the $70 billion credit card market and negatively impact consumers and the economy. Financial firms are considering various options to challenge the proposal.
e6f2232e2c34273a070517a4d09636a3923f4977.headline: Banks and Lawmakers Push Back on Trumps 10% Credit Card Rate Cap

b0e26be71b8ce6136049c10f9d2e9e8492314c70.summary: Bill and Hillary Clinton have refused to comply with a House Republican subpoena related to the Epstein investigation. The House GOP is moving forward with contempt proceedings against them for not testifying.
b0e26be71b8ce6136049c10f9d2e9e8492314c70.headline: Bill and Hillary Clinton Face Contempt Move After Refusing House

27318a235ab82556c0c3ba9296580f17d23ae06c.summary: Alvaro Arbeloa has been appointed as Real Madrid's new head coach following Xabi Alonso's departure after a defeat to Barcelona. Arbeloa will lead the team for the first time in the Copa del Rey Round of 16 match against Albacete, with two players set to miss the game.
27318a235ab82556c0c3ba9296580f17d23ae06c.headline: Arbeloa Debuts as Real Madrid Coach in Copa del Rey After Alonso

ed18eddfb5e562229d65aae901dea7b96068c93e.summary: Emma Raducanu defeated Camila Osorio 6-3, 7-6 in the first round of the Hobart International, securing her first win of the season after their rain-delayed match was completed on Tuesday.
ed18eddfb5e562229d65aae901dea7b96068c93e.headline: Emma Raducanu Wins Rain Delayed Hobart International Opener

11e0e06dad79069f61ca0cd3547fba5ccd1904f0.summary: Netflix is preparing to amend its accepted offer for Warner Bros Discovery's studios and streaming businesses to an all-cash bid, replacing the stock component due to its decreased value. The move aims to accelerate the acquisition process and counter a competing bid from Paramount.
11e0e06dad79069f61ca0cd3547fba5ccd1904f0.headline: Netflix Plans All Cash Offer to Acquire Warner Bros Discovery Assets

398f867520493f0905a67e2894ed184fdd2c04a0.summary: Actor Kiefer Sutherland was arrested in Hollywood early Monday on suspicion of assaulting a ride-hail driver, according to Los Angeles police. Officers responded to a call shortly after midnight and took Sutherland into custody. The incident remains under investigation.
398f867520493f0905a67e2894ed184fdd2c04a0.headline: Kiefer Sutherland Arrested in Hollywood on Suspicion of Assault

a8329907375405107e269a0b8517868067d4c287.summary: Activists report that over 2,500 people have died during nationwide protests in Iran over the past 17 days. Other sources confirm at least 2,000 deaths as demonstrations continue.
a8329907375405107e269a0b8517868067d4c287.headline: Over 2500 Reported Dead in Iran Protests Activists Say

ae69d8f1251f879cb812c8109aeddbbfc776965c.summary: U.S. Vice President JD Vance will meet with Denmark's foreign minister and Greenland's foreign minister at the White House on Wednesday to discuss issues related to Greenland, marking the first such meeting since President Trump's remarks about acquiring the island.
ae69d8f1251f879cb812c8109aeddbbfc776965c.headline: U.S. Denmark and Greenland Officials to Meet at White House

9a2f8c89bd2a25437a87d39121d73ef3deff0e06.summary: The Arizona Diamondbacks acquired third baseman Nolan Arenado from the St. Louis Cardinals in exchange for minor league pitcher Jack Martinez and cash. The Cardinals will pay $31 million of the $42 million remaining on Arenado's contract over the next two seasons. Arenado waived his no-trade clause to complete the deal.
9a2f8c89bd2a25437a87d39121d73ef3deff0e06.headline: Diamondbacks Acquire Nolan Arenado From Cardinals in Trade

ee0d20f744059ed2f0d17a8181b7ee0bc0268d87.summary: Venezuela has released an unspecified number of U.S. citizens following President Nicolás Maduro's capture. The U.S. State Department described the action as a positive development but did not confirm the identities or total number of those freed.
ee0d20f744059ed2f0d17a8181b7ee0bc0268d87.headline: Venezuela Releases Unspecified Number of U.S. Citizens After Maduro

104f81dcf2c59c3e6f85b847e23d6749f233a372.summary: A bipartisan group of US senators has introduced a long-awaited bill to establish clear rules for the cryptocurrency market. The bill also includes a provision barring funding for any action to occupy or annex territory belonging to a NATO member state.
104f81dcf2c59c3e6f85b847e23d6749f233a372.headline: Senators Unveil Bipartisan Bill on Crypto Rules and NATO Protections

6065e244bf344dae0c2bd9b5b2aedb7f3a7ceadb.summary: The French foreign minister stated that Iran's current crackdown could be the most violent in its contemporary history.
6065e244bf344dae0c2bd9b5b2aedb7f3a7ceadb.headline: French Foreign Minister Warns of Extreme Violence in Iran Crackdown

a71735d896269788dacdeec485e4692d5354bb15.summary: Manchester City are preparing an offer for Crystal Palace defender Marc Guéhi, while Bayern Munich is also showing interest. N'Golo Kanté is nearing a return to Europe, and Marcus Rashford will not be returning to Manchester United.
a71735d896269788dacdeec485e4692d5354bb15.headline: Manchester City Target Marc Guéhi

c27f330d6fffadfb27072c324c03df6db2e1efb4.summary: Israel Adesanya is scheduled to fight Joe Pyfer in Seattle, Washington on March 28, marking his return after over a year. The event will also feature a women's flyweight rematch between Maycee Barber and Alexa Grasso.
c27f330d6fffadfb27072c324c03df6db2e1efb4.headline: Adesanya to Face Pyfer in March 28 UFC Return in Seattle

de56aeba92015421c73d729f3313ad86124291bc.summary: Tiger Woods praised Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour through the Returning Member Program, calling it positive for the tour. Woods also provided an update on his own rehab from a back injury and discussed his outlook for the season.
de56aeba92015421c73d729f3313ad86124291bc.headline: Tiger Woods Welcomes Brooks Koepkas Return to PGA Tour

19b9a1fea1216e03064eb1a0c4534994d447dd64.summary: A Chinese app designed for people living alone has gone viral, attracting widespread attention for its focus on solitary lifestyles.
19b9a1fea1216e03064eb1a0c4534994d447dd64.headline: Chinese App for Solitary Living Gains Viral Popularity

c5c9c9848019f8894ce3a20329407345e8ee703e.summary: David Webb, a prominent activist investor known for advocating corporate governance reform and greater transparency in Hong Kong's financial markets, has died at age 60. Webb was recognized for his efforts to protect minority shareholders and highlight questionable business practices.
c5c9c9848019f8894ce3a20329407345e8ee703e.headline: Activist Investor David Webb Dies at 60

22d52e7f5278553c1fd2919e67a2fb5bdc7e1c51.summary: Scott Adams, creator of the 'Dilbert' comic strip known for satirizing office life, has died at age 68. 'Dilbert' was widely published and became a defining workplace comic in the 1990s and 2000s.
22d52e7f5278553c1fd2919e67a2fb5bdc7e1c51.headline: Dilbert Creator Scott Adams Dies at 68

692b2dddc9b4a8eea66d15b7a441f22b12c0da9f.summary: The Africa Cup of Nations (CAN 2025) has reached the semi-final stage, with four teams remaining in the competition as of January 14, 2026.
692b2dddc9b4a8eea66d15b7a441f22b12c0da9f.headline: Africa Cup of Nations Reaches Semi Finals with Four Teams Left

8d1380dec43121e9783399718d81e4293a596e97.summary: Jared Kushner and Steven Witkoff are planning a visit to Moscow to meet with Vladimir Putin, according to Bloomberg News reports.
8d1380dec43121e9783399718d81e4293a596e97.headline: Kushner and Witkoff Plan Moscow Visit for Putin Meeting

949739a76860aa9b3017619ee64c0a417cda78f1.summary: The Justice Department announced there is no basis for a criminal or civil rights investigation into the recent ICE shooting in Minneapolis, according to officials.
949739a76860aa9b3017619ee64c0a417cda78f1.headline: DOJ Finds No Basis for Investigation in Minneapolis ICE Shooting

7c089450f368039fc222a79ae4aaee50aeca4c6d.summary: The US has announced the start of phase two of its Gaza plan, which includes a ceasefire, the creation of a committee of Palestinian technocrats to manage Gaza, and steps toward reconstruction and demilitarization. No details have been given about the members of the new committee.
7c089450f368039fc222a79ae4aaee50aeca4c6d.headline: US Launches Phase Two of Gaza Plan With Technocratic Committee

244fadd5379cf530cf71fbeb0bbdeeeeeae97334.summary: Quebec Premier François Legault has announced his resignation as leader of the province ahead of the upcoming fall election, following months of turmoil within the Coalition Avenir Québec. His departure comes as separatist opponents gain momentum in polls.
244fadd5379cf530cf71fbeb0bbdeeeeeae97334.headline: Quebec Premier François Legault Resigns Ahead of Fall Election

57224584faee850521571659c726163f95c47e89.summary: The United States has begun withdrawing some personnel and equipment from Middle East bases, including al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar, following an Iranian warning of retaliation if Washington launches strikes against Iran. Tehran has told neighboring countries it would target US bases in response to any US intervention.
57224584faee850521571659c726163f95c47e89.headline: US Withdraws Personnel From Middle East Bases Amid Iranian Threats

199b265b5faf1606036678e6789af812d75c49a1.summary: The U.S. State Department announced it will suspend immigrant visa processing for citizens of 75 countries, including Afghanistan, Iran, Russia, Somalia, and Brazil. The suspension, effective immediately, is based on concerns that applicants from these countries are likely to require public assistance while in the United States.
199b265b5faf1606036678e6789af812d75c49a1.headline: US Suspends Immigrant Visa Processing for 75 Countries Citing Welfare

40efe07eb3065274bb31e992998f03d80c1360a7.summary: A construction crane being used for a high-speed rail project collapsed onto a moving passenger train northeast of Bangkok, Thailand, on January 14, 2026. The accident killed more than 30 people and injured dozens. The train, carrying nearly 200 people, derailed and caught fire after the impact, according to Thai officials.
40efe07eb3065274bb31e992998f03d80c1360a7.headline: Crane Collapse on Train in Thailand Kills Over 30

7d0f759a0f33cdb78b2dff26e1ef75474ab23a7a.summary: Mike Tomlin stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers on Tuesday after 19 seasons. Tomlin, 53, leaves with a record of never having a losing season but lost his last seven playoff games. Steelers owner Art Rooney II said he was willing to continue with Tomlin, but Tomlin chose to step away. Tomlin does not plan to coach during the 2026 season.
7d0f759a0f33cdb78b2dff26e1ef75474ab23a7a.headline: Mike Tomlin Steps Down as Steelers Coach After 19 Seasons

c2d85c2e76f0e69f8326dbc68ca2f1566391d6b3.summary: The Boston Red Sox have agreed to a five-year, $130 million contract with left-handed pitcher Ranger Suárez, according to multiple reports. Suárez, who became an All-Star in 2024, leaves the Philadelphia Phillies after eight seasons with the team.
c2d85c2e76f0e69f8326dbc68ca2f1566391d6b3.headline: Red Sox Sign Ranger Suárez to Five Year

ca1e2b5b8744701140f1471c87f17c8be88cbf0c.summary: On January 14, 2026, the FBI searched the Virginia home and seized devices belonging to Washington Post reporter Hannah Natanson. The search was conducted as part of a classified documents investigation related to Aurelio Perez-Lugones. The FBI confirmed the action was tied to a national security probe.
ca1e2b5b8744701140f1471c87f17c8be88cbf0c.headline: FBI Searches Washington Post Reporters Home in Classified Documents

5abac7d55efa8cacda4d5592a86ef92f0527bc7a.summary: France's interior ministry has banned 10 British members of the Raise the Colours group from entering the country, citing concerns over anti-migrant activities and potential public disorder. Officials said the activists' actions were likely to incite violence or hatred.
5abac7d55efa8cacda4d5592a86ef92f0527bc7a.headline: France Bans 10 British Raise the Colours Activists Over Anti Migrant

dcb10cb969003b39385a93075de4f424022df633.summary: Top officials from Denmark and Greenland met with U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio at the White House to discuss Greenland's status, following provocative statements by the president. The meeting was requested by Danish and Greenlandic diplomats amid heightened tensions.
dcb10cb969003b39385a93075de4f424022df633.headline: Denmark and Greenland Hold White House Talks With U.S. on Greenland

881c18e4dabc42d5971a88ae515a4492bb265883.summary: Shaun Wane has resigned as England rugby league head coach after six years in charge. His departure comes less than a year before the Rugby League World Cup, leaving England searching for a new coach ahead of the tournament.
881c18e4dabc42d5971a88ae515a4492bb265883.headline: Shaun Wane Resigns as England Rugby League Head Coach

fdcafc8b38f401edf849ba928ef05bba7da837b4.summary: Verizon experienced a nationwide service outage affecting at least 175,000 customers as of Wednesday afternoon. The company stated it was working to resolve the issue after widespread interruptions were reported.
fdcafc8b38f401edf849ba928ef05bba7da837b4.headline: Verizon Service Outage Affects Over 175

734c9b2192a035013d0b69cdf72dee573430ec9e.summary: The Senate is preparing to vote on a measure regarding Venezuela war powers, while the Trump administration is pressuring Republican senators to oppose it.
734c9b2192a035013d0b69cdf72dee573430ec9e.headline: Senate Set for Venezuela War Powers Vote Amid Trump Pushback

6546e3c3e903217aeb52d3d1a8c58b9f46049781.summary: After talks with US officials, Denmark stated a 'fundamental disagreement' remains with the US regarding Greenland. Danish official Lars Lokke Rasmussen emphasized rejecting any proposals that do not respect Greenland's right to self-determination. The disagreement follows discussions with the Trump administration.
6546e3c3e903217aeb52d3d1a8c58b9f46049781.headline: Denmark Maintains Disagreement With US Over Greenlands Status

a5557eb7160fe106164ff6022bfa34f7f2234c00.summary: Oregon quarterback Dante Moore, previously projected as a top pick in the 2026 NFL draft, has announced he will return to the Ducks for the 2026 season instead of entering the draft. Moore made the announcement on ESPN's SportsCenter.
a5557eb7160fe106164ff6022bfa34f7f2234c00.headline: Oregon QB Dante Moore to Return for 2026 Season

b170ab5affd8e3c20b628054845cadf38f944635.summary: The U.S. has begun evacuating troops from some Middle East bases and advised some personnel to leave a military base in Qatar. Officials describe the move as a precaution as Donald Trump considers possible action against Iran.
b170ab5affd8e3c20b628054845cadf38f944635.headline: U.S. Evacuates Troops from Middle East Bases Amid Iran Tensions

9a9877aa4c59424435ca10d8c37b13db71aab91a.summary: The Charlotte Hornets will retire Dell Curry's No. 30 jersey on March 19, honoring the 16-year NBA veteran and longtime team member.
9a9877aa4c59424435ca10d8c37b13db71aab91a.headline: Charlotte Hornets to Retire Dell Currys Jersey on March 19

59b8caaab2361ce572f5d25570fc939b75065b1b.summary: The Memphis Grizzlies announced that Zach Edey will remain sidelined for at least six more weeks as he continues to recover from a stress reaction in his left ankle. Edey has not played since December 7 and will be reevaluated after completing his current rehabilitation plan.
59b8caaab2361ce572f5d25570fc939b75065b1b.headline: Zach Edey Out at Least Six More Weeks With Ankle Injury

39b45582b48f96d3ff95fd24f90c7d27f63f29fd.summary: Over 2,400 protesters have been killed in Iran during a violent crackdown by security forces, according to reports. The unrest marks the country's largest uprising in decades, with information limited due to a widespread communications blackout.
39b45582b48f96d3ff95fd24f90c7d27f63f29fd.headline: Over 2400 Protesters Killed in Iran Amid Widespread Crackdown

89065def8af12ba60565294d7e863e7402a4873c.summary: Home secretary Shabana Mahmood stated she has lost confidence in West Midlands chief constable Craig Guildford after a report found intelligence used to ban Israeli fans was exaggerated or untrue. Mahmood pledged to restore central government power to dismiss chief constables. West Midlands Police apologized for errors but did not comment on Guildford's position.
89065def8af12ba60565294d7e863e7402a4873c.headline: Home Secretary Loses Confidence in West Midlands Chief Constable

282b5ec3c5f0d6ecbd23eae23671dc88b30e92c6.summary: The US Supreme Court did not issue a ruling on President Trump's tariffs as of January 14, 2026. The decision on the legality of the tariffs under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act remains pending.
282b5ec3c5f0d6ecbd23eae23671dc88b30e92c6.headline: Supreme Court Delays Ruling on Trumps Tariffs

80f0642393bad7f42a27a94e7a78308cd0c33ee7.summary: South Korean prosecutors have requested the death penalty for former president Yoon Suk Yeol, who is on trial for insurrection after his failed attempt to impose martial law in December 2024. The verdict in Yoon's case is expected next month.
80f0642393bad7f42a27a94e7a78308cd0c33ee7.headline: Prosecutors Seek Death Penalty for Yoon Suk Yeol in Insurrection Trial

d7961370b5f0d83fc84608964dcd8752edf7f5af.summary: Venezuela's acting president has announced the release of some political prisoners, describing it as a sign of political change. However, NGOs report that nearly 1,000 political prisoners remain detained, and the government has not specified who will be released or when.
d7961370b5f0d83fc84608964dcd8752edf7f5af.headline: Venezuela Releases Some Political Prisoners

6de0cf0603b548c7d6142786188a840b87f47308.summary: Adam Thielen announced his retirement from the NFL after a 13-year career. Thielen played for the Vikings, Panthers, and Steelers before making the announcement on Wednesday.
6de0cf0603b548c7d6142786188a840b87f47308.headline: Adam Thielen Announces Retirement After 13 Year NFL Career

529d071ba72022e68242793adece0a28d75dad1f.summary: Saks Global, owner of Neiman Marcus and Bergdorf Goodman, has filed for bankruptcy protection after financial difficulties following its acquisition of Neiman Marcus led to a cash shortfall.
529d071ba72022e68242793adece0a28d75dad1f.headline: Saks Global Files for Bankruptcy After Neiman Marcus Acquisition

8ba26d2c8fd53b2ecb9c96f26c0672c67970bcbd.summary: Germany will send reconnaissance troops to Greenland at Denmark's request to assess potential military contributions for regional security, according to a statement from the German defence ministry.
8ba26d2c8fd53b2ecb9c96f26c0672c67970bcbd.headline: Germany to Deploy Reconnaissance Troops to Greenland at Denmarks

d09296db475346cb9685ed8903f99dcdc4d2683a.summary: The CFL rules committee has proposed eliminating tie games in the regular season. Under the proposal, if a game remains tied after two overtime rounds, teams would alternate plays from the opponent’s three-yard line until one team scores and the other does not, ensuring a winner is decided.
d09296db475346cb9685ed8903f99dcdc4d2683a.headline: CFL Proposes Rule to Eliminate Tie Games in Regular Season

85edf55af58839b2be02b5289d4a6958a15bfe50.summary: Denmark, the US, and a third government held their first official talks in Washington regarding President Trump's proposal to acquire Greenland. The discussions, involving JD Vance and Marco Rubio, were described as frank but constructive and lasted nearly an hour. The Danish embassy is set to brief journalists on the results of the negotiations.
85edf55af58839b2be02b5289d4a6958a15bfe50.headline: US Denmark Hold First Official Talks on Trumps Greenland Proposal

43231a6f810db5f09c7c3f8618dbce73b22f4de8.summary: On January 14, 2026, the Trump administration canceled up to $1.9 billion in federal grants for mental health and substance use services. The termination affects up to 2,800 grantees, with funding ending immediately and providers warning of impacts on thousands seeking help and in recovery.
43231a6f810db5f09c7c3f8618dbce73b22f4de8.headline: Trump Administration Cancels $1.9 Billion in Mental Health Grant

188e19e0e53ccbc97f0983ffdafc2ad674764058.summary: Elon Musk stated he was unaware that Grok, an AI tool, generated explicit images of minors. In response, Democratic lawmakers in the US urged Apple and Google to remove X from their app stores.
188e19e0e53ccbc97f0983ffdafc2ad674764058.headline: Lawmakers Urge Apple and Google to Remove X After Grok AI Incident

6dbcfdd9d2fb74709842321c6964a7b9bc0b4c7b.summary: A photo taken from the International Space Station at 3:29 a.m. on December 20, 2025, shows the New York–Newark–Jersey City metropolitan area, which covers 23 counties in New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut and has a population of about 19.9 million.
6dbcfdd9d2fb74709842321c6964a7b9bc0b4c7b.headline: ISS Captures Nighttime Image of New York Metro Area in December 2025

97392bbb2cba70d28385e07b063e873ddd846771.summary: A construction crane collapsed onto a passenger train northeast of Bangkok, killing at least 32 people and injuring dozens, according to Thai officials. The train was carrying nearly 200 passengers. The incident followed a separate crane collapse outside Bangkok that killed two people the previous day.
97392bbb2cba70d28385e07b063e873ddd846771.headline: Crane Collapse on Thai Train Kills at Least 32

38cfecff9bfe24f70b06728af32705272a295a68.summary: The U.S. State Department announced it will suspend processing immigrant visas for citizens of 75 countries, including Afghanistan, Iran, Russia, and Somalia, due to concerns they may rely on public assistance. The suspension takes effect January 21, 2026, and does not affect visitors or short-term visa holders.
38cfecff9bfe24f70b06728af32705272a295a68.headline: U.S. to Suspend Immigrant Visas for 75 Countries Starting January 21

77124a057e8ee254c7f4bce6c8a4ddf4b76ca821.summary: Elon Musk’s X has disabled its Grok AI feature from generating or editing sexualized images of real people, following criticism and legal concerns. The UK government claims vindication for its earlier stance, and Musk has pledged to comply with laws in all markets.
77124a057e8ee254c7f4bce6c8a4ddf4b76ca821.headline: X Disables Grok AI Feature for Creating Sexualized Images of Real

e2b3b956478045f49ee4234df18ee30295ba01c1.summary: The New York Giants are finalizing a deal to hire John Harbaugh as their next head coach, with contract negotiations underway and an official announcement expected soon. Harbaugh interviewed with the team on Wednesday and is expected to accept the position, according to multiple reports.
e2b3b956478045f49ee4234df18ee30295ba01c1.headline: Giants Finalizing Deal to Hire John Harbaugh as Head Coach

555ed706a9bf84c5b3979c467fd1ec8aeb740c45.summary: Donald Trump stated that Iran has stopped killing protesters, but Iranian authorities have indicated that executions may still proceed. The U.S. has not ruled out military action, with personnel evacuated from a Qatar command center and increased military precautions amid ongoing concerns over Iran's response to protests.
555ed706a9bf84c5b3979c467fd1ec8aeb740c45.headline: Trump Says Iran Halted Protester Killings as U.S. Weighs Military

f5e689c61ecc6c885bf394715a14c286a44849c0.summary: The UK economy grew by 0.3% in November 2025, outperforming expectations and rebounding from the previous month's contraction. The government faces challenges with energy shortages and military conscription amid ongoing conflict.

ffaf07f93c6d73fb47292616df544a8a27a139cc.summary: Russia has expelled an unnamed British diplomat, accusing the individual of spying. The Russian foreign ministry stated the diplomat has been stripped of accreditation and must leave the country within two weeks.
