The EU is considering $108 billion in retaliatory tariffs against the US, while thousands marched in Greenland to oppose Trump's takeover threats.
a0f60a644238a8f5f75d56991fe9f5b4dd7c8c40.headline: EU Considers Retaliatory Tariffs After Trumps Greenland Threat

b2e6a83613b6dbbb6c6316c5a5993fc04d3e7958.summary: President Trump has launched a 'Board of Peace' initially aimed at Gaza's post-war transition, inviting leaders from several countries and appointing high-level members. The board's charter suggests a broader conflict mediation role. Nations are being asked to pay $1 billion for permanent membership, prompting caution and criticism from some leaders, including Tony Blair and Israeli and Palestinian officials.
b2e6a83613b6dbbb6c6316c5a5993fc04d3e7958.headline: Trump Unveils Gaza Peace Board

098ba85e14c9078d600f7b18166d8a09ebafea10.summary: The Atlanta Falcons have hired Kevin Stefanski as their head coach. Stefanski, previously with Cleveland, is expected to bring in a well-known Browns offensive line coach. The Falcons aim to end their eight-year playoff drought with this new leadership.
098ba85e14c9078d600f7b18166d8a09ebafea10.headline: Atlanta Falcons Hire Kevin Stefanski as Head Coach

4f3a7992c45bd423b93e9d5859572b2ff34bacf8.summary: The Syrian government and the SDF have reached an agreement for the government to take over SDF-controlled areas and integrate SDF fighters into the Syrian military. President Ahmed al-Sharaa stated the deal will reestablish state control over most regions. The agreement ends over a decade of Kurdish self-rule in northern Syria and includes a cease-fire.
4f3a7992c45bd423b93e9d5859572b2ff34bacf8.headline: Syrian Government Reaches Deal to Reassert Control Over SDF Areas

3c3c0a6167909b07c9c40a1b81efac8d1d5b3029.summary: The Denver Broncos defeated the Buffalo Bills 33-30 in overtime, advancing to the AFC Championship game. Bo Nix led the final drive for a game-winning field goal by Wil Lutz, but Nix sustained an injury during the game, raising concerns about his availability for the next matchup.
3c3c0a6167909b07c9c40a1b81efac8d1d5b3029.headline: Broncos Advance to AFC Championship After Overtime Win

61d66c7a80ce3ba423bf64752e6d7c51d812b6e8.summary: The NFL Divisional Round continues today with the Houston Texans facing the New England Patriots in Foxborough and the Chicago Bears hosting the Los Angeles Rams. The winners will advance to their respective conference championship games. Pre-game coverage, predictions, and live discussions are ongoing, but final results have not been reported yet.
61d66c7a80ce3ba423bf64752e6d7c51d812b6e8.headline: Texans Face Patriots and Bears Host Rams in NFL Divisional Round

2a1650011bef80fda451c460eb44c75ff83876d4.summary: Emma Raducanu advanced to the second round of the Australian Open with a 6-4, 6-1 victory over Mananchaya Sawangkaew. Raducanu recovered from an early deficit to win in straight sets on the tournament's opening Sunday.
2a1650011bef80fda451c460eb44c75ff83876d4.headline: Emma Raducanu Advances at Australian Open With Straight Sets Win

e95e4a1f53878569782f2f07b12148816933c399.summary: The Montreal Canadiens defeated the Ottawa Senators 6-5 in overtime on Saturday, with Cole Caufield scoring the winning goal. The Canadiens rallied late in the third period to tie the game before securing the victory.
e95e4a1f53878569782f2f07b12148816933c399.headline: Canadiens Defeat Senators 6 5 in Overtime With Caufield Winner

50abffd909bab1f455a0cb351ec5c2e4a55116dc.summary: Nacho Elvira won the Dubai Invitational by one shot after Shane Lowry lost his lead with a double bogey on the final hole. Rory McIlroy tied for third following late-round mistakes. Elvira finished at 10 under par, securing his third European tour title.
50abffd909bab1f455a0cb351ec5c2e4a55116dc.headline: Nacho Elvira Claims Dubai Invitational After Final Hole Drama

187ba9e275697db2cc55501a3f21d3009b957654.summary: The government has withdrawn an amendment to the proposed Hillsborough law after criticism from campaigners and some Labour MPs, who raised concerns that it would allow senior officials in security services to opt out of accountability.
187ba9e275697db2cc55501a3f21d3009b957654.headline: Government Drops Hillsborough Law Amendment After Criticism

e0f0255641ec25a9a3a1cbc363bddb888aa6f494.summary: Wildfires in southern Chile have killed at least 16 people and forced over 50,000 to evacuate. The government has declared a state of catastrophe as fires continue to burn out of control in two regions.
e0f0255641ec25a9a3a1cbc363bddb888aa6f494.headline: Wildfires in Southern Chile Kill 16 and Force Mass Evacuations

5fb64aac533661f5975872271406f42edd2fa82d.summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has voiced concerns about children's screen time as more than 60 Labour MPs urge him to support a social media ban for under-16s. The House of Lords is expected to vote on the proposed ban this week.
5fb64aac533661f5975872271406f42edd2fa82d.headline: UK House of Lords to Vote on Under 16 Social Media Ban

e60b038f12740f056fbc6525a958da3565dd8df7.summary: Texans linebacker Azeez Al-Shaair was fined $11,593 for wearing eye black with the message "stop the genocide" during last week's wild-card game, following his Pro Bowl season in 2025.
e60b038f12740f056fbc6525a958da3565dd8df7.headline: Azeez Al Shaair Fined for Message on Eye Black During Wild Card

813c6464147a90c34e02981970ebdda3086a53a8.summary: Glasgow Warriors defeated Saracens in the Champions Cup, securing a home last-16 match against the Bulls.
813c6464147a90c34e02981970ebdda3086a53a8.headline: Glasgow Warriors Beat Saracens to Secure Home Last 16 Tie

8b0c688808d192627cf0019b4e15607d68bdb553.summary: Spanish Prime Minister Sanchez criticized the idea of a U.S. invasion of Greenland, stating it would benefit Putin. GOP Rep. Michael McCaul warned that such an intervention would lead to conflict with NATO allies.
8b0c688808d192627cf0019b4e15607d68bdb553.headline: Leaders Warn Against U.S. Military Action in Greenland

ffcef279c05c8440d6b76989e64982509ba29211.summary: David Coit scored a career-high 43 points, tying the program's single-game record for made 3-pointers, as Maryland defeated Penn State 96-73. This victory marked the Terrapins' first Big Ten win of the season and ended their four-game losing streak.
ffcef279c05c8440d6b76989e64982509ba29211.headline: David Coit Leads Maryland to First Big Ten Win With 43 Points

4bba6983ad5f9ae6fb57545227605f0eace12e2b.summary: Hundreds of counterprotesters outnumbered and dispersed a small group of pro-ICE demonstrators at a Minneapolis rally near City Hall, effectively ending the rally in support of recent immigration enforcement actions.
4bba6983ad5f9ae6fb57545227605f0eace12e2b.headline: Counterprotesters Disperse Pro ICE Rally in Minneapolis

dc9ce47bdcfbbc57b12097abf73629a9c7a3f57d.summary: Syrian forces have taken control of major oil and gas fields in eastern Syria, according to security sources cited by multiple news outlets.
dc9ce47bdcfbbc57b12097abf73629a9c7a3f57d.headline: Syrian Forces Take Control of Major Oil and Gas Fields in East

61001cc058ad9112e70fce03dd6d65a7d0d8f94a.summary: Sequoia is set to join GIC and Coatue in an investment round for AI startup Anthropic, according to multiple reports. This follows a recent leadership overhaul at Anthropic.
61001cc058ad9112e70fce03dd6d65a7d0d8f94a.headline: Sequoia to Join GIC and Coatue in Anthropic Investment Round

8cd6292066fc5a796c4270f1aaafd4d1a01fde8a.summary: Clashes between guerrilla groups in Colombia have resulted in 27 deaths, according to multiple sources.
8cd6292066fc5a796c4270f1aaafd4d1a01fde8a.headline: Clashes Between Guerrilla Groups in Colombia Leave 27 Dead

ae211a61320032d240c82a991740d73b4c1d2b23.summary: Indonesian authorities have found wreckage from a missing surveillance plane carrying 10 people. Rescue teams are moving toward the site, where one body has been recovered so far. Search efforts are ongoing despite challenging weather and terrain.
ae211a61320032d240c82a991740d73b4c1d2b23.headline: Indonesia Finds Wreckage of Missing Surveillance Plane

21b3b1a2895c13fded56ae8f316cc8e6c3603719.summary: Brazil's Lula criticized Donald Trump's approach to Venezuela, while the Batista brothers are preparing to invest in a major Venezuelan oil project linked to Trump's planned revival of the country's energy sector.
21b3b1a2895c13fded56ae8f316cc8e6c3603719.headline: Lula Criticizes Trump as Batistas Plan Venezuelan Oil Investment

6f7fbf66689fe2eedbba3b9188960cbfb82abffd.summary: A mass Russian drone attack on Ukraine killed two people, according to Zelenskiy. Separately, over 200,000 people in the Russian-occupied part of Zaporizhia lost power following a Ukrainian strike.
6f7fbf66689fe2eedbba3b9188960cbfb82abffd.headline: Russian Drone Attack Kills Two in Ukraine

6d16ba3e6b1dfdebca6b9f470f63d0eb9022637b.summary: The Syrian government and US-backed Kurdish forces have agreed to an immediate ceasefire following intensified fighting, including the Syrian army's capture of Tabqa. The agreement aims to halt hostilities in the region east of the Euphrates River.
6d16ba3e6b1dfdebca6b9f470f63d0eb9022637b.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Agree to Immediate Ceasefire

646bf83b670292478b0ff2044761be6ab6b58223.summary: Despite recent court rulings blocking a government ban on offshore wind construction, Trump's campaign against the industry has created uncertainty and threatened future projects.
646bf83b670292478b0ff2044761be6ab6b58223.headline: Court Blocks Ban but Trumps Campaign Clouds Offshore Wind Projects

754d9c4c26979ca7f1d657e2561b361450758b10.summary: The U.S. conducted a third retaliatory strike in Syria, killing an Al-Qaeda-affiliated leader. The operation followed a deadly Islamic State ambush and was confirmed by U.S. Central Command.
754d9c4c26979ca7f1d657e2561b361450758b10.headline: US Strike in Syria Kills Al Qaeda Linked Leader After IS Ambush

943b313ff05ccf761fd98ec90d557cb009bf5569.summary: The Syrian army has advanced in the country's north, taking control of several Kurdish-held towns despite US objections. Efforts under Ahmed al-Sharaa to integrate Kurdish forces into the national army have stalled, and the government has expanded its control over these areas.
943b313ff05ccf761fd98ec90d557cb009bf5569.headline: Syrian Army Seizes More Kurdish Held Towns in Northern Advance

bc459464ccd26bf92ba19f6f82beb2278a07fbab.summary: The Pentagon has ordered 1,500 active-duty troops to prepare for possible deployment to Minnesota amid ongoing protests over increased immigration enforcement in Minneapolis and St. Paul. President Trump has threatened to invoke the Insurrection Act if state officials do not control protests targeting immigration officials. No deployment has been confirmed yet.
bc459464ccd26bf92ba19f6f82beb2278a07fbab.headline: Pentagon Prepares 1500 Troops as Trump Threatens Insurrection Act

f2f5b17f0241f5a236809eb1040167432d56ee2c.summary: Wildfires in central and southern Chile have killed at least 19 people, destroyed hundreds of homes, and forced 50,000 residents to evacuate. President Gabriel Boric declared a state of catastrophe in the Biobío and Ñuble regions as firefighters continue to battle the flames.
f2f5b17f0241f5a236809eb1040167432d56ee2c.headline: Wildfires in Chile Kill 19 and Force 50

64ec32c4e365bd5a9623c2d86d40a3b9c2fb2c62.summary: At least 39 people were confirmed dead and dozens injured after two high-speed trains collided and derailed near Adamuz in Córdoba province, southern Spain, on Sunday night. Rescue operations are ongoing, with 12 people in intensive care and at least 75 hospitalized. The accident is the deadliest train crash in Spain since at least 2013.
64ec32c4e365bd5a9623c2d86d40a3b9c2fb2c62.headline: At Least 39 Dead in Southern Spain High Speed Train Collision

31037c2513a3291a103aa7c01dbb122e7305fe2a.summary: Japan's prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, has announced the dissolution of the lower house and called a snap election for all 465 seats, set for January 23. This will be her first electoral test since taking office in October.
31037c2513a3291a103aa7c01dbb122e7305fe2a.headline: Japans Sanae Takaichi Calls Snap Election for January 23

0a83f64243592098c32585fd4a8498085175cede.summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the San Francisco 49ers 41-6, advancing to the NFC Championship Game. The Los Angeles Rams secured their spot in the NFC title game as well, beating the Chicago Bears 20-17 in overtime with a decisive drive led by Matthew Stafford.
0a83f64243592098c32585fd4a8498085175cede.headline: Seahawks and Rams Advance to NFC Championship Game

dc99abdb6d9c4f794709ceb0401d607b064ac93d.summary: As the Denver Broncos prepare to start Jarrett Stidham in the AFC Championship Game against the New England Patriots, Nick Foles, known for leading the Eagles to a Super Bowl win over the Patriots in 2017, offered encouragement to the Broncos following Bo Nix's season-ending injury.
dc99abdb6d9c4f794709ceb0401d607b064ac93d.headline: Broncos Turn to Stidham for AFC Title Game After Nix Injury

15325ecd1a0cbfd314d52e04db2db3fda8d454bb.summary: President Bernardo Arevalo has declared a state of siege in Guatemala following riots and hostage-taking incidents at prisons, where at least seven police officers were killed. Prison hostages have been freed, and authorities attribute the recent surge in unrest to gang activity.
15325ecd1a0cbfd314d52e04db2db3fda8d454bb.headline: Guatemala Declares State of Siege After Deadly Prison Riots

f6ef8a42960bf8166d805debe0162da505004444.summary: Senegal won the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco 1-0 after extra time, with Pape Gueye scoring the decisive goal. The match was marked by controversy over a penalty decision that led to Senegal temporarily leaving the field. Morocco missed a penalty before Senegal secured the victory.
f6ef8a42960bf8166d805debe0162da505004444.headline: Senegal Defeats Morocco 1 0 in Controversial AFCON Final

e2ddfac2e54fb6189c56d585d306d9a2f9b5a2e8.summary: Zach Hyman scored two goals and an assist, Ryan Nugent-Hopkins scored in his 1,000th game, and Connor Ingram made 27 saves for a shutout as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the St. Louis Blues 5-0. The Oilers began an eight-game homestand with the win.
e2ddfac2e54fb6189c56d585d306d9a2f9b5a2e8.headline: Oilers Shut Out Blues 5 0 With Hymans Two Goals and Ingrams

d7466fb0aebb9a8f79e8a6d7c36ee0c3c444d00c.summary: Clashes between guerrilla groups in Colombia's Guaviare region have resulted in 27 deaths, according to multiple sources. The groups are reportedly fighting for control of the area.
d7466fb0aebb9a8f79e8a6d7c36ee0c3c444d00c.headline: Clashes Between Guerrilla Groups in Colombia Leave 27 Dead

4a676e6a31cecbcb593c7b5b3b2fe68bd97d6ac7.summary: Kevin Durant scored 18 points to pass Dirk Nowitzki and move into sixth place on the NBA's all-time career scoring list. Jabari Smith Jr. led the Houston Rockets with a season-high 32 points as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 119-110.
4a676e6a31cecbcb593c7b5b3b2fe68bd97d6ac7.headline: Durant Moves to Sixth on NBA Scoring List as Rockets Beat Pelicans

b612d988b7d0bd13d83eb76ea9464f39332ffb8b.summary: Donald Trump has established a Board of Peace linked to the Gaza ceasefire, inviting countries including Hungary and India to join. The board's charter requires a $1 billion fee for permanent membership. Tony Blair has distanced himself from involvement. The board is intended to oversee rebuilding efforts, with some noting its mandate may extend beyond Gaza.
b612d988b7d0bd13d83eb76ea9464f39332ffb8b.headline: Trump Launches Gaza Peace Board With $1 Billion Membership Fee

4098da0f22d68611fdd56f5cd2951c8bd1f4144a.summary: Andrew Rosindell, Conservative MP for Romford since 2001, has left the Conservative Party to join Reform UK, citing disagreements over the party's stance on the Chagos Islands. His move follows Robert Jenrick's recent defection to Reform UK.
4098da0f22d68611fdd56f5cd2951c8bd1f4144a.headline: Andrew Rosindell Leaves Conservatives for Reform UK

4ede204913f9277e7d62d5ee2701bca5634b5f5e.summary: A new Oxfam report finds that the number of billionaires reached a record high in the past year, with their collective wealth rising to $18.3 trillion. The report states that the super-rich are significantly more likely to hold political power and own all social media companies. Oxfam also notes that governments have repressed protests over austerity and job shortages.
4ede204913f9277e7d62d5ee2701bca5634b5f5e.headline: Oxfam Billionaires Wealth Hits Record $18.3 Trillion Amid Power

af8fcfbe73b73062c38ca48a5192b3ee774f9a88.summary: The US president has intensified calls for acquiring Greenland, causing political turmoil in the territory. Amid this, the president criticized the Norwegian leader over a Nobel Prize issue and emphasized prioritizing US interests. Other leaders acknowledged the president's role in Ukraine ceasefire efforts.
af8fcfbe73b73062c38ca48a5192b3ee774f9a88.headline: US Presidents Push for Greenland Acquisition Sparks Crisis

3e4d56f337e4885d7cba4b3989bae6670fb662b6.summary: The Los Angeles Rams defeated the Chicago Bears in overtime with a 42-yard field goal by Harrison Mevis, advancing to the NFC Championship game in Seattle. Cobie Durant recorded his third interception of the playoffs during the win.
3e4d56f337e4885d7cba4b3989bae6670fb662b6.headline: Rams Defeat Bears in Overtime to Reach NFC Championship Game

2ba3c8c99afb3a298e8e13c60167c575b23a5a39.summary: World markets reacted and the dollar fell after Trump announced plans to impose tariffs on Europe in response to disputes over Greenland. European governments criticized the move and warned it could lead to a damaging cycle of trade retaliation.
2ba3c8c99afb3a298e8e13c60167c575b23a5a39.headline: Trumps Greenland Tariff Threats Prompt European Criticism and Market

edd9b06e3e6cb2616eb8f613b21645696e1340cc.summary: Ja Morant addressed recent trade rumors after the Grizzlies' win over the Magic, stating he is committed to playing for Memphis and emphasizing his loyalty to the team.
edd9b06e3e6cb2616eb8f613b21645696e1340cc.headline: Ja Morant Reaffirms Commitment to Grizzlies Amid Trade Rumors

a86803801725de7250c166981a0d1bfaa0b95c03.summary: The NFL postseason is down to four teams: the New England Patriots, Denver Broncos, Los Angeles Rams, and Seattle Seahawks. The Rams defeated the Bears in overtime and will face the Seahawks in the NFC Championship, while the Patriots and Broncos will compete in the AFC Championship. Winners will advance to the Super Bowl.
a86803801725de7250c166981a0d1bfaa0b95c03.headline: NFL Playoffs

56cd6de9461395fbeb33f82dc9aa2d593688e9f6.summary: A trial is scheduled to begin Monday in Harry's case against Associated Newspapers, where he and other claimants, including Elton John and Liz Hurley, accuse the publisher of the Daily Mail of illegal acts such as phone hacking and surveillance.
56cd6de9461395fbeb33f82dc9aa2d593688e9f6.headline: Trial to Begin in Harrys Case Against Daily Mail Publisher

01e7da96a3d44adce11c2d9687137ba98a1ab968.summary: Syria's new leaders, who replaced Bashar Assad in December 2024, have secured a cease-fire with a militia after government forces recently seized key assets from the group. The new leadership continues to face challenges in establishing full control over the country.
01e7da96a3d44adce11c2d9687137ba98a1ab968.headline: Syrias New Leaders Secure Cease Fire After Gaining Ground Against

7db13bbae5b373f4f240bfdc4e9d0077db739201.summary: European countries are weighing retaliatory tariffs and other economic actions after Donald Trump threatened new U.S. tariffs in his pursuit of an Arctic island. Discussions among European leaders are ongoing as they consider possible responses.
7db13bbae5b373f4f240bfdc4e9d0077db739201.headline: Europe Considers Retaliatory Tariffs After Trump Threatens New U.S.

e939932c9aaa16cd582e148ed41df4b75878b802.summary: A major fire at Gul Plaza in Karachi lasted over 24 hours before being extinguished, resulting in six deaths and more than 65 people reported missing.
e939932c9aaa16cd582e148ed41df4b75878b802.headline: Karachi Fire at Gul Plaza Leaves Six Dead

a2d0c7d6b39156099ef60666158636cead49ae41.summary: China's population declined for the fourth consecutive year in 2025, with the birthrate reaching a record low, according to official data. Experts warn that the ongoing decrease raises concerns about an aging population, a shrinking workforce, and potential long-term economic effects.
a2d0c7d6b39156099ef60666158636cead49ae41.headline: Chinas Population Falls for Fourth Year as Birthrate Hits Record Low

d42223b2f409b011d256b4c517e32a5b3953263c.summary: Antonio Jose Seguro led the first round of Portugal's presidential election, with Andre Ventura finishing second. Both candidates will advance to a runoff.
d42223b2f409b011d256b4c517e32a5b3953263c.headline: Seguro and Ventura Advance to Portugal Presidential Runoff

09272713842575c9df690bb63b783610686bdcad.summary: A '60 Minutes' report on Trump deportations, previously pulled from airing last month, has now been broadcast. The segment was initially withheld, with the correspondent attributing the decision to editor-in-chief Bari Weiss and calling it political in an internal email.
09272713842575c9df690bb63b783610686bdcad.headline: 60 Minutes Airs Trump Deportation Report After Earlier Delay

e6bc7066b907c50f40b59849d63fc4fc8b606733.summary: China's economy met its 5% growth target for 2025 despite a weaker fourth quarter. Experts note that ongoing trade tensions and domestic challenges, such as a slow housing market, continue to affect the country's economic outlook.
e6bc7066b907c50f40b59849d63fc4fc8b606733.headline: China Achieves 5% Growth Target for 2025 Amid Ongoing Economic

ecc9418e397c448a6f5a9beeb51f3c58e3c2d9e2.summary: Daniel Pierce, selected 14th overall in the 2025 draft, is recognized for his strong defensive skills at shortstop and is noted for his physical development since joining the White Sox organization.
ecc9418e397c448a6f5a9beeb51f3c58e3c2d9e2.headline: Daniel Pierce Highlights White Sox Prospect Rankings

d11e5c488d3b2b01969ffd96bcd55c7de4c2be38.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have agreed to an immediate ceasefire and broad integration to end ongoing clashes, according to state media and Reuters. Kurdish commanders had called for stronger US intervention prior to the agreement.
d11e5c488d3b2b01969ffd96bcd55c7de4c2be38.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Reach Ceasefire and Integration

68f5040b12d1965574f6614272800305d806df34.summary: Syrian forces have taken control of major oil and gas fields in eastern Syria, according to security sources. In Libya, security authorities have released over 200 migrants from a 'secret prison,' two security sources report.
68f5040b12d1965574f6614272800305d806df34.headline: Syrian Forces Seize Oil Fields

d13ce49f7aea1202f88f2ede6cae5d823e96eb3e.summary: The Buffalo Bills have fired head coach Sean McDermott after nine seasons, following their 33–30 overtime playoff loss to the Denver Broncos. Brandon Beane has been promoted to president, and the team is searching for a new head coach to lead the franchise next season.
d13ce49f7aea1202f88f2ede6cae5d823e96eb3e.headline: Buffalo Bills Fire Head Coach Sean McDermott After Playoff Loss

b8a596d0cd800469576065958bbf308063705bc8.summary: President Trump has linked his threats to seize Greenland to not receiving the Nobel Peace Prize, telling Norway's prime minister he no longer feels obliged to 'think purely of Peace.' The statements have heightened tensions with Europe, with the EU preparing to respond.
b8a596d0cd800469576065958bbf308063705bc8.headline: Trump Links Greenland Threats to Nobel Snub

240be5277fcb172c34ddb7cdbbbd2fdfa21ad471.summary: The Kremlin says Vladimir Putin has been invited by Donald Trump to join the newly formed 'Board of Peace,' which aims to oversee Gaza's reconstruction. Russia is reviewing the offer and seeking clarification from Washington. Invitations have also been extended to leaders from Israel and Kazakhstan. Canada is considering its response as details are finalized.
240be5277fcb172c34ddb7cdbbbd2fdfa21ad471.headline: Putin Invited to Trumps Gaza Board of Peace

7894cf3dc70f26a7e7cd3ad581bf429d7c5a2cb5.summary: European stocks fell after Donald Trump threatened tariffs on several European countries in response to opposition to his bid to acquire Greenland. European and Danish officials rejected the pressure, while leaders called for unity and possible mediation. Gold prices rose as investors sought safety amid trade tensions.
7894cf3dc70f26a7e7cd3ad581bf429d7c5a2cb5.headline: European Stocks Drop After Trump Threatens Tariffs Over Greenland

c768cc41e7ddd0ee2ed6a952a31f8cf88338d8ea.summary: Valentino Garavani, the renowned Italian fashion designer known for his luxury women's fashion label, died at his home in Rome at age 93, according to a post on his official Instagram page. His funeral is scheduled for this Friday. Valentino's creations were worn by numerous celebrities and public figures over his nearly 50-year career.
c768cc41e7ddd0ee2ed6a952a31f8cf88338d8ea.headline: Fashion Designer Valentino Garavani Dies at 93 in Rome

9e113533d6c3d6b0c6d5239a77337889369c9d5e.summary: At least 39 people were killed and dozens injured after two high-speed trains collided near Córdoba in southern Spain on Sunday. The crash, Spain's deadliest rail accident in over a decade, occurred when one train derailed and struck another traveling in the opposite direction. Rescue operations are ongoing, with 41 people hospitalized and authorities investigating the cause.
9e113533d6c3d6b0c6d5239a77337889369c9d5e.headline: At Least 39 Dead in High Speed Train Collision Near Córdoba

32d224811e41a5262331544ee5bee5c4996bb959.summary: Seahawks running back Zach Charbonnet will miss the rest of the season after tearing his ACL in Saturday's playoff win over the 49ers. Head coach Mike Macdonald confirmed Charbonnet needs season-ending surgery. The Seahawks will play the NFC Championship Game without their leading touchdown scorer.
32d224811e41a5262331544ee5bee5c4996bb959.headline: Seahawks Lose Zach Charbonnet to Season Ending ACL Injury

2ffeabddfbf1e4e3c1355303c36f838c69ba969e.summary: Novak Djokovic began his 2026 Australian Open campaign with a straight-sets win over Pedro Martinez, marking his 100th match victory at the tournament as he pursues a record 25th Grand Slam title.
2ffeabddfbf1e4e3c1355303c36f838c69ba969e.headline: Djokovic Wins 100th Australian Open Match in First Round Victory

475580a0bde8fa5413d717dfef248c202bb7bfbe.summary: Three senior U.S. Catholic archbishops publicly criticized American foreign policy, expressing concern over the morality of recent military actions and questioning the country's global moral leadership.
475580a0bde8fa5413d717dfef248c202bb7bfbe.headline: U.S. Catholic Archbishops Criticize Morality of American Foreign

691afc635c29e3321a48c95ae86a8aab511260c4.summary: Guatemala has declared a 30-day nationwide state of emergency following a surge in gang violence, which included the killing of at least seven police officers and the taking of 46 hostages at three prisons. Authorities blame gangs for the attacks and unrest.
691afc635c29e3321a48c95ae86a8aab511260c4.headline: Guatemala Declares 30 Day State of Emergency After Gang Attacks

6865f01427d24508d462762d820d7fa3c9595703.summary: The NBA announced the starters for the 2026 All-Star Game, which will feature a new USA vs. World format with three eight-player teams in a round-robin tournament. Jalen Brunson was named a starter, joining Giannis Antetokounmpo, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, Nikola Jokic, Luka Doncic, and Victor Wembanyama among others. The game will take place on February 15 at the Intuit Dome in Inglewood, CA.
6865f01427d24508d462762d820d7fa3c9595703.headline: NBA Announces 2026 All Star Game Starters and New USA vs. World

ce5a2c618e49008846b2f9e99fc77f30b31ccfa1.summary: Arizona men's basketball is ranked unanimous No. 1 in the AP Top 25 poll for the first time after remaining undefeated at 18-0. Nebraska reached its highest-ever ranking at No. 7. UConn, Michigan, Purdue, and Duke complete the top five.
ce5a2c618e49008846b2f9e99fc77f30b31ccfa1.headline: Arizona Earns First Unanimous No. 1 AP Ranking

9f11514203f28b69e39bd2ae88533d05ab6e0bf4.summary: The Rams defeated the Bears, with Sean McVay acknowledging his own 'bad coaching' but crediting the team's strong defense and key plays for securing the win.
9f11514203f28b69e39bd2ae88533d05ab6e0bf4.headline: Rams Beat Bears as McVay Cites Bad Coaching but Praises Team Effort

1b33569c7ad931119a550b11cc8c2aeb67018db7.summary: The Denver Broncos have signed Ben DiNucci to a contract ahead of the AFC Championship Game after Bo Nix's injury. The Patriots are 4.5-point road favorites over the Broncos, according to DraftKings.
1b33569c7ad931119a550b11cc8c2aeb67018db7.headline: Broncos Sign Ben DiNucci Before AFC Title Game After Bo Nix Injury

5e91ebfcfcb897d72d19464bb7cda99149646c2b.summary: Oklahoma City Thunder guard/forward Jalen Williams has a right hamstring strain and will be reevaluated in a couple of weeks, the team announced Monday. Williams, an All-Star last season, is expected to miss at least several games due to the injury.
5e91ebfcfcb897d72d19464bb7cda99149646c2b.headline: Thunders Jalen Williams Out With Hamstring Strain

3cff41a3c09f062a2c8df47da48d88e08e510d25.summary: A major fire at a Karachi shopping mall killed at least 23 people, with over 60 still missing as of Monday. Firefighters continue to search the site following an overnight blaze that destroyed hundreds of shops during the busy wedding season.
3cff41a3c09f062a2c8df47da48d88e08e510d25.headline: Karachi Mall Fire Kills at Least 23

0bb75d04d621c67c21f36f6ed9595d85cfe60a30.summary: On Sunday, 60 Minutes broadcast a report on Trump administration deportations that had been removed from the lineup a month earlier. The initial decision to pull the story led to internal disputes at the program over concerns about political influence.
0bb75d04d621c67c21f36f6ed9595d85cfe60a30.headline: 60 Minutes Airs Previously Pulled Report on Trump Deportations

ae81415ae26f3892845f5a08cb29791b05c6c951.summary: The Atlanta Falcons announced that Jeff Ulbrich will remain as defensive coordinator under new head coach Kevin Stefanski, who has chosen to retain him on his staff.
ae81415ae26f3892845f5a08cb29791b05c6c951.headline: Falcons Retain Jeff Ulbrich as Defensive Coordinator Under Stefanski

44ff6b4f01a93090b02196bcfa8e1a74d3a4d078.summary: Japan's prime minister, Sanae Takaichi, has announced plans to dissolve the lower house on January 23 and call a snap parliamentary election, aiming to capitalize on her high approval ratings since taking office as the country's first female prime minister.
44ff6b4f01a93090b02196bcfa8e1a74d3a4d078.headline: Japans Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi Calls Snap Election for January

ebcc81ae5b41d0ebf8ae3049cceaf1c588cdcf75.summary: Conservative leader Kemi Badenoch has urged her party's MPs to prioritize trust and teamwork following Robert Jenrick's defection to Reform. All 116 Conservative MPs have been summoned to a meeting after Nigel Farage set a deadline for further defections. Badenoch addressed concerns about party unity in a letter to MPs.
ebcc81ae5b41d0ebf8ae3049cceaf1c588cdcf75.headline: Badenoch Calls for Unity After Jenrick Defection to Reform

1d564cef859e70c93429e7eadb83c70564894261.summary: Gold and silver prices reached record highs after Donald Trump announced plans for import taxes related to Greenland. The tariff threats led investors to seek safe-haven assets, impacted European carmakers, and caused a drop in the dollar. European stock markets also declined in response.
1d564cef859e70c93429e7eadb83c70564894261.headline: Gold and Silver Hit Record Highs After Trumps Greenland Tariff Threats

aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.summary: Investigators examining Sunday's high-speed train derailment in Spain, which resulted in at least 40 deaths, have identified a broken joint on the rails as a possible cause, according to a source familiar with the initial investigation.
aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.headline: Broken Rail Joint Found in Deadly Spanish Train Derailment

d1716142db574b33df7ce51c8d4d31782c931dc4.summary: Jakob Junis has agreed to a one-year, $4 million contract with the Texas Rangers, adding depth to their bullpen, according to a source confirmed by ESPN.
d1716142db574b33df7ce51c8d4d31782c931dc4.headline: Jakob Junis Signs One Year

a81e683a7a7411128cd8b74978a43f7e6ff1acaf.summary: A trial has begun in which Prince Harry and six others, including Elton John and Liz Hurley, accuse the publisher of the Daily Mail of unlawful information gathering, such as phone hacking and surveillance. The claimants allege the media company engaged in systematic illegal activities.
a81e683a7a7411128cd8b74978a43f7e6ff1acaf.headline: Prince Harry and Others Begin Trial Against Daily Mail Publisher

5a21c7c0e4a8f828f5f03b05164c1e35e855afc0.summary: Donald Trump has invited nations to join a new U.S.-led board aimed at managing conflicts such as Gaza, with Vladimir Putin also invited to participate. Meanwhile, Minnesota is preparing for the possible arrival of federal troops in response to ongoing immigration protests.
5a21c7c0e4a8f828f5f03b05164c1e35e855afc0.headline: Trump Invites Nations to Join New U.S. Led Board as Minnesota Prepares

5f6a4c4659b2334ed5dd1f14644a716cbc03e10e.summary: The Syrian army has announced it is now in complete control of the city of al-Shaddadi in northeast Syria. Clashes in the area have led to the release of dozens of inmates from a jail holding Islamic State prisoners, with both the Syrian government and Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces blaming each other for the incident.
5f6a4c4659b2334ed5dd1f14644a716cbc03e10e.headline: Syrian Army Claims Control of al Shaddadi Amid Prisoner Release

fcf3c67553ba41f38dc6705bbf5facd0204e4fa4.summary: Prince Harry and six others have accused the publisher of the Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday of serious privacy violations. Prince Harry stated that news stories from the Daily Mail made him feel 'paranoid beyond belief.' Legal proceedings are ongoing.
fcf3c67553ba41f38dc6705bbf5facd0204e4fa4.headline: Prince Harry Alleges Daily Mail Privacy Breaches in Ongoing Case

c162f90e6b077e3cc45fdc61e33f886a53bc26cb.summary: Wildfires in central and southern Chile have killed at least 19 people, destroyed hundreds of homes, and forced evacuations as authorities battle extreme heat and winds. Thousands of acres of forest have been burned.
c162f90e6b077e3cc45fdc61e33f886a53bc26cb.headline: Chile Wildfires Kill 19 and Destroy Hundreds of Homes Amid Heat Wave

874b489352ba160cfa5e360e7a26fe183e33a185.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is set to attend an event with another central bank member while facing a federal criminal investigation into the central bank's costly renovation project.
874b489352ba160cfa5e360e7a26fe183e33a185.headline: Fed Chair Powell Faces Federal Probe Over Renovation Project

e5f0226ae16f3baa86c329f7244fb16eea2530f4.summary: The Green Bay Packers ended their season with five consecutive losses following Micah Parsons' torn ACL in Week 15. The Pro Football Writers of America also released their rosters on Monday.
e5f0226ae16f3baa86c329f7244fb16eea2530f4.headline: Packers Lose Final Five Games After Parsons Injury

5823e4c4d3a1bb0bcc1c9baf6414e1d384987567.summary: The International Monetary Fund forecasts global economic growth of 3.3% in 2026, citing the positive impact of artificial intelligence advancements, which are expected to offset challenges from trade headwinds.
5823e4c4d3a1bb0bcc1c9baf6414e1d384987567.headline: IMF Projects 3.3% Global Growth in 2026 Driven by AI Advancements

2c9845cf271f5f75956040189c20c97064c727ee.summary: The Miami Dolphins have hired Green Bay Packers defensive coordinator Jeff Hafley as their new head coach. Hafley, who previously served as head coach at Boston College for four seasons and spent two years with the Packers, replaces Mike McDaniel. The club announced the hiring on Monday night.
2c9845cf271f5f75956040189c20c97064c727ee.headline: Miami Dolphins Hire Jeff Hafley as Head Coach

bce1777d0fbe4028903f9b1c3be6da2cf214fcd3.summary: Indiana won its first College Football Playoff national title, defeating Miami 27-21 and completing a 16-0 undefeated season. Heisman Trophy winner Fernando Mendoza scored the game-winning touchdown in the final.
bce1777d0fbe4028903f9b1c3be6da2cf214fcd3.headline: Indiana Wins First National Title With 27 21 Victory Over Miami

9df1a8c43a5b787997a558879e7683de7353dc65.summary: The UK government has launched a consultation on banning social media use for under-16s, similar to a recent measure in Australia. Ministers will visit Australia to study its policy, and schools are expected to become 'phone-free by default.' Peers are set to vote on a bill amendment that could introduce the ban within a year of passage.
9df1a8c43a5b787997a558879e7683de7353dc65.headline: UK Considers Social Media Ban for Under 16s

b31debf19bf82955128ce8be394664382f7fe58f.summary: Australia's parliament is considering stricter gun and hate crime laws following the Bondi shooting and a deadly attack on a Jewish festival. The proposed bills are awaiting a Senate vote, with the Liberal-National Coalition expected to oppose the gun law changes.
b31debf19bf82955128ce8be394664382f7fe58f.headline: Australia Debates Stricter Gun and Hate Crime Laws After Recent

3c701ecc6083577295df82def8aaf9a20f8772cc.summary: Three senior US Catholic cardinals issued a joint statement on Monday questioning the morality of recent American foreign policy decisions and urging the Trump administration to adopt a more ethical approach, particularly regarding the use of military force.
3c701ecc6083577295df82def8aaf9a20f8772cc.headline: Senior US Catholic Cardinals Criticize Morality of US Foreign Policy

a8821a4e5c96698daa9369054ed13b7117badab1.summary: The Tennessee Titans have agreed to hire San Francisco 49ers defensive coordinator Robert Saleh as their new head coach. The team is finalizing a deal with Saleh, who previously led the Jets and spent the 2025 season with the 49ers. The Titans announced they completed interviews with Saleh and Matt Nagy before making their decision.
a8821a4e5c96698daa9369054ed13b7117badab1.headline: Titans Finalizing Deal to Hire Robert Saleh as Head Coach

ba13a7ebf84b96ba4740fbec2f87093cce9c6246.summary: Golden State Warriors forward Jimmy Butler suffered a season-ending torn right ACL during Monday's 135-112 win over the Miami Heat. Butler was injured in the third quarter after a collision with Davion Mitchell and had to be helped off the court. News of the ACL tear was confirmed hours after the game.
ba13a7ebf84b96ba4740fbec2f87093cce9c6246.headline: Warriors Jimmy Butler Out for Season With Torn ACL

5d3e8028aa89b43ad329ab8013dbfc324514d698.summary: Jonathan Toews received a prolonged standing ovation in his first game back in Chicago with the Winnipeg Jets, but the Jets lost 2-0 to the Chicago Blackhawks. Spencer Knight made 32 saves for a shutout, Jason Dickinson scored, and Connor Bedard added an empty-net goal, marking his first since returning from injury. The Blackhawks ended a three-game losing streak.
5d3e8028aa89b43ad329ab8013dbfc324514d698.headline: Blackhawks Defeat Jets 2 0 as Toews Receives Ovation in Chicago Return

49194e9fdf00be077bb9b5eaa65055d6715439d4.summary: Japan's 40-year government bond yield reached 4% for the first time since its 2007 introduction, as traders sold sovereign debt amid concerns over increased fiscal spending following a snap election call that could give PM Sanae Takaichi a mandate.
49194e9fdf00be077bb9b5eaa65055d6715439d4.headline: Japans 40 Year Bond Yield Reaches 4% Amid Snap Election Concerns

f3451f77e0a9d7ec10998b43bd059b0a4f73b66c.summary: Indiana defeated Miami 27-21 to win the college football national championship. Coach Curt Cignetti led Indiana to an undefeated season and the title in his second year with the team.
f3451f77e0a9d7ec10998b43bd059b0a4f73b66c.headline: Indiana Wins College Football National Championship Under Curt

4b00331f6ddf359371c8de79ee91b6185d0438ed.summary: Authorities have closed dozens of beaches along Australia's east coast, including many in Sydney, following four shark attacks in New South Wales since Sunday. The most recent incident involved a surfer who sustained minor injuries. Officials are warning people to avoid waterways after recent rainfall, which experts say attracts sharks to beach areas.
4b00331f6ddf359371c8de79ee91b6185d0438ed.headline: Dozens of Australian East Coast Beaches Closed After Shark Attacks

7a0aa4b4811d6731343ced1d58e9a888c59a79a2.summary: At least 39 people were killed when two high-speed trains collided near Córdoba in southern Spain. The cause of the accident is unknown, and officials say the death toll may rise as rescue and recovery operations continue. Spain will observe three days of mourning starting Tuesday.
7a0aa4b4811d6731343ced1d58e9a888c59a79a2.headline: At Least 39 Dead in High Speed Train Collision in Southern Spain

3afb5e468f2f5d81f0abf39b4ca30a5aeaf9a8cc.summary: Guatemala's president has declared a 30-day nationwide state of emergency following a surge in gang violence, including the killing of eight police officers and the taking of 46 hostages at three prisons. The measure allows police to arrest suspected criminals without judicial order.
3afb5e468f2f5d81f0abf39b4ca30a5aeaf9a8cc.headline: Guatemala Declares 30 Day State of Emergency Amid Gang Violence

95eadbe6d5f1771f45a2e61f5b3126a5439e3638.summary: The Buffalo Bills fired head coach Sean McDermott after nine seasons, following a playoff defeat to the Denver Broncos and repeated failures to reach the Super Bowl. Brandon Beane was promoted to president. The team will search for a new head coach for the next NFL season.
95eadbe6d5f1771f45a2e61f5b3126a5439e3638.headline: Buffalo Bills Fire Coach Sean McDermott After Nine Seasons

61002e5288d82ae4c46f93cfb25ef87646a0dcc8.summary: With the 2025 college football season concluded, analysts are previewing the 2026 season and ranking top teams, including national champion Indiana, in early projections.
61002e5288d82ae4c46f93cfb25ef87646a0dcc8.headline: Analysts Release Early 2026 College Football Rankings After Indianas

75c16ec5c57d6ab5fc9dc9a8cf1f5733b97d8642.summary: Donald Trump threatened 200% tariffs on French wines to pressure Emmanuel Macron to join his proposed 'Board of Peace' initiative at Davos. Macron declined the invitation, and the tariff threat led to a drop in European stocks and sell-offs by French drinks companies.
75c16ec5c57d6ab5fc9dc9a8cf1f5733b97d8642.headline: Trump Threatens Tariffs on French Wine After Macron Declines Peace

7f6f7a8308f9ff4f54699dad41757788823b9c86.summary: Victor Manuel Diaz, a 36-year-old from Nicaragua, died of a presumed suicide on January 14 at the Camp East Montana immigration detention facility in El Paso, Texas, according to ICE. He is the second detainee to die at a Texas immigration facility in two weeks.
7f6f7a8308f9ff4f54699dad41757788823b9c86.headline: Second Detainee Dies in Two Weeks at Texas Immigration Facility

aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.summary: Investigators examining Sunday's high-speed train derailment in Spain, which resulted in at least 40 deaths, have identified a broken joint on the rails as a possible cause, according to a source familiar with the initial findings.
aa50c3eb34eca9e332e6ef345ac0504f56e643b5.headline: Broken Rail Joint Found at Site of Fatal Spain Train Derailment

3f7d269a7cde32d863eba759b418fa5db62712bc.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell plans to attend the Supreme Court hearing in the Cook case. His attendance comes amid a federal criminal investigation into the central bank's renovation project and follows previous criticism from the Trump administration.
3f7d269a7cde32d863eba759b418fa5db62712bc.headline: Fed Chair Powell to Attend Supreme Court Hearing in Cook Case

6506297479bfae221b99dbb833949502df6a064d.summary: Hackers disrupted Iranian state TV broadcasts to show footage supporting the exiled crown prince and urging security forces not to target civilians. The incident follows ongoing nationwide protests, with reported deaths from the crackdown exceeding 4,000.
6506297479bfae221b99dbb833949502df6a064d.headline: Hackers Interrupt Iran State TV With Message Backing Exiled Prince

ab4cc5d530cb5a44a719fcac16fd4c4a780aa26c.summary: Official data shows private sector wage growth in the UK has slowed to its lowest rate in five years. Employment has declined, especially in shops, restaurants, bars, and hotels, while the unemployment rate remains at 5.1%.
ab4cc5d530cb5a44a719fcac16fd4c4a780aa26c.headline: UK Private Sector Wage Growth Falls to Five Year Low as Employment

642863a1b6981b186b611f50ad298c063fd2f530.summary: A snowstorm in Ottawa County, Michigan caused a 100-vehicle pileup, leaving jack-knifed trucks across the road. Forecasters warn of extremely cold temperatures and more winter storms expected in several states.
642863a1b6981b186b611f50ad298c063fd2f530.headline: 100 Vehicle Pileup in Michigan as Snowstorm Sweeps Across States

674280996858ff776acb31a3ad2ca89597f9774e.summary: Russian drone and missile attacks on Kyiv have left thousands of buildings without heating and other basic services during freezing weather. The strikes occurred overnight, affecting many residents in the Ukrainian capital.
674280996858ff776acb31a3ad2ca89597f9774e.headline: Russian Strikes Leave Thousands in Kyiv Without Heat Amid Cold

908fbcaf8eab4d9d3629bdf543bd44093727269a.summary: Elon Musk posted a poll on X asking if he should buy Ryanair, amid an ongoing dispute with Ryanair CEO Michael O’Leary related to Starlink services.
908fbcaf8eab4d9d3629bdf543bd44093727269a.headline: Elon Musk Polls X Users on Potential Ryanair Purchase Amid Dispute

df6fcc7feafb21f36d65ff238da133e6bb82230d.summary: Valentino, renowned Italian fashion designer and founder of the Valentino luxury brand, has died at age 93. He was known for his signature red designs and dressed royalty, celebrities, and first ladies. Tributes have been shared by figures including Gwyneth Paltrow.
df6fcc7feafb21f36d65ff238da133e6bb82230d.headline: Italian Fashion Designer Valentino Dies at 93

d4e6ef1d4e3e6b975435006aa127a43fa7b60804.summary: Tensions have escalated between the US and Europe after Trump reiterated demands regarding Greenland, prompting European officials to respond and some Danish officials to skip Davos. European stocks and the dollar fell amid concerns over US-European friction, while leaders called for calm and mediation.
d4e6ef1d4e3e6b975435006aa127a43fa7b60804.headline: US European Tensions Over Greenland Lead to Market Declines and

dfec801d67965dd0f1deb8b4b99ea7d064d2bbed.summary: Global stock markets declined and the dollar weakened as concerns over fallout from Trump's actions related to Greenland drove investors toward gold.
dfec801d67965dd0f1deb8b4b99ea7d064d2bbed.headline: Stocks Drop and Gold Rises Amid Uncertainty Over Trumps Greenland

506e951c0c4aae35aceabfe4e6a9760fc26e26a2.summary: President Trump has launched a 'Board of Peace' focused on Gaza, inviting leaders from multiple countries, including China, Russia, Israel, and France. Norway declined to participate, while the UAE and Belarus accepted. France has not joined, despite Trump threatening tariffs on French goods. The board's purpose and structure remain unclear as invitations continue.
506e951c0c4aae35aceabfe4e6a9760fc26e26a2.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace With Mixed Global Response

21061a693c8b971de2100264d17eccc2f1bf8c9e.summary: Israeli crews demolished buildings inside the UNRWA compound in East Jerusalem on Tuesday, following Israel's seizure of the site last year. The United Nations agency for Palestinian refugees condemned the demolition as a violation of international law. Teargas was also fired at a UN vocational school in Qalandia in the West Bank.
21061a693c8b971de2100264d17eccc2f1bf8c9e.headline: Israel Demolishes UNRWA Compound Buildings in East Jerusalem

a368c1e069ac8c9dc95b7647b14d3f0d865de449.summary: Golden State Warriors forward Jimmy Butler will miss the rest of the NBA season after suffering a torn right ACL during a game against the Miami Heat. The injury occurred in the third quarter following a collision with Miami's Davion Mitchell. Butler will be sidelined for the remainder of the season, according to his agent.
a368c1e069ac8c9dc95b7647b14d3f0d865de449.headline: Warriors Jimmy Butler Out for Season With Torn Right ACL

08a7dc5e66a33765f6d2a454b5b4eb1d96fc683f.summary: At least 39 people were killed in a train crash in Andalucía, Spain, making it the country's deadliest rail accident since 2013. Authorities have imposed a speed limit on the Madrid-Barcelona line as investigators continue to search for the cause. Victims included a police officer, journalists, and a family. A local lottery ticket seller aided rescue efforts using his quad bike.
08a7dc5e66a33765f6d2a454b5b4eb1d96fc683f.headline: Spain Imposes Speed Limit After Andalucía Train Crash Kills 39

8cbdcc0dd9f0a2c615d32b474b860e786767e7d1.summary: The UK government has approved China's plan to build a large new embassy near the Tower of London, despite concerns from critics about potential security risks. Local residents and opponents are expected to challenge the decision through legal means.
8cbdcc0dd9f0a2c615d32b474b860e786767e7d1.headline: UK Government Approves New Chinese Embassy Near Tower of London

125970357a867ac5c36766f81fd4e47ca1faff0e.summary: The Duke of Sussex is scheduled to give evidence in his case against Associated Newspapers, accusing the publisher of phone hacking and other unlawful information gathering. The publisher defends its actions by citing legitimate sourcing, while the duke claims he has faced a campaign of attacks. The case is being heard in the high court.
125970357a867ac5c36766f81fd4e47ca1faff0e.headline: Duke of Sussex to Testify in High Court Case Against Associated

634c459f414b2d65defed19e223343cb66f8fa19.summary: European leaders, including Emmanuel Macron, have criticized Donald Trump's threats to impose tariffs over Greenland, following leaked texts and AI mock-ups shared by Trump. EU officials warn that relations may not recover, as tensions rise over the US stance on the Arctic island.
634c459f414b2d65defed19e223343cb66f8fa19.headline: European Leaders Condemn Trumps Tariff Threats Over Greenland

bc6e1fb579cc50577d6d33beeac982549975633f.summary: Netflix has amended its offer to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery's studio and streaming assets, making its $72 billion bid entirely in cash at $27.75 per share. The move aims to strengthen Netflix's position against a competing bid from Paramount Skydance.
bc6e1fb579cc50577d6d33beeac982549975633f.headline: Netflix Makes $72 Billion All Cash Bid for Warner Bros. Discovery

2cdeea11ec76433613f2f5b3b78290f7866be881.summary: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen criticized Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on Greenland and questioned his trustworthiness. The issue has become a major topic at the World Economic Forum in Davos, with discussions focused on tensions between the U.S. and its NATO allies over Greenland.
2cdeea11ec76433613f2f5b3b78290f7866be881.headline: EU Criticizes Trumps Greenland Tariffs at World Economic Forum

9710de999059ceffa39796c14e59e5975b7ad242.summary: Justin Trudeau and pop star Katy Perry appeared together at the World Economic Forum in Davos, where Trudeau delivered a speech promoting soft power and non-interference in other countries' domestic policies.
9710de999059ceffa39796c14e59e5975b7ad242.headline: Trudeau and Katy Perry Appear Together at Davos Forum

17241da13f62b2e26d4c08e7cfab176bbf77f316.summary: NCAA men's golf champion Michael La Sasso has signed with Phil Mickelson's HyFlyers team in LIV Golf, which means he will not participate in the 2026 Masters tournament.
17241da13f62b2e26d4c08e7cfab176bbf77f316.headline: NCAA Champion Michael La Sasso Joins LIV Golf

a997e38b7e29572aab44ca5f1ec41e1903417572.summary: A Florida state attorney has dismissed the misdemeanor trespassing charge against Vikings receiver Jordan Addison following his arrest in Tampa on January 12, according to court records.
a997e38b7e29572aab44ca5f1ec41e1903417572.headline: Trespassing Charge Against Jordan Addison Dismissed in Florida

00d7358535c5462d827c40afdcd5eceeba496521.summary: Indiana finished the season undefeated and was ranked No. 1 in the final AP Top 25 college football poll after defeating Miami to win the College Football Playoff National Championship.
00d7358535c5462d827c40afdcd5eceeba496521.headline: Indiana Ranked No. 1 After Winning College Football Playoff Title

70a4756b02c147bec59688cf6ddc71949dc48543.summary: The NBA announced the 2026 Finals schedule, with Game 1 set for June 3 and a possible Game 7 on June 19. All games will start at 8:30 p.m. ET / 5:30 p.m. PT. The new timeline could result in a longer gap between the Finals and the NBA Draft.
70a4756b02c147bec59688cf6ddc71949dc48543.headline: NBA Sets 2026 Finals Schedule With Game 1 on June 3

d7d4c9c8ef5a3653a7a725096920e0645a760cf5.summary: Naomi Osaka advanced to the second round of the Australian Open after defeating Antonia Ruzic in a hard-fought first-round match, drawing attention for her jellyfish-inspired walk-on outfit.
d7d4c9c8ef5a3653a7a725096920e0645a760cf5.headline: Naomi Osaka Wins Australian Open Opener in Notable Outfit

d312731ab36e736d963ab1303275fd0b199e8bb8.summary: The Tennessee Titans are finalizing an agreement to hire Robert Saleh as their next head coach after two consecutive 3-14 seasons, aiming to improve the team's performance.

The withdrawal comes as the forces lose territory to government troops.

fff7741c8b3f39cf17cbf23764753b1ad125f24f.summary: A UN report released today declares that the world has entered an era of 'global water bankruptcy,' with billions affected by chronic groundwater depletion, pollution, and overuse. The report calls for urgent action from world leaders to address water mismanagement and adapt to worsening conditions.

Inter Milan is set to play Arsenal tonight, with both teams preparing for the game under the new Champions League format. Inter Milan president Beppe Marotta discussed the format changes ahead of the match.

aa9709394dc7b06f2855ec382126b7dfdaf8dbcd.summary: Brooklyn Peltz Beckham announced he has cut ties with his family, alleging on Instagram that his mother, Victoria, acted inappropriately at his wedding and that his parents tried to control public narratives about his relationship with his wife, Nicola.

2a457de4f81a52afdb5ef49f55eab7bc04ea67a7.summary: Lucy Letby, serving 15 whole-life prison terms for the murder of seven babies and the attempted murder of seven others, will face no new charges, prosecutors announced.

4324b691daa17bca59f2bf24908c2fefc2789253.summary: A six-year-old girl is the only member of her family to survive a train collision in southern Spain that killed 42 people. She had traveled to Madrid with her parents, brother, and cousin to see a musical and was returning home when the accident occurred.
4324b691daa17bca59f2bf24908c2fefc2789253.headline: Six Year Old Survives Spanish Train Crash That Killed 42

d92fbcc6a3fcb7e5c34fe2d2e90a51ae3f719fe9.summary: Federal grand jury subpoenas were issued on Tuesday to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey, Kahly Her, Keith Ellison, and Mary Moriarty. The subpoenas were served as part of a federal government investigation.

c4dea28a621cb97e3d712844eeabc854e7dde37f.summary: Carlos Beltrán and Andruw Jones have been elected to the National Baseball Hall of Fame by the Baseball Writers Association of America. They will be inducted in Cooperstown on July 26, 2026, alongside Jeff Kent. Beltrán received 84.2% of the vote in his fourth year on the ballot. The Hall of Fame Class of 2026 includes three players.

35907068d4e6105bd042443dcd5683d31b46d172.summary: Donald Trump's flight to Davos for the World Economic Forum was delayed after Air Force One experienced a minor electrical issue and returned to Joint Base Andrews. Trump then boarded another aircraft and resumed his trip to Switzerland. The incident caused a brief interruption, but the journey continued as planned.
35907068d4e6105bd042443dcd5683d31b46d172.headline: Trump Resumes Davos Trip After Air Force One Electrical Issue

Yamagami admitted to shooting Abe with a homemade gun during a political rally in Nara, an event that shocked Japan due to its rarity of gun violence.

Meanwhile, Carlos Alcaraz, Aryna Sabalenka, Zeynep Sonmez, and Victoria Mboko advanced to the third round with straight-set victories.

8b9a5a28f22215c47615adf17f13d870a9f1a921.headline: Israeli Crews Demolish UNRWA Compound

While no deal has been officially signed, multiple sources report McDaniel is likely to join the Chargers and work with quarterback Justin Herbert. An official announcement is pending.

2f60abbb7786e20db0bddea0bb6daf7d3adf170f.summary: Baker Mayfield, now quarterback for the Buccaneers, commented on facing new Falcons coach Kevin Stefanski, referencing their difficult split in Cleveland. Mayfield said, "Can't wait to see you twice a year, Coach," as both are set to compete in the NFC South during the 2026 NFL season.
2f60abbb7786e20db0bddea0bb6daf7d3adf170f.headline: Mayfield Anticipates NFC South Matchups Against Falcons Coach

000e14a24901b4b78f7a72d33ea9ba573dea9021.summary: UK inflation rose to 3.4% in December 2025, exceeding economists' forecasts of 3.3%. The increase, driven by higher airfares, tobacco, and food prices, marks the first rise in five months. The Bank of England expects this uptick to be temporary and will consider the data at its upcoming interest rate decision on 5 February 2026.

1e349fadacbe01da69c6f2b8f5ed96251996a3a6.summary: Mexico has extradited 37 additional cartel suspects to the US. Security Minister Omar Garcia Harfuch stated that the US has promised not to seek the death penalty for these individuals. The move comes as Mexico increases efforts against cartels amid US threats of airstrikes.
1e349fadacbe01da69c6f2b8f5ed96251996a3a6.headline: Mexico Extradites 37 Cartel Suspects to US After Death Penalty

191b0da34ec1bbdd4175554e0aaed3cb217ea584.summary: President Trump has established a new international organization called the Board of Peace, inviting multiple countries to join. The initiative has drawn criticism from some who argue it could undermine the United Nations. The UN Security Council endorsed the group, though concerns remain about its purpose and impact.
191b0da34ec1bbdd4175554e0aaed3cb217ea584.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace

169efbdfc5919893b6079ab6b92b05df640a447e.summary: Bo Bichette has signed with the New York Mets after nearly reaching a deal with the Philadelphia Phillies. Phillies president Dave Dombrowski expressed disappointment over missing out on Bichette, who chose the Mets last week despite strong interest from Philadelphia.

The incident follows a recent fatal train collision in Andalucía.

Robert, an All-Star and Silver Slugger winner in 2023, fills a key outfield need for the Mets.
628a5bd6fda0279ec88c07b0ef5fecf5e1c6d47e.headline: Mets Acquire Luis Robert Jr. From White Sox in Trade

The incident occurred two days after a train collision in Andalusia that killed 42 people. Spain is observing three days of mourning for the victims of the earlier crash.
254467d208dcc9b7cc67eefdf34675961243920d.headline: Barcelona Train Derailment Kills 1

17e9742f0f9a5513da7d855fb7daa75803a29d0f.summary: Trump has signed an order restricting institutional and Wall Street investors from buying single-family homes. The order exempts build-to-rent properties that were originally developed as rental communities.
17e9742f0f9a5513da7d855fb7daa75803a29d0f.headline: Trump Signs Order Restricting Institutional Purchases of Single

6a363a38ca41c02530e18bcda1dca7d6d2cd8566.summary: Charles Bediako, who went undrafted in the 2023 NBA draft and has since played for three G League teams, has filed a lawsuit against the NCAA seeking reinstatement to join the Crimson Tide.
6a363a38ca41c02530e18bcda1dca7d6d2cd8566.headline: Charles Bediako Sues NCAA to Rejoin Crimson Tide

835029feadc6886b1e2db78d592ad6b56fea9ba8.headline: Amazon CEO Says Trump Tariffs Lead to Rising Prices as Stockpiles

67d8c28fe66d4f16facf4d18e3df1ee350d612e6.summary: Brooklyn Beckham has publicly accused his parents, David and Victoria Beckham, of prioritizing their public image over family and attempting to undermine his marriage. The allegations were made in a series of social media posts, bringing the family's internal conflict into the public eye.
67d8c28fe66d4f16facf4d18e3df1ee350d612e6.headline: Brooklyn Beckham Accuses Parents of Undermining His Marriage

fe990c6946d1df3d75b2f454b1fd9893cf230c9a.summary: Coby White led the Chicago Bulls to a 138-110 win over the Los Angeles Clippers. The Winnipeg Jets beat the St. Louis Blues 3-1 with two goals from Mark Scheifele. The Phoenix Suns topped the Philadelphia 76ers 116-110. The Houston Rockets rallied to defeat the San Antonio Spurs 111-106. The Los Angeles Lakers overcame the Denver Nuggets 115-107, and the Toronto Raptors beat the Golden State Warriors 145-127.

cb87251d0b43dfc028214d3e71bf2ab75fa26379.summary: Donald Trump declined to clarify his plans regarding a potential Greenland takeover, stating 'you'll find out' when questioned. He also did not reassure about his commitment to NATO's stability ahead of meetings with world leaders at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

3d21ef26be9827205f9b70677ec1238605da71ab.headline: NASA Astronaut Suni Williams Retires After 27 Years and Three ISS

3ca770aede47b3daa1bdf119dfcfc103996159ce.summary: Buster Posey has been selected for induction into the 2026 Baseball Hall of Fame. Other notable new candidates, including Jon Lester, Brett Gardner, Kyle Seager, and Ryan Zimmerman, were not chosen for induction this year.
3ca770aede47b3daa1bdf119dfcfc103996159ce.headline: Buster Posey Inducted Into 2026 Baseball Hall of Fame

dbf36c64055ff9bff1a3e77ecc534a03b7018ef7.summary: A UN report warns that the world is facing 'global water bankruptcy,' with overuse and pollution threatening water supplies for billions of people. The report calls for urgent action to address these issues to prevent further harm and potential system collapse.

The United States, their main ally, has urged the Kurdish forces to accept the offer and signaled an end to military support.

British Prime Minister Keir Starmer publicly rejected Trump's pressure regarding Greenland, issuing his strongest rebuke yet. Trump also threatened tariffs on several European nations in relation to the dispute.
3c0202a070818749bb8a76497b13115088b8fe6e.headline: Trump Calls for Greenland Talks

ff9f9e1525d38279891b40670825ec00982bb15d.summary: The US Supreme Court heard arguments on the Trump administration's effort to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook. Justices appeared skeptical of granting this authority, raising concerns about central bank independence. After the hearing, Cook's position appears secure, with the Court showing reluctance to support her removal.

3dafbcef4f8d55e8f0951d13be02dd90101a1be5.summary: Donald Trump announced he will not impose tariffs on eight European nations over their support for Greenland, citing a 'framework' deal reached with NATO. The tariffs, previously scheduled for February 1, have been canceled following a meeting with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte.
3dafbcef4f8d55e8f0951d13be02dd90101a1be5.headline: Trump Cancels Tariffs After Reaching Greenland Deal Framework With

2f4ede031d977b56264ac25803f986585df75364.summary: Israeli fire killed 11 Palestinians in Gaza on Wednesday, including three journalists and two 13-year-old boys, according to local medics. The journalists, who were documenting a new camp and working for a committee overseeing Egyptian aid, were killed when an Israeli air strike targeted their car near Al-Zahra. The incidents occurred amid ongoing violence despite a three-month-old ceasefire.

c18f32bd284f6ac0246ef362debf10266a4b3c9c.summary: Several countries have agreed to join President Trump's newly formed Board of Peace ahead of a signing ceremony scheduled for Thursday, while many others have not yet joined. The organization has drawn criticism from some who say it could undermine the United Nations.

06e3c7119a50273e69af12bda9aac919bdd71a94.summary: Seven Muslim-majority countries, along with Albania, Bahrain, Hungary, Morocco, and Israel, have joined Trump's 'Board of Peace,' which aims to support Gaza Strip reconstruction and promote a just and lasting peace. Pope Leo has been invited to join, according to a cardinal.
06e3c7119a50273e69af12bda9aac919bdd71a94.headline: Trumps Board of Peace Gains Support From Multiple Nations

8844123a69bceee8830e06f22aadca616690a588.summary: EU lawmakers have suspended the ratification of a US trade deal in response to Donald Trump's threats of tariffs over Greenland. Separately, the EU-Mercosur trade agreement has been referred to the Court of Justice of the EU to assess its compatibility with EU policy. An emergency summit is planned to discuss possible responses.

5868e36a65c27ae9ea74d6f63c3e92053c25bb9e.headline: Rifaat al Assad Former Syrian Vice President Dies at 88

86b067ed2d94d2bd93d9b3836ac5c70ad79ac191.summary: The US military has begun transferring Islamic State detainees from prisons in northeast Syria to Iraq. So far, 150 detainees have been moved, with up to 7,000 potentially to be relocated under the program. The transfer follows a recent jail break and advances by Syrian government forces into areas previously controlled by US partners.

6cfde93eb41a55c6878ee03e1d7e69cdb1783b2d.summary: A Japanese court sentenced Tetsuya Yamagami to life in prison for assassinating former prime minister Shinzo Abe in 2022 while Abe was giving a campaign speech in Nara. Yamagami admitted to the shooting and pleaded guilty. The case shocked Japan and drew widespread attention due to the rarity of gun violence in the country.
6cfde93eb41a55c6878ee03e1d7e69cdb1783b2d.headline: Shinzo Abes Assassin Sentenced to Life in Prison in Japan

e5fb99275b2eeecd08edeb81af91787e1055365a.summary: US envoy Steve Witkoff announced he will meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday to discuss land deals related to Ukraine.

07cfbfabc13db058b24d0844c0baede868e60f2c.summary: Manchester City's players will refund ticket costs for 374 supporters who traveled to Norway to watch the team's 3-1 Champions League defeat to Bodo/Glimt. The decision follows the team's unexpected loss, with Erling Haaland apologizing for the performance.
07cfbfabc13db058b24d0844c0baede868e60f2c.headline: Manchester City to Refund Fans After Loss to Bodo/Glimt

b79366d631c615d968af3e808e775efd2449b00f.summary: The New York Mets have acquired Luis Robert Jr. from the Chicago White Sox in exchange for Luisangel Acuña and pitching prospect Truman Pauley. Robert Jr. is a former Gold Glove winner and hit 38 home runs two seasons ago.
b79366d631c615d968af3e808e775efd2449b00f.headline: Mets Acquire Luis Robert Jr. From White Sox for Acuña and Pauley

5f287e83003f597dee0597bff8cbac1a04463349.summary: Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones have been voted into the Baseball Hall of Fame, recognizing their achievements as standout center fielders.
5f287e83003f597dee0597bff8cbac1a04463349.headline: Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones Elected to Baseball Hall of Fame

9f2516efb224ac4dec163ffcdb0406ff0274a5a9.summary: Buffalo Bills owner Terry Pegula stated that the team's coaching staff, led by Sean McDermott, advocated for drafting Keon Coleman. Pegula's comments come after the team's playoff loss and amid criticism of the organization's decision-making.
9f2516efb224ac4dec163ffcdb0406ff0274a5a9.headline: Bills Owner Says Coaching Staff Drove Keon Coleman Draft Decision

eca3c0d39e056b4571a0c797e1583c847e91fade.summary: Donald Trump has withdrawn his threat to impose tariffs related to Greenland after a meeting with NATO's Mark Rutte. The announcement led to gold prices reaching a new record high of over $4,800, following earlier market volatility driven by the tariff concerns.

572f472e2d7422eeac132190515dd8e7b32927de.summary: Trump stated at Davos that 'Canada lives because of the United States' in response to remarks from Carney that criticized U.S. policies. The exchange drew attention at the international event.
572f472e2d7422eeac132190515dd8e7b32927de.headline: Trump Says Canada Lives Because of the US After Carney Criticism

839c6af4dbbe9999e706c968464b178e8a9d94d7.summary: Prince Harry testified at London's High Court in his privacy lawsuit against the publisher of the Daily Mail, alleging unlawful information gathering and serious breaches of privacy. He stated the publisher made his wife Meghan's life 'an absolute misery.' Other public figures have joined the legal action. The case is ongoing.
839c6af4dbbe9999e706c968464b178e8a9d94d7.headline: Prince Harry Testifies in Ongoing Privacy Lawsuit Against Daily Mail

The agreement, reported on January 21, 2026, secures one of the Yankees' top hitters for the coming years.

The government plans to consult on the policy by summer. Kemi Badenoch and other Conservative figures urge Keir Starmer to implement a ban on social media for under-16s, citing concerns about children's mental health.
c80a2c2c0843c96df951c08239735dd791cc9f63.headline: Parliament Debates Raising Social Media Age Limit as Conservatives

Pegula made these comments at a press conference with Beane, clarifying responsibility for the draft pick.
931a15579a6ec3e61512a0220cce020b959a1ad0.headline: Pegula Says McDermotts Staff Responsible for Keon Coleman Draft Pick

f10f70ebbd6f20713ef3c2678f69231580f4bd50.headline: Welsh Rugby Union Criticized in Parliament Over Team Cut Plans

Pegula said he made the decision in the locker room following the defeat.
08009f6a14284d448d6a0e6ef1afed519a2de89f.headline: Bills Owner Terry Pegula Fires Coach Sean McDermott After Playoff Loss

9094c11b42d9eb1b0321f81c4b4f7cb22cbe1352.summary: Olivia Dean and Lola Young each received five nominations for the 2026 Brit Awards, leading the shortlist. Pulp earned their first nomination in 30 years, and Jarvis Cocker is set to return to the event.
