5b12c09784512323ad0f1fb21bceffe72a5c4c59.summary: Patrick Reed announced he is leaving LIV Golf and will spend the rest of 2026 on the European tour, with plans to return to the PGA Tour as early as August. Reed informed the PGA Tour of his intention after his LIV Golf contract expired. He is the second major champion to exit LIV Golf, following Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour the same week.
5b12c09784512323ad0f1fb21bceffe72a5c4c59.headline: Patrick Reed Leaves LIV Golf

b2a44d68ee243a3e22ccdf7f5c339e404b3cc66b.summary: Two federal officers who fatally shot ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis have been placed on administrative leave, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection. The shooting occurred during an immigration operation. The officers have continued work in another city, and the Trump administration is addressing the aftermath.
b2a44d68ee243a3e22ccdf7f5c339e404b3cc66b.headline: Federal Officers Placed on Leave After Fatal Shooting in Minneapolis

fde1e8a3ffe4e261270155f2c062ffd4c6a95d95.summary: The FBI, led by Kash Patel, searched the Fulton County election office in Atlanta as part of an investigation related to the 2020 US presidential election. The search addresses concerns linked to the Trump-Biden contest, following repeated false claims by Donald Trump about the election outcome.
fde1e8a3ffe4e261270155f2c062ffd4c6a95d95.headline: FBI Searches Atlanta Election Office Over 2020 Presidential Vote

68ea2bbdfd856214729231a5bf7a2eefcdb63a3e.summary: Milwaukee Bucks player Giannis Antetokounmpo has reportedly expressed readiness to be traded, and the Bucks are listening to aggressive offers from multiple teams ahead of the February 5 NBA trade deadline. While a trade could happen soon, sources indicate it remains more likely during the offseason.
68ea2bbdfd856214729231a5bf7a2eefcdb63a3e.headline: Bucks Considering Trade Offers for Giannis Antetokounmpo Before

d3fc6ec3821a9569d625df09b90d8c7f642ecbaa.summary: Tyson Fury has confirmed he will return to boxing to fight Arslanbek Makhmudov in the UK on April 11, ending his latest retirement. The bout was announced by Netflix.
d3fc6ec3821a9569d625df09b90d8c7f642ecbaa.headline: Tyson Fury to Fight Arslanbek Makhmudov in April Comeback

bd2e21e4cc636d0a7097033831b540aa0a8d2a57.summary: On January 28, 2026, Donald Trump warned Iran to agree to a nuclear deal soon or face a much stronger U.S. military response. He stated that a large U.S. naval force is heading to the region, while Iran said its armed forces are ready to respond to any aggression. Tensions between the U.S. and Iran have escalated as both sides issue threats.
bd2e21e4cc636d0a7097033831b540aa0a8d2a57.headline: Trump Warns Iran to Make Nuclear Deal as U.S. Armada Approaches

52f088db954347a401bd5291c990baa5742bd02f.summary: Rep. Ilhan Omar was sprayed with an unknown substance by a man during a town hall in Minneapolis on Tuesday. The man was tackled by security and arrested. Omar was not seriously injured. The incident occurred amid heightened tensions over recent federal immigration enforcement actions in the city.
52f088db954347a401bd5291c990baa5742bd02f.headline: Rep. Ilhan Omar Sprayed With Unknown Substance at Minneapolis Town

9ee45343933db6ae555938b8202df1901b495ad5.summary: Sarah Mullally has been officially confirmed as the archbishop of Canterbury, becoming the first woman to lead the Church of England. The confirmation ceremony took place at St Paul's Cathedral. Some African church leaders have expressed dismay at her appointment, while Mullally has pledged to address misogyny in the church.
9ee45343933db6ae555938b8202df1901b495ad5.headline: Sarah Mullally Confirmed as First Female Archbishop of Canterbury

cba5eb277baffdcdde712be5bd388b8bb174ef44.summary: Amazon is cutting about 16,000 corporate jobs in its second round of mass layoffs in three months, aiming to reduce bureaucracy. Affected employees will receive full pay and benefits for 90 days.
cba5eb277baffdcdde712be5bd388b8bb174ef44.headline: Amazon to Lay Off 16

e79ac42563bc297e7004be85db517ddd5bba869a.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent reaffirmed the U.S. strong dollar policy and dismissed speculation of government intervention in currency markets. Following his statements, the dollar rebounded after recent declines.
e79ac42563bc297e7004be85db517ddd5bba869a.headline: Dollar Rises After Bessent Rejects U.S. Currency Market Intervention

12f0f31faccfe0d34d44528279f3ec68805aec0a.summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer stated he discussed the Chagos agreement with Donald Trump amid concerns the US could withdraw support. Downing Street sources maintain the agreement is a 'done deal,' and US intelligence agencies continue to support it despite Trump's criticism.
12f0f31faccfe0d34d44528279f3ec68805aec0a.headline: UK Confirms Chagos Deal Remains in Place Despite Trump Criticism

32faab4f13253a8cf4e93dd316bae14b24487d87.summary: Several major banks have joined companies like BlackRock and BNY in pledging to match employee contributions for a specific cause, with financial firms making up most of the participating organizations.
32faab4f13253a8cf4e93dd316bae14b24487d87.headline: Major Banks Join Companies in Matching Employee Contributions

4a59dfc1eae881ffcac251c7228759a976b85447.summary: Lineups have been confirmed for the final round of the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League group stage, including Inter Milan vs Borussia Dortmund. Chelsea will play Napoli as both teams seek to advance in the competition.
4a59dfc1eae881ffcac251c7228759a976b85447.headline: Champions League Group Stage Concludes With Key Final Round Matches

43e7e2aa67d488e957eb0d9580f1f06e12382d80.summary: With the NBA trade deadline approaching on February 5, several teams are expected to focus on selling players, while the Mavericks are centering roster decisions around Flagg. Major trades from Los Angeles teams are unlikely, but some role players may be moved to strengthen lineups.
43e7e2aa67d488e957eb0d9580f1f06e12382d80.headline: NBA Teams Prepare for Trade Deadline as Mavericks Focus on Flagg

8239c20bb2884e609b13f43a78cd7ba35d33398d.summary: Hungarian prosecutors have filed charges seeking to fine Budapest Mayor Gergely Karácsony for urging public protests against the government in June. The charges aim to impose the fine without a trial, following large demonstrations in response to Karácsony's call.
8239c20bb2884e609b13f43a78cd7ba35d33398d.headline: Prosecutors Seek Fine Against Budapest Mayor Karácsony Over Protest

2d16c6fc3e4514a320939bc43809f041f8a391e7.summary: The New York Yankees have acquired right-handed reliever Angel Chivilli from the Colorado Rockies in exchange for minor league infielder T.J. Rumfield. To clear space on the roster, the Yankees designated outfielder Michael Siani for assignment. Chivilli appeared in 30 games for Colorado in 2024 with a 4.55 ERA.
2d16c6fc3e4514a320939bc43809f041f8a391e7.headline: Yankees Trade for Reliever Angel Chivilli

6bf6a5fff05994d046ff4af262d88e59fe945b57.summary: The FBI confirmed court-authorized activity at the Fulton County Election Hub and Operation Center. The Department of Justice recently filed a lawsuit against Fulton County seeking records related to the 2020 election. The FBI did not specify if its action is connected to the lawsuit.
6bf6a5fff05994d046ff4af262d88e59fe945b57.headline: FBI Conducts Court Authorized Activity at Fulton County Election

3a55f89436a2fc2f50af91848b56cef88b87bdf4.summary: Stocks reached a record high and the dollar stabilized as investors awaited the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision. Gold surpassed $5,300 for the first time, supported by a weaker dollar. Optimism over corporate earnings contributed to Wall Street's rebound following the recent Greenland crisis.
3a55f89436a2fc2f50af91848b56cef88b87bdf4.headline: Stocks Hit Record High and Gold Surges Ahead of Fed Rate Decision

99aa9051d4d2be5a8c752216492a7183c5929cad.summary: The S&P 500 index closed above 7,000 points for the first time, driven by investor optimism about artificial intelligence. This marks a new record high for the benchmark U.S. stock index.
99aa9051d4d2be5a8c752216492a7183c5929cad.headline: S&P 500 Closes Above 7

99a5f3397d6dc5f07fabe8a02c0097b24c12b44e.summary: New York Mayor Zohran Mamdani has proposed raising taxes on wealthy residents to address a $12 billion city budget deficit. Mamdani attributed the shortfall to fiscal mismanagement by former Mayor Eric Adams and ex-Governor Andrew Cuomo.
99a5f3397d6dc5f07fabe8a02c0097b24c12b44e.headline: Mayor Mamdani Proposes Tax Increases on Wealthy to Address Budget

4e191c1b7f8ec0de29e29f6ce0c4693bf0feafc6.summary: Nouri al-Maliki criticized Donald Trump's threat to withdraw US support for Iraq if al-Maliki returns to power, calling it 'blatant American interference' in Iraq's election.
4e191c1b7f8ec0de29e29f6ce0c4693bf0feafc6.headline: Al Maliki Condemns Trumps Threat to Withdraw US Support for Iraq

f5b98b914231f49b5340f94a25720e914d7e1f9d.summary: India has confirmed two cases of the Nipah virus in West Bengal over the past month. In response, airports across Asia have increased alert measures. The Nipah virus spreads from animals to humans, has a high fatality rate, and currently has no vaccine.
f5b98b914231f49b5340f94a25720e914d7e1f9d.headline: India Confirms Two Nipah Virus Cases

27d3a6c6b2c7eb4458fefb69131ab92332233822.summary: Ajit Pawar, the deputy chief minister of Maharashtra State, died in a charter jet crash while landing. Authorities in India are investigating the cause of the accident.
27d3a6c6b2c7eb4458fefb69131ab92332233822.headline: Ajit Pawar Dies in Maharashtra Plane Crash

d7d739fdf68e3e4b4af3efc8a4174fd013235013.summary: A fire broke out at a luxury hotel in Courchevel in the French Alps, leading to the evacuation of nearly 300 people. No injuries were reported.
d7d739fdf68e3e4b4af3efc8a4174fd013235013.headline: Fire at French Alps Hotel Prompts Evacuation of Nearly 300 People

f79018a9cd857fcc51cba1a2843452d3a6d49b20.summary: NASA scientists have launched the NURTURE airborne mission to study severe winter storms. The international campaign uses advanced remote sensing instruments to collect data and improve understanding of storm formation and behavior.
f79018a9cd857fcc51cba1a2843452d3a6d49b20.headline: NASA Launches NURTURE Mission to Study Severe Winter Storms

452263d4bdb28a31f886adb6f2eb0375975f9af3.summary: The James Webb Space Telescope has confirmed the existence of a bright galaxy that formed 280 million years after the Big Bang, advancing observations of the early universe.
452263d4bdb28a31f886adb6f2eb0375975f9af3.headline: James Webb Telescope Confirms Bright Galaxy From Early Universe

b4f19a6a1c859f1cae97cf0de713a8efcf338d78.summary: Astronomers using NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory and other tools have discovered a galaxy cluster that began forming about a billion years after the big bang, one to two billion years earlier than previously believed. The finding provides new insight into the early formation of large cosmic structures.
b4f19a6a1c859f1cae97cf0de713a8efcf338d78.headline: Astronomers Find Earliest Known Galaxy Cluster Formation

473d1eeeaa904bd00233c05fd6e77f394724ac2c.summary: Bill Belichick was not elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility for the 2026 class. The decision drew criticism from Tom Brady and Robert Kraft, who publicly supported Belichick. The Hall of Fame released a statement addressing rumors about the voting process and said it would act if selection bylaws were violated.
473d1eeeaa904bd00233c05fd6e77f394724ac2c.headline: Belichick Misses Hall of Fame in First Year

74284c1befe588f0b3d817969ef1c64ed8bc66ba.summary: Two US federal agents involved in the fatal shooting of intensive care nurse Alex Pretti during an immigration raid in Minneapolis have been placed on administrative leave, according to a US Customs and Border Protection spokesperson. The incident has led to ongoing public outrage and debate over immigration law enforcement.
74284c1befe588f0b3d817969ef1c64ed8bc66ba.headline: Two Federal Agents Placed on Leave After Fatal Minneapolis Shooting

a25cbb2ded9526f6cfe37216764b815355e6a4c0.summary: China has executed 11 people linked to Myanmar-based criminal gangs, including key members of the Ming family group involved in scam operations, according to state media. The executions are part of efforts to combat cross-border fraud and scam centres operating from Myanmar.
a25cbb2ded9526f6cfe37216764b815355e6a4c0.headline: China Executes 11 Linked to Myanmar Based Scam Gangs

bdace6bcc52e1271efbf8ace50d498f710e35c56.summary: The Cleveland Browns have hired Todd Monken, previously the Baltimore Ravens offensive coordinator, as their new head coach, replacing Kevin Stefanski. Monken becomes the Browns' 11th head coach since 1999, as NFL teams continue to fill head coaching vacancies after the regular season.
bdace6bcc52e1271efbf8ace50d498f710e35c56.headline: Browns Hire Todd Monken as New Head Coach

47d897ef553129a7988b171a961a103785a31d00.summary: The FBI has executed a search warrant at Fulton County's Elections Hub and Operations Center in Atlanta, seizing original 2020 voting records as part of an investigation into claims of vote fraud related to the 2020 presidential election.
47d897ef553129a7988b171a961a103785a31d00.headline: FBI Seizes 2020 Voting Records in Atlanta Election Office Search

b3f9867e55a0c493b148e81a14f3ad4a65083751.summary: A county in Virginia has opposed the sale of a warehouse owned by Jim Pattison Developments to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). The building's potential use by ICE has sparked local controversy.
b3f9867e55a0c493b148e81a14f3ad4a65083751.headline: Virginia County Opposes Sale of Warehouse to ICE

f05fb4034a3c89c90eec157d9717e5c9541e1c14.summary: Senegal manager Pape Thiaw has been banned for five games and fined by CAF following chaotic incidents during the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco.
f05fb4034a3c89c90eec157d9717e5c9541e1c14.headline: Senegal Manager Pape Thiaw Banned and Fined After Cup of Nations Final

dbd6bca7efa88e82e0e6f2723360739919065edf.summary: Patrick Reed has announced he is leaving LIV Golf and will return to the PGA Tour. The PGA Tour will allow Reed to compete starting in August 2026.
dbd6bca7efa88e82e0e6f2723360739919065edf.headline: Patrick Reed to Rejoin PGA Tour in August 2026 After Leaving LIV

d416e726ac294dc48cfb0490ccf4fd67581bd621.summary: LeBron James was emotional during a video tribute as he returned to Cleveland, where the Cavaliers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 129-99. James stated he has not decided on his future, but acknowledged that the game could have been his last in Cleveland.
d416e726ac294dc48cfb0490ccf4fd67581bd621.headline: Cavaliers Defeat Lakers as LeBron James Faces Potential Final

3b13cebd53974e5d6a445ebad579004c0d0d08d8.summary: Gervonta Davis was arrested in Miami on charges of battery, false imprisonment, and attempted kidnapping following a US Marshals surveillance operation. The arrest comes after a lawsuit and the cancellation of his bout with Jake Paul.
3b13cebd53974e5d6a445ebad579004c0d0d08d8.headline: Gervonta Davis Arrested in Miami on Multiple Charges

376ae2d5df3929fd15c010b72d6566de1eebe0e1.summary: The FBI executed a search warrant at the Fulton County, Georgia, election office for records related to the 2020 election. The Department of Justice previously announced a lawsuit against the county for similar records. The FBI did not provide further details about the investigation.
376ae2d5df3929fd15c010b72d6566de1eebe0e1.headline: FBI Searches Fulton County Election Office for 2020 Records

fe4a1556508c7a7ecdcedf00636c961b3bc34443.summary: The Toronto Raptors lost to the New York Knicks 119-92, extending their losing streak against the Knicks. Brandon Ingram commented on the team's need to improve their performance in closing out games.
fe4a1556508c7a7ecdcedf00636c961b3bc34443.headline: Raptors Fall to Knicks 119 92

39317c6f17c262dbaae2c83b3c565d4c6674716c.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced that the company will discontinue production of its Model S and Model X electric vehicles in the next quarter, marking a shift away from its premium sedan and SUV lines.
39317c6f17c262dbaae2c83b3c565d4c6674716c.headline: Tesla to End Production of Model S and Model X Next Quarter

1a38b9326981e4376eab4432bb0e1e43cebaf6b5.summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer met with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing, marking the first UK leader's visit to China in eight years. The meeting signaled a reset in China-UK relations, with both sides expressing interest in strengthening economic cooperation.
1a38b9326981e4376eab4432bb0e1e43cebaf6b5.headline: Starmer and Xi Meet in Beijing to Renew China UK Economic Ties

dedde9555359c7b056fdf56d1abce2c3d0c35462.summary: Senate Democrats, led by Chuck Schumer, have called for immigration reforms, including a mask ban for federal agents, to be included in Department of Homeland Security funding legislation. The move has led to a standoff with Republicans, raising the risk of a partial government shutdown in the coming days.
dedde9555359c7b056fdf56d1abce2c3d0c35462.headline: Senate Democrats Tie Immigration Reforms to DHS Funding Amid Standoff

b5ffed7b17a367cb3abbd031ef4e28f1977015d7.summary: Champions League Matchday 8 saw all 36 teams play at once, providing significant drama and standout performances. Various awards highlighted notable moments, including recognition for Anatoliy Trubin, Joao Pedro, and Antonio Conte. The tournament continues after an eventful round.
b5ffed7b17a367cb3abbd031ef4e28f1977015d7.headline: Champions League Matchday 8 Features Dramatic Moments and Awards

349d1ed85634ad687eaee5ff8319a72a6f6458e2.summary: Residents in Niamey, Niger, reported heavy gunfire and explosions near the city's international airport on Thursday. The cause of the incident has not been confirmed, and there are no immediate reports of casualties or official statements from authorities.
349d1ed85634ad687eaee5ff8319a72a6f6458e2.headline: Gunfire and Explosions Reported Near Niamey Airport in Niger

15f4bc96b02859a507189c9178f5d16d06d5660e.summary: Three newly released videos show Alex Pretti, a Minneapolis ICU nurse, being tackled by federal agents during a confrontation in Minneapolis 11 days before his death. The videos, released on Wednesday, provide additional context to the events leading up to Pretti's death.
15f4bc96b02859a507189c9178f5d16d06d5660e.headline: Videos Show Alex Pretti Confronted by Federal Agents Before Death

7f47cc45ca94b1c6bdc947fc90f34dd1b87195a3.summary: Toyota Motor reported record sales of 10.5 million vehicles in 2025, maintaining its position as the world's top-selling automaker.
7f47cc45ca94b1c6bdc947fc90f34dd1b87195a3.headline: Toyota Remains Top Selling Automaker With Record 2025 Sales

88a7c08047c732d9986424c93a806800b560020e.summary: A Hall of Fame voter explained his decision not to vote for Bill Belichick, despite believing Belichick deserves induction. The voter also shared a note from Tom Brady supporting Belichick. Additionally, voters discussed their reasoning for not selecting Eli Manning. The Hall of Fame voting outcomes remain unchanged.
88a7c08047c732d9986424c93a806800b560020e.headline: Hall of Fame Voter Explains Belichick and Manning Ballot Decisions

73c2d57be213b98d86408cf106cb753d79b7e85c.summary: A small plane crashed in Norte de Santander province, Colombia, killing all 15 people on board, including a member of congress, according to authorities.
73c2d57be213b98d86408cf106cb753d79b7e85c.headline: Plane Crash in Colombia Kills 15

3b173a6fdb68dd80bbb27637a515d2ceb8256782.summary: The US and Denmark have begun high-level talks regarding Greenland's future. Danish Foreign Minister Lars Lokke Rasmussen described the discussions as constructive and aimed at addressing concerns raised by Donald Trump.
3b173a6fdb68dd80bbb27637a515d2ceb8256782.headline: US and Denmark Hold Talks on Greenlands Future

626c4e2ab2b1f8338fb2c9df07805fa8b0d93c89.summary: The Federal Reserve has kept its key interest rate unchanged, citing an improved economic outlook but ongoing concerns about elevated inflation. This follows three previous rate cuts aimed at supporting the job market.
626c4e2ab2b1f8338fb2c9df07805fa8b0d93c89.headline: Federal Reserve Leaves Key Interest Rate Unchanged Amid Inflation

0bde6767e86c3ea331fb9e2b9da769d6287c91cf.summary: The Jakarta Composite Index fell 10% after MSCI warned about the investability of Indonesian stocks. Goldman Sachs and UBS downgraded their ratings for Indonesian stocks, contributing to continued declines as investors reacted to concerns over possible reclassification.
0bde6767e86c3ea331fb9e2b9da769d6287c91cf.headline: Jakarta Composite Index Drops 10% After MSCI Investability Warning

a54387f8bc2442503594f793fcb0479a7e52675a.summary: Bill Belichick was not selected for induction into the Hall of Fame, despite his record-setting coaching career. The decision has drawn criticism of the Hall of Fame committee and its selection process.
a54387f8bc2442503594f793fcb0479a7e52675a.headline: Bill Belichick Not Inducted Into Hall of Fame

1ee7896ea7c01d2aa2f4bb30fba0b607ed46979d.summary: The Carlyle Group has agreed to purchase most of Lukoil's foreign assets following increased sanctions pressure on the Russian company.
1ee7896ea7c01d2aa2f4bb30fba0b607ed46979d.headline: Carlyle Group to Acquire Majority of Lukoils Foreign Assets

8b3e4001f61bebd13645041475d075b069269999.summary: Trump has warned Iran that if it does not agree to a nuclear deal soon, any future U.S. attack will be 'far worse.' He stated that 'time is running out' for talks, urging Iran to negotiate.
8b3e4001f61bebd13645041475d075b069269999.headline: Trump Warns Iran of Harsher Response Without Nuclear Deal

f88651327ae01c7f5f0d0af10e4fe2d69d93c7f3.summary: Nvidia, Microsoft, and Amazon are reportedly in discussions to invest up to $60 billion in OpenAI, according to The Information. Talks are ongoing and no final agreement has been announced.
f88651327ae01c7f5f0d0af10e4fe2d69d93c7f3.headline: Nvidia Microsoft and Amazon Reportedly Discuss $60 Billion OpenAI

999780a4efd7bbf8f15da8c9567b05c21ee6fe62.summary: During a town hall in Minneapolis, Rep. Ilhan Omar was attacked by a man who sprayed her with an unknown liquid. Security subdued the man, and the incident was contained at the event.
999780a4efd7bbf8f15da8c9567b05c21ee6fe62.headline: Rep. Ilhan Omar Attacked With Unknown Liquid at Minneapolis Town Hall

d4c2eae8cb30ae98bc2692947f26929d001b8b26.summary: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope and Chandra X-ray Observatory captured a detailed image of Pismis 24, a young star cluster in the Lobster Nebula about 5,500 light-years away. The combined data highlight high-energy activity among the cluster's active stars.
d4c2eae8cb30ae98bc2692947f26929d001b8b26.headline: Webb and Chandra Capture Detailed Image of Pismis 24 Star Cluster

faf0d5eaba916c0ca9b2189860eac2207d0c14c3.summary: Donald Trump said Vladimir Putin agreed to pause strikes on Ukraine's energy infrastructure for one week after Trump appealed to him due to extreme cold in Kyiv. No ceasefire or pause has been confirmed by Russian or Ukrainian officials.
faf0d5eaba916c0ca9b2189860eac2207d0c14c3.headline: Trump Says Putin Agreed to One Week Pause on Ukraine Strikes

f38114744f6e7f14aae1594071afb8d3652fad3f.summary: The European Union has officially designated Iran's Revolutionary Guard as a terrorist organization, citing Tehran's deadly crackdown on protesters. The decision, confirmed by EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas, aligns the EU with similar actions taken by the United States and Canada.
f38114744f6e7f14aae1594071afb8d3652fad3f.headline: EU Designates Irans Revolutionary Guard as Terrorist Organization

9721ec7e6247ed18f3df182c7c7164932855ba61.summary: Multiple teams, including the Timberwolves, Warriors, Magic, and Knicks, are reportedly interested in trading for Giannis Antetokounmpo ahead of the 2026 NBA trade deadline. No trade has been completed, but discussions and offers are ongoing, with speculation that a deal may be more likely in the summer.
9721ec7e6247ed18f3df182c7c7164932855ba61.headline: Several Teams Pursue Giannis Antetokounmpo Ahead of Trade Deadline

4933da38d5d186404540c67726042ba9dc45cae0.summary: LeBron James became emotional during a tribute video at the Los Angeles Lakers' game against the Cleveland Cavaliers. The Cavaliers honored James with highlights from his 2007 playoff performance. After the game, James said he has not decided on his future, but the game could have been his last in Cleveland.
4933da38d5d186404540c67726042ba9dc45cae0.headline: LeBron James Emotional During Tribute at Cavaliers Game

dd370fb5c7cbb63132d3cda58e364d96f74eeaa7.summary: Senate Democrats unanimously blocked a package of six funding bills, including a Department of Homeland Security funding measure, ahead of the government shutdown deadline.
dd370fb5c7cbb63132d3cda58e364d96f74eeaa7.headline: Senate Democrats Block DHS Funding Bills Before Shutdown Deadline

d5b96d5bbeb270bd1a6e6bae5868114b515ce597.summary: Senegal and Morocco have been fined over $1 million and several players banned after disorder during the Africa Cup of Nations final. Senegal manager Pape Thiaw received a five-game ban. FIFA and Africa's soccer body condemned the incidents and imposed the penalties.
d5b96d5bbeb270bd1a6e6bae5868114b515ce597.headline: Senegal Morocco Fined Over $1 Million After Chaotic Africa Cup Final

604c9f9fc2fd2fce0f1b0a18efb3c7c224a51b0f.summary: Crystal Dunn announced her retirement from soccer at age 33, ending a 12-year professional career with the United States women's national team and in the NWSL. Dunn said she achieved nearly everything she dreamed of in the sport.
604c9f9fc2fd2fce0f1b0a18efb3c7c224a51b0f.headline: Crystal Dunn Retires From Soccer After 12 Year Career

b3728309910ae394a74ed697016805f10f139bc5.summary: Donald Trump has ordered the immediate reopening of commercial airspace over Venezuela, allowing direct flights from the US. This follows recent US military action that removed Nicolás Maduro from power. Major oil companies are assessing potential operations in Venezuela.
b3728309910ae394a74ed697016805f10f139bc5.headline: US Reopens Airspace to Venezuela After Maduro Removed

086e60b8ab1baf2c617a246807f6d1670f651bdd.summary: Apple has acquired Israeli audio AI startup Q.ai, a company known for developing technology that analyzes facial expressions. Q.ai was led by Aviad Maizels, who previously sold PrimeSense to Apple in 2013.
086e60b8ab1baf2c617a246807f6d1670f651bdd.headline: Apple Acquires Israeli Audio AI Startup Q.ai

0efd34802d915ad109c73d3ce4a12fd953157820.summary: The U.S. trade deficit widened in November by the largest margin in nearly 34 years, nearly doubling as the gap with the European Union increased significantly. Meanwhile, weekly jobless claims in the U.S. fell.
0efd34802d915ad109c73d3ce4a12fd953157820.headline: U.S. Trade Deficit Widens Sharply in November as EU Gap Grows

eb4868591f7ce2b668b9535d6ffe547f776bf64d.summary: Aston Martin's first car designed under Adrian Newey debuted during pre-season testing, drawing significant attention from observers.
eb4868591f7ce2b668b9535d6ffe547f776bf64d.headline: Aston Martin Unveils First Adrian Newey Designed Car in Testing

514a53ea826a95c216bdb746e68881fbdaf410cb.summary: A Senate funding bill failed to pass as Trump and Democrats work to prevent a government shutdown. Democrats are pushing for changes to federal immigration agency operations following the shooting deaths of two U.S. citizens.
514a53ea826a95c216bdb746e68881fbdaf410cb.headline: Senate Funding Bill Fails as Trump

a234cab9d494246f5a5304ff17167ff0a811c5b8.summary: Sen. Susan Collins announced that ICE has ended its enhanced immigration enforcement activities in Maine. Normal operations by ICE and Customs and Border Protection will continue. The decision follows protests in Portland over immigration enforcement.

d92430d31f27a2e18426468f7f01d86a164c62c7.summary: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen confirmed he had surgery on his right foot for a broken fifth metatarsal. Allen, seen in a walking boot, said he expects to be fully healthy for the start of spring practices.

8e170bb442d05d9ab5f7d2bbefef9bd6f4fe46f6.summary: Yankees general manager Brian Cashman announced Cody Bellinger has re-signed with the team and stated confidence in the current roster's championship potential. The Yankees, eliminated in the ALDS last season, will have a roster similar to last year, with additions including a trade for Chivilli.
8e170bb442d05d9ab5f7d2bbefef9bd6f4fe46f6.headline: Yankees Re Sign Bellinger and Add Chivilli

ebf2125aaba54beabbd6143ee9c410845f4373e4.summary: Crystal Palace have agreed a deal in principle worth around £50m to sign Wolves striker Jorgen Strand Larsen, but the transfer remains uncertain as Palace indicate they may withdraw from the agreement.
ebf2125aaba54beabbd6143ee9c410845f4373e4.headline: Crystal Palaces £50m Deal for Jorgen Strand Larsen Uncertain

27b1a784ef8a40d11472d9b3b5a80c591346d113.summary: Tom Brady criticized the Pro Football Hall of Fame voting committee for not selecting Bill Belichick, calling the decision 'completely ridiculous.' The Hall of Fame's decision has drawn criticism from fans and former players.
27b1a784ef8a40d11472d9b3b5a80c591346d113.headline: Tom Brady Criticizes Bill Belichicks Hall of Fame Snub

db47c37d7d46926d4e0eabb0a9bbd824e0dbc333.summary: Oil prices increased by over 2% as Trump considers targeted military strikes on Iranian security forces and leaders. Iran, facing recent airstrikes and ongoing unrest, has warned it will retaliate strongly if attacked by the United States.

7ba8d21b1600ba22b08ccf54d6eb39f8a61f428d.summary: Bill Belichick was not selected for the Pro Football Hall of Fame for a second consecutive year. At least one Hall of Fame voter publicly explained their decision not to include Belichick among their top choices. The Hall of Fame released a statement saying it will take action if any selection bylaws were violated during the voting process.
7ba8d21b1600ba22b08ccf54d6eb39f8a61f428d.headline: Bill Belichick Misses Hall of Fame Again

503916214843738daefea96822a34949a2097a52.summary: The Colorado Avalanche will wear Quebec Nordiques jerseys on Thursday night when they play the Montreal Canadiens at the Bell Centre.

b9b44260823c91ceb8393c9b9791c47ab9c456e8.summary: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) will conduct live-fire military exercises in the Strait of Hormuz, according to reports from Al Arabiya English and Reuters.

14056c9c0ae0b31c02133d0a79182600598215b7.summary: Israel handed over the bodies of 15 unidentified Palestinians on Thursday as part of the final exchange of prisoners and detainees with Hamas. Palestinians are still waiting for the Red Cross to facilitate the transfer of the bodies in Khan Younis or Gaza City.
14056c9c0ae0b31c02133d0a79182600598215b7.headline: Israel Hands Over 15 Palestinian Bodies in Final Exchange With Hamas

4e1c7449029b5d55c1d115dca62650126c331088.summary: The US federal transportation regulator has launched an investigation after a Waymo self-driving vehicle struck a child near an elementary school in Santa Monica, California. The child sustained minor injuries in the incident.

259d928461b129ce4962f0b4c0d50bd199c3731b.summary: Prosecutors report that Mark Anderson falsely claimed to be an FBI agent with a court order to release Luigi Mangione, who is detained in Brooklyn on charges of killing UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

313f13a7b477322e3c26544e9dad7f8a7317c111.summary: Israeli and Saudi officials visited Washington to discuss potential U.S. military strikes on Iran, according to sources. The talks come as U.S. officials consider options in response to regional tensions.
313f13a7b477322e3c26544e9dad7f8a7317c111.headline: Israeli and Saudi Officials Discuss Possible U.S. Strikes on Iran in

899225b6d053211222dc62ee8122c228e060a4db.summary: Donald Trump announced he will reveal his nominee for Federal Reserve chair next week. Prediction markets suggest a Wall Street veteran is likely to be chosen.
899225b6d053211222dc62ee8122c228e060a4db.headline: Trump to Announce Federal Reserve Chair Nominee Next Week

3f27e4739730c5c7350f7801c22b938ecd002481.summary: Russia has announced it is prepared to evacuate its staff from Iran's Bushehr nuclear plant if needed, according to multiple news sources. No evacuation has occurred yet.
3f27e4739730c5c7350f7801c22b938ecd002481.headline: Russia Prepared to Evacuate Staff From Irans Bushehr Nuclear Plant

c78680d9b233b328d6e5d019e71480c9714ddc1d.summary: The Albanese government awarded contracts to MTC, Australia's main immigration detention contractor, despite allegations of gross negligence related to its involvement with US immigration authorities. Palantir and Deloitte also received government contracts.

c6bd2f326f45a442dbb948a5b4deac00fd38b834.summary: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope has released a detailed image of the Helix Nebula, showing comet-like knots, strong stellar winds, and layers of gas shed by a dying star. The image reveals the structure of the gas and the transition between hot and cooler regions, offering insights into the final stages of a star's life.
c6bd2f326f45a442dbb948a5b4deac00fd38b834.headline: James Webb Telescope Captures Detailed Image of Helix Nebula

09fc2f61c854d753e8b8e5b72b5f9f95ccfa8b05.summary: Two U.S. Democratic Representatives visited a five-year-old Ecuadorian boy and his father at a Texas federal detention center, following public anger over the boy's detention in Minneapolis related to immigration enforcement.
09fc2f61c854d753e8b8e5b72b5f9f95ccfa8b05.headline: Democratic Representatives Visit Detained 5 Year Old and Father in

fac8597bf0a5e6842e2a1bade6dff636dcc055b5.summary: A documentary about Melania Trump premiered in Washington, DC this week, drawing significant attention and some backlash. The film received prominent promotion linked to the presidential campaign.
fac8597bf0a5e6842e2a1bade6dff636dcc055b5.headline: Melania Trump Documentary Premieres in DC Amid Backlash

df68e175469e774bbf16a4d32cfa67c5eb44cc1f.summary: Ian Cunningham, previously the Chicago Bears' assistant general manager, has been hired as the Atlanta Falcons' new general manager. Cunningham will report directly to team president of football Matt Ryan as part of the Falcons' restructured leadership.

ba29e7c6acda82fd037b6bdbc124e9cd0cf41878.summary: Donald Trump signed an executive order declaring a national emergency over Cuba and authorizing tariffs on countries that supply oil to Cuba. The White House cited Cuba's ties to hostile powers as justification. The order aims to increase pressure on Havana by targeting its oil imports.

47e2c56da9037899b1f95028b41aa33f4d3a291e.summary: Democrats and the White House have reached a tentative deal to avert a partial US government shutdown by advancing a package of spending bills. The agreement includes temporarily funding the Department of Homeland Security separately while discussions continue on immigration enforcement measures. The deal is intended to prevent a shutdown that was set to begin on Saturday.
47e2c56da9037899b1f95028b41aa33f4d3a291e.headline: Deal Reached to Avert US Government Shutdown and Fund Homeland

d707fa547145b43c518bcb4c8809f0db5e2426a4.summary: Panama's top court has ruled the concession allowing Hong Kong tycoon Li's company to operate Panama Canal ports unconstitutional, ending CK Hutchison's role as operator. The 2026 decision follows legal challenges and comes amid US efforts to increase influence over the canal.
d707fa547145b43c518bcb4c8809f0db5e2426a4.headline: Panama Court Ends Hong Kong Firms Canal Port Concession

1a125e167f741b6b2f1cca1f67bb7473e598d45d.summary: Donald Trump said Vladimir Putin agreed to pause strikes on Kyiv and Ukraine's energy infrastructure for one week during extreme cold, following Trump's personal request. However, no ceasefire has been confirmed by Moscow or Kyiv. Ukraine's Air Force reported ongoing attacks near the front line overnight.
1a125e167f741b6b2f1cca1f67bb7473e598d45d.headline: Trump Says Putin Agreed to One Week Pause on Ukraine Strikes Amid

fa837995f370c586e7f217cd658274f564361973.summary: Patrick Kane became the highest-scoring U.S.-born player in NHL history by recording his 1,375th point during the Detroit Red Wings' 4-3 shootout loss to the Washington Capitals. Kane surpassed Mike Modano's previous record with an assist in the second period.
fa837995f370c586e7f217cd658274f564361973.headline: Patrick Kane Sets NHL Record for Most Points by U.S. Born Player

ae510185b6ee6bd7678ecde6daf0a78ec3e22dcd.summary: Donald Trump filed a $10 billion lawsuit against the IRS and Treasury Department, alleging they failed to prevent the unauthorized disclosure of his tax returns to media outlets in 2019 and 2020. The lawsuit also names his two sons and the Trump Organization as plaintiffs.
ae510185b6ee6bd7678ecde6daf0a78ec3e22dcd.headline: Trump Sues IRS and Treasury for $10 Billion Over Tax Return Leak

7e862549632e9dd15354fcdbefb8a3bcfb2f9cbb.summary: Dallas Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg scored 49 points, setting an NBA record for points by a teenager and breaking the Mavericks' rookie scoring record during a 123-121 loss to the Charlotte Hornets. The game also featured the retirement of Mark Aguirre's jersey at halftime.
7e862549632e9dd15354fcdbefb8a3bcfb2f9cbb.headline: Cooper Flagg Sets NBA Teen Scoring Record With 49 Points in Mavericks

49a80d80452d4742895151fe1c5314112a7241cd.summary: Mark Anderson allegedly impersonated an FBI agent and attempted to secure the release of Luigi Mangione from the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn by presenting purported court documents. Mangione remains in custody on charges related to the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, according to authorities and federal prosecutors.
49a80d80452d4742895151fe1c5314112a7241cd.headline: Man Accused of Impersonating FBI Agent in Attempt to Free Jail Inmate

58c1d53269fc660ffe65f888146eb8815ef515d8.summary: The Philadelphia Eagles have hired Sean Mannion, previously the Green Bay Packers quarterbacks coach, as their new offensive coordinator. Nick Sirianni selected Mannion to lead the team's offense.
58c1d53269fc660ffe65f888146eb8815ef515d8.headline: Eagles Hire Sean Mannion as Offensive Coordinator

be7eb8d88ba79a1b48e3fa981ee36cc5568ea0b2.summary: The US has lifted some sanctions on Venezuela to facilitate oil sales. Venezuela's interim President Delcy Rodriguez has signed a reform bill allowing increased foreign access to the country's oil industry.
be7eb8d88ba79a1b48e3fa981ee36cc5568ea0b2.headline: US Eases Venezuela Sanctions as Oil Industry Opens to Foreign Access

85e20aad9f9a4a115d9b6a0a2df6da73fc0a28b7.summary: Carlos Alcaraz overcame cramps and a tough challenge from Alexander Zverev to win a five-set semi-final at the Australian Open, securing his place in the final after a match lasting five hours and 27 minutes.
85e20aad9f9a4a115d9b6a0a2df6da73fc0a28b7.headline: Carlos Alcaraz Defeats Zverev in Five Set Battle to Reach Australian

4c9e6d7e3774006876c13d32cc25d43c28d8df4d.summary: The Syrian Kurdish-led SDF has agreed to a ceasefire and a phased integration deal with the government after losing significant territory to government forces in recent weeks.
4c9e6d7e3774006876c13d32cc25d43c28d8df4d.headline: Syrian Kurdish Led SDF Reaches Ceasefire and Integration Deal

36440db56f572db456c2e7295de1649cc53a81dc.summary: The CEO of the Indonesia Stock Exchange has resigned following an $84 billion market selloff triggered by MSCI's warning of a possible downgrade to 'frontier' market status. The government has announced new measures to improve market liquidity in response to the situation.
36440db56f572db456c2e7295de1649cc53a81dc.headline: Indonesia Stock Exchange CEO Resigns After Major Market Selloff

d6d63711c6bef5277a9f8ff5577e2a2e2362b15e.summary: Bill Belichick was not selected for this year's Pro Football Hall of Fame class, with voters citing their reasons for omitting him from their ballots. The voting process is under investigation following scrutiny over the results. The official Hall of Fame class will be announced on February 5.
d6d63711c6bef5277a9f8ff5577e2a2e2362b15e.headline: Bill Belichick Not Selected for Hall of Fame

6ae99126c35472c30968b16369addce91e8c838d.summary: Justin Rose leads the Farmers Insurance Open after shooting a 10-under-par 62 on the North Course at Torrey Pines. Brooks Koepka returned to the PGA Tour for the first time since March 2022, finishing with an opening round of 73.
6ae99126c35472c30968b16369addce91e8c838d.headline: Justin Rose Leads Farmers Insurance Open

14c7de40fd2e1fe613959374a9fbff443e9c8b81.summary: Apple reported a 16% annual increase in revenue for its fiscal first quarter, surpassing expectations. The growth was driven by strong iPhone demand in Asia, while sales of wearables and Mac computers declined.
14c7de40fd2e1fe613959374a9fbff443e9c8b81.headline: Apple Revenue Rises 16% on Strong iPhone Demand in Asia

971f6cea21fef881eb1ce7489f16cbfc634925cb.summary: Donald Trump said he plans to talk to Iran as the US increases its military presence in the Middle East. The Pentagon is preparing for possible action, but Trump stated he is seeking communication with Iran's leadership.
971f6cea21fef881eb1ce7489f16cbfc634925cb.headline: Trump Plans Talks With Iran Amid US Military Build Up

1d705fe51f2331de0418e8953b216fb2e8f9eee0.summary: Trump is considering military strikes against Iran, according to sources. The president has deployed military forces to the region, while Iran warns it will retaliate if attacked. Iran has recently faced airstrikes and internal unrest.
1d705fe51f2331de0418e8953b216fb2e8f9eee0.headline: Trump Considers Military Strikes Against Iran Amid Rising Tensions

86e8601ce458518c212697fd3ef2960210808649.summary: Maj James Hook and Col Samantha Shepherd have been charged with offences related to their handling of a sexual assault case involving Gunner Beck, a 19-year-old soldier who died by suicide at Larkhill camp in Wiltshire in 2021.
86e8601ce458518c212697fd3ef2960210808649.headline: Two Army Officers Charged Over Handling of Soldiers Sexual Assault

bbdc77bf2213c7afa64d4d0b425a5475017af1ff.summary: Kon Knueppel led the Hornets to their fifth consecutive win over the Mavericks, making key plays late in the game. Cooper Flagg scored 49 points, setting an NBA record for a teenager, but the Mavericks lost to the Hornets.
bbdc77bf2213c7afa64d4d0b425a5475017af1ff.headline: Hornets Defeat Mavericks Despite Flaggs Record 49 Points

f6ad1742cea2a8157f4dd9c9117aaf542c38b993.summary: Israel handed over the bodies of 15 unidentified Palestinians to Hamas on Thursday, completing the final exchange of prisoners and detainees between the two sides.
f6ad1742cea2a8157f4dd9c9117aaf542c38b993.headline: Israel Completes Final Exchange With Hamas

d6f49b5fda82ca74a60fb107e5c44ae37fb399a8.summary: The European Union has officially designated Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) as a terrorist organization in response to the group's crackdown on protesters. The move aligns the EU with similar actions taken by the United States and Canada.
d6f49b5fda82ca74a60fb107e5c44ae37fb399a8.headline: EU Designates Irans Revolutionary Guard as Terrorist Organization

3b5c5bdf83190c79c0084de8d9105f377c47d3ae.headline: Tom Homan Plans to Reduce Federal Agent Presence in Minneapolis

d591654a87215576677f9007ed72d86bf73d9a46.headline: Amazon in Talks to Invest Up to $50 Billion in OpenAI

32e9390a8b04db04656e26dc2f221b9c207d09d5.summary: Iran's foreign minister Abbas Araghchi is set to visit Ankara for talks as Turkey mediates to prevent a US attack. Iran has stressed its defensive readiness but faces pressure to make concessions over its nuclear program amid heightened US threats.
32e9390a8b04db04656e26dc2f221b9c207d09d5.headline: Turkey Mediates Talks as Iran Faces US Pressure Over Nuclear Program

a1a6bbd34333e26504237f420463d9faa5a0c569.summary: Vizsla Silver, a Vancouver-based mining company, reports that 10 of its employees were abducted from a project site in Concordia, Sinaloa, Mexico. The region has experienced cartel violence since 2024.
a1a6bbd34333e26504237f420463d9faa5a0c569.headline: Ten Vizsla Silver Employees Abducted from Mexican Mining Site

d56e8f3fea3957fa5009a759df56fa00d387acf1.summary: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) will conduct live-fire military exercises in the Strait of Hormuz, according to Iranian media reports. The announcement comes amid ongoing tensions with the United States.
d56e8f3fea3957fa5009a759df56fa00d387acf1.headline: Irans IRGC Announces Live Fire Drills in Strait of Hormuz

0c84a2757a6613bdee86305d383cb9fe93d99e8a.summary: Islamic State has claimed responsibility for a deadly attack on the international airport and adjacent air force base in Niamey, Niger's capital. Militants used heavy weapons and drones, damaging planes from Ivorian and Togolese airlines. The claim follows accusations by Abdourahamane Tiani of foreign involvement in the incident.
0c84a2757a6613bdee86305d383cb9fe93d99e8a.headline: Islamic State Claims Attack on Niamey Airport and Air Base in Niger

e474023a4daf2bbba93ce7353ab659a856605649.summary: The US deputy attorney general announced that the Department of Justice has opened a federal civil rights investigation into the fatal shooting of Minneapolis nurse Alex Pretti by federal agents. The FBI will lead the federal probe. Protests continue in Minneapolis following Pretti's death.
e474023a4daf2bbba93ce7353ab659a856605649.headline: Federal Civil Rights Probe Launched in Death of Alex Pretti in

2fef6ea1259c4a13b1e4f2e63bc9fb9978410408.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt’s Creek,' 'Home Alone,' and 'Beetlejuice,' died on January 30 at the age of 71 after a brief illness. Her death was confirmed by her manager.
2fef6ea1259c4a13b1e4f2e63bc9fb9978410408.headline: Catherine OHara Emmy Winning Actor Dies at 71

d03fd65895f3cd531a4b271f67978dd6cd7f06f0.summary: The Justice Department released over 3 million pages of documents, more than 2,000 videos, and 180,000 images related to Jeffrey Epstein. Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche said about 200,000 pages were withheld or redacted due to legal privileges. The release fulfills a congressional requirement.
d03fd65895f3cd531a4b271f67978dd6cd7f06f0.headline: Justice Department Releases Over 3 Million Pages in Epstein Case

c988b1641dffa185c2dcf49f7672f5c2d144ce81.summary: A federal judge has ruled that Luigi Mangione will not face the death penalty in the case involving the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson. The judge dismissed the federal murder charge that carried capital punishment, but Mangione still faces federal stalking charges and state murder charges.
c988b1641dffa185c2dcf49f7672f5c2d144ce81.headline: Judge Bars Death Penalty in Luigi Mangione CEO Murder Case

1339c0c533027f0da12ca1305dc7bba2514c0099.summary: Lindsey Vonn crashed during her final downhill race before the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics in Switzerland on Friday. She was airlifted to a hospital for evaluation after clinging to her left knee. The race was cancelled following her crash. Vonn stated her Olympic hopes remain despite the injury.
1339c0c533027f0da12ca1305dc7bba2514c0099.headline: Lindsey Vonn Injured in Crash Before Winter Olympics

ec9f02284758b138eca244170ab27b337de0229d.summary: Journalist Don Lemon was arrested by federal agents in Los Angeles in connection with an anti-ICE protest that disrupted a church service in Minnesota. Lemon, who was covering the protest for his online news show, faces federal civil rights charges. His lawyer has pledged to fight the charges, and press freedom groups have criticized the arrest.
ec9f02284758b138eca244170ab27b337de0229d.headline: Don Lemon Arrested Faces Federal Charges After Minnesota Church

52338e0653ff0ffcf6271d2740d6a89f9dd93b1d.summary: Israel announced that the Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt will reopen on Sunday, marking the first time the crossing has been open since May 2024. The reopening will allow people to travel between Gaza and Egypt after a prolonged closure.
52338e0653ff0ffcf6271d2740d6a89f9dd93b1d.headline: Israel to Reopen Gaza Egypt Rafah Crossing on Sunday After Long

46c59c61a3e0687deb7ec684f08d9ac291470a60.summary: The Minnesota Vikings fired general manager Kwesi Adofo-Mensah on January 30, 2026, after the team missed the playoffs with a 9-8 record. The Vikings appointed executive vice president of football operations Rob Brzezinski as interim general manager through the 2026 NFL draft, after which a search for a permanent replacement will begin.
46c59c61a3e0687deb7ec684f08d9ac291470a60.headline: Vikings Fire GM Kwesi Adofo Mensah

44e4940f55deedcfdd33bc3142dfde68a014e507.summary: New England Patriots quarterback Drake Maye did not practice on Friday due to illness, as confirmed by coach Mike Vrabel. Maye is also managing a shoulder injury ahead of the team's Super Bowl matchup with the Seattle Seahawks.
44e4940f55deedcfdd33bc3142dfde68a014e507.headline: Patriots QB Drake Maye Misses Practice Due to Illness Before Super

2c9b99bf3fbb62f1af4006179c6ac05458000536.summary: Novak Djokovic defeated defending champion Jannik Sinner in a five-set semifinal to reach his 11th Australian Open final. Djokovic will face Carlos Alcaraz in the final as he seeks his 25th Grand Slam title.
2c9b99bf3fbb62f1af4006179c6ac05458000536.headline: Djokovic Defeats Sinner to Reach Australian Open Final Against Alcaraz

8c1110372a27143344b755384b0ca05a09cafcdb.summary: Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve. Warsh, a former Fed governor, will require Senate confirmation. The nomination comes amid heightened White House interest in central bank policy and ongoing Senate opposition from Sen. Tillis until a legal dispute involving Powell is resolved.
8c1110372a27143344b755384b0ca05a09cafcdb.headline: Trump Nominates Kevin Warsh to Succeed Powell as Fed Chair

706a4cd38bf1b37f39858328dceeb344975be3af.summary: UN Secretary-General António Guterres warned that the United Nations could face a financial collapse by July 2026 if member states do not pay their outstanding dues. Guterres urged countries to address unpaid contributions and consider reforms to the UN's financial system.
706a4cd38bf1b37f39858328dceeb344975be3af.headline: Guterres Warns UN May Face Financial Collapse by July 2026

410de8ec9e01f7e539c5cf930be8a146b201b49b.summary: Sam Curran took a hat-trick as England defeated Sri Lanka by 11 runs (DLS) in a rain-shortened T20 international series opener in Pallekele. Curran became the second England bowler to achieve a T20I hat-trick. Sri Lanka was all out for 133 in 17 overs, with England reaching 125-4 before rain ended play.

b016938f84451fc45c691ff27d3ffa93e5a2c26c.summary: The NFL has confirmed Bad Bunny will perform at the Super Bowl halftime show despite criticism from the Trump administration. The 60th Super Bowl will feature the Seattle Seahawks facing the New England Patriots, a rematch of their game 11 years ago.
b016938f84451fc45c691ff27d3ffa93e5a2c26c.headline: Bad Bunny Set for Super Bowl Halftime as Seahawks Face Patriots

a000691da439d581a9aca9b3dd14c6465049695c.summary: Nikola Jokic is expected to return to the Denver Nuggets lineup on Friday against the Los Angeles Clippers after missing 16 games with a bone bruise in his left knee. His return makes him eligible for the NBA's end-of-season awards.
a000691da439d581a9aca9b3dd14c6465049695c.headline: Nikola Jokic Set to Return for Nuggets After 16 Game Absence

719bcbcae94e6364006da2c3dd74fa43623822d3.summary: Lakers center Jaxson Hayes and Spurs rookie Carter Bryant have accepted invitations to participate in the NBA slam dunk contest at All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, according to sources.
719bcbcae94e6364006da2c3dd74fa43623822d3.headline: Jaxson Hayes and Carter Bryant to Compete in NBA Slam Dunk Contest

dd1209f8baeea3346aa3ac9586ea5bfc4d59f4bd.summary: Donald Trump warned the UK against strengthening ties with China as Keir Starmer visited Beijing and Shanghai to discuss economic cooperation and promote trade deals after meeting Xi Jinping.
dd1209f8baeea3346aa3ac9586ea5bfc4d59f4bd.headline: Trump Warns UK Over China Ties During Starmers Visit to Beijing

dbd1cc0af67f26165361b741d15c30faf6a55903.summary: Panama's supreme court has ruled against the concession held by a subsidiary of Chinese company CK Hutchison at the Panama Canal ports. The decision supports President Trump's goal of increasing U.S. control over the canal. Panama's president stated that canal operations will continue as normal.
dbd1cc0af67f26165361b741d15c30faf6a55903.headline: Panama Court Ends Chinese Port Concession

a1aa7e54387a78003de217cc3f0318f4bedc425d.summary: The US Department of Justice released three million pages of documents, including emails showing payments to Reinaldo Avila da Silva. The disclosures have renewed scrutiny of the relationship between the disgraced financier and the UK's former Washington ambassador.
a1aa7e54387a78003de217cc3f0318f4bedc425d.headline: DOJ Releases Emails Revealing Payments Linked to Disgraced Financier

fa7ff799065f1d6b99f49126134fb30354b391ba.summary: Trump announced that the U.S. will decertify Canadian planes and impose a 50% tariff on Canadian aircraft sold in the U.S., citing Canadian restrictions on U.S.-made Gulfstream aircraft. This move escalates trade tensions between the two countries.
fa7ff799065f1d6b99f49126134fb30354b391ba.headline: Trump Announces 50% Tariff and Decertification of Canadian Planes

c770f51ea02762c23d7130999ae7b72337dad538.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have reached an agreement to extend a fragile ceasefire into a permanent truce in northeastern Syria. The deal establishes a framework for integrating Kurdish forces into the state, following Ahmed al-Sharaa's rise to the presidency after rebel forces seized power in December 2024.
c770f51ea02762c23d7130999ae7b72337dad538.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Agree to Permanent Truce

21f9459eb6199e7cdc630a4c147cee556b5cbec2.summary: Donald Trump signed an executive order declaring a national emergency regarding Havana, enabling tariffs on any country that delivers oil to Cuba. The White House stated the action targets Cuba's ties to hostile powers and increases pressure on its government.
21f9459eb6199e7cdc630a4c147cee556b5cbec2.headline: Trump Signs Order Allowing Tariffs on Oil Deliveries to Cuba

12fafe38c01d72af030a6511c0a5754d645ab82f.summary: The WNBA and the players' union are scheduled to meet Monday in New York to resume collective bargaining negotiations, which have been stalled for several weeks. Kelsey Plum, vice president of the players' union, confirmed the meeting while speaking to reporters.
12fafe38c01d72af030a6511c0a5754d645ab82f.headline: WNBA and Players Union Set to Resume Stalled Contract Talks Monday

3aa264ab6c444c29a891fbbc27e26662da5abe23.summary: South Africa has declared Israel’s chargé d’affaires persona non grata, accusing the Israeli representative of 'gross abuse of diplomatic privilege.' In response, Israel has announced a reciprocal measure against South Africa.
3aa264ab6c444c29a891fbbc27e26662da5abe23.headline: South Africa Expels Israeli Diplomat

410cde97ac3554cbbc32dc79f6bef896b9241be4.summary: The Israeli military has acknowledged that the Gaza health authorities' reported death toll of around 70,000 is broadly accurate, reversing its previous rejection of these figures.
410cde97ac3554cbbc32dc79f6bef896b9241be4.headline: Israeli Military Accepts Gaza Death Toll of About 70

4649fa26bb09c24b0d1ede5aed36fde5b2a53dec.summary: Deng Chol Majek has been sentenced to at least 29 years in prison for the murder of Rhiannon Whyte, whom he stabbed 23 times at a railway station. The sentencing follows a conviction for what the court described as a 'sadistic' attack.
4649fa26bb09c24b0d1ede5aed36fde5b2a53dec.headline: Deng Chol Majek Jailed for 29 Years for Murder of Rhiannon Whyte

8576334c2b0fe6f1904a7fa7443aef80fe131d91.summary: The US Senate has stalled on a funding deal, increasing the likelihood of a partial government shutdown set to begin Saturday. The proposed deal aims to address Democratic concerns about Department of Homeland Security funding related to enforcement actions in Minnesota.
8576334c2b0fe6f1904a7fa7443aef80fe131d91.headline: Senate Stalls on Funding Deal

af61afc17665cda1c0eaa5ef8d34d8bfddd99133.summary: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum warned that US tariffs threatened by Donald Trump on goods from countries supplying energy to Cuba could worsen the humanitarian situation in Cuba.
af61afc17665cda1c0eaa5ef8d34d8bfddd99133.headline: Sheinbaum Warns US Tariffs Could Deepen Cuba Crisis

1dcad1360f8b918762e4e03e2555e326fc08e52a.summary: NASA has postponed the first crewed Artemis mission to the moon due to near-freezing temperatures forecasted at the launch site.
1dcad1360f8b918762e4e03e2555e326fc08e52a.headline: NASA delays the first Artemis moonshot with astronauts because of extreme cold at the launch site - AP News

c0d7847343c3361e2c9556776845978dc81fe51f.summary: Deep Space Station 15, a 112-foot antenna at the Goldstone Deep Space Communications Complex near Barstow, California, was photographed under the Milky Way in September 2025. Goldstone is part of NASA’s Deep Space Network, which supports communications with spacecraft across the solar system.
c0d7847343c3361e2c9556776845978dc81fe51f.headline: Deep Space Station 15 Photographed Under Milky Way at Goldstone

76799fb13ae605412a792a0399b2697121085fab.summary: U.S. producer prices rose in December, marking the largest monthly increase in five months. Businesses are passing on higher costs, including those from tariffs, to consumers.
76799fb13ae605412a792a0399b2697121085fab.headline: U.S. Producer Prices See Largest Rise in Five Months in December

855030e9ef8b2abab0397b3e98e17b34fe5b4935.summary: Venezuela's acting President Delcy Rodríguez has announced an amnesty bill that could allow the release of hundreds of political prisoners. Rodríguez also stated that the El Helicoide prison will be closed, marking major reforms following the recent change in leadership.
855030e9ef8b2abab0397b3e98e17b34fe5b4935.headline: Venezuela Proposes Amnesty and Closure of El Helicoide Prison

920809c9174066d4b8a9b6c39c67f6d2c14eee60.summary: A partial US government shutdown began on Saturday after the House of Representatives failed to vote on a funding deal. The Senate passed a measure to avert the shutdown, but the House is in recess until Monday, when a vote could reopen the government. The funding impasse centers on Democratic opposition to Department of Homeland Security spending following recent enforcement actions.
920809c9174066d4b8a9b6c39c67f6d2c14eee60.headline: Partial US Government Shutdown Begins as House Delays Funding Vote

6682eae47453ec1ccf997b75d8d40d32ab53394e.summary: Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, succeeding Jerome Powell. Warsh, a former Fed governor and critic of the central bank, was announced as Trump's pick on Friday. The nomination comes amid White House efforts to increase influence over the Fed and has prompted mixed reactions from markets and lawmakers.
6682eae47453ec1ccf997b75d8d40d32ab53394e.headline: Trump Nominates Kevin Warsh to Succeed Powell as Fed Chair

5dc05cad6877023ace1e17e8e56b07f716f83cb6.summary: Recently released Department of Justice documents show that Jeffrey Epstein connected New York Giants co-owner Steve Tisch with multiple women in 2013. Tisch's name appears at least 440 times among the millions of files made public on Friday.
5dc05cad6877023ace1e17e8e56b07f716f83cb6.headline: Epstein Linked Giants Co Owner Steve Tisch With Women

c7d4bffc1f839b98e70b4fedfd6be0251b75ca1b.summary: Nikola Jokic returned to the Denver Nuggets' lineup on Friday after missing 16 games with a left knee injury. Jokic scored 31 points and had 12 rebounds, helping the Nuggets defeat the Los Angeles Clippers 122-109.
c7d4bffc1f839b98e70b4fedfd6be0251b75ca1b.headline: Nikola Jokic Returns Leads Nuggets to Win Over Clippers

7ca08557764a7816af12bf43d68cc05f4382f29c.summary: A federal judge has dismissed the murder charge against Luigi Mangione in the case of the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, making him ineligible for the death penalty. Prosecutors are now barred from seeking capital punishment in this case.
7ca08557764a7816af12bf43d68cc05f4382f29c.headline: Judge Dismisses Death Penalty Charge in Mangione CEO Murder Case

e66806db93be9a5efcb36428146f8a0fc2b83dd3.summary: Neal Skupski and Christian Harrison won the Australian Open men's doubles title, while Elise Mertens and Zhang Shuai claimed the women's doubles championship. Novak Djokovic and Carlos Alcaraz are set to face each other in the men's singles final.
e66806db93be9a5efcb36428146f8a0fc2b83dd3.headline: Skupski and Harrison Win Mens Doubles

fe549f03fbec06af7f446619d956cdbb46690513.summary: Luka Doncic recorded a triple-double by halftime and finished with 37 points, 13 assists, and 11 rebounds as the Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Washington Wizards 142-111 on January 30. The Lakers' win was decisive, with Doncic leading throughout and Deandre Ayton adding 28 points and 13 rebounds.
fe549f03fbec06af7f446619d956cdbb46690513.headline: Luka Doncic Leads Lakers to 142 111 Win Over Wizards With Triple

aed881ddd5e1415e0c920a8a705164cf55d36c18.summary: Justin Rose set a new 36-hole tournament record and leads by four shots at the halfway point of the Farmers Insurance Open. Brooks Koepka, returning to the PGA Tour, made the cut on the number.
aed881ddd5e1415e0c920a8a705164cf55d36c18.headline: Justin Rose Leads by Four After Record 36 Holes at Farmers Insurance

f9c6bed857bd76d6fb14e952dcb778dc80db7b09.summary: Brooklyn Nets guard Egor Demin set an NBA rookie record by making a 3-pointer in his 34th straight game during a 109-99 win over the Utah Jazz on Friday night. Demin finished with 25 points and 10 rebounds, helping the Nets end a seven-game losing streak.
f9c6bed857bd76d6fb14e952dcb778dc80db7b09.headline: Egor Demin Sets NBA Rookie 3 Point Record as Nets Defeat Jazz

1201519fdba77077ffc016d460f0eab995a81df5.summary: Jacob Wilson and the Athletics have agreed to a seven-year, $70 million contract extension, with a club option for an eighth season. The deal, announced Friday, keeps Wilson under contract through at least 2032 and avoids salary arbitration after the 2027, 2028, and 2029 seasons.
1201519fdba77077ffc016d460f0eab995a81df5.headline: Jacob Wilson Athletics Agree to Seven Year $70 Million Extension

ba411ca18d87389c909974643b858405514b2611.summary: The Minnesota Vikings fired general manager Kwesi Adofo-Mensah on Friday after four seasons. The move comes less than a year after Adofo-Mensah signed a contract extension and follows the team's failure to reach the playoffs this season.
ba411ca18d87389c909974643b858405514b2611.headline: Vikings Dismiss GM Kwesi Adofo Mensah After Missing Playoffs

f58307b5d1f5e4bc12ec5358d35836f244ff46c0.summary: Journalist Don Lemon was released from custody after being arrested and charged with federal civil rights violations related to his coverage of an anti-immigration enforcement protest at a Minnesota church. Lemon pleaded not guilty to the charges.
f58307b5d1f5e4bc12ec5358d35836f244ff46c0.headline: Don Lemon Released After Pleading Not Guilty to Protest Charges

c670bf3625b45f4fcbef21fd9af6e87ee1178702.summary: Donald Trump has selected Brett Matsumoto, a longtime Bureau of Labor Statistics economist, to lead the agency. Matsumoto's nomination comes after Trump withdrew a previous, more controversial pick and follows months without a permanent commissioner.
c670bf3625b45f4fcbef21fd9af6e87ee1178702.headline: Trump Selects Brett Matsumoto to Lead Bureau of Labor Statistics

83a1408715b5df5f21ff6c725315128f385b6430.summary: The US has approved major arms sales to Israel and Saudi Arabia. Israel will receive $6.67 billion in military equipment, including 30 Apache attack helicopters. Saudi Arabia will purchase Patriot missiles worth $9 billion. The total value of the approved sales exceeds $15 billion.
83a1408715b5df5f21ff6c725315128f385b6430.headline: US Approves Over $15 Billion in Arms Sales to Israel and Saudi

d66ce7f6b30b64fdab9b87aee8c7bebafc8b5a6b.summary: Iran's foreign minister stated that Tehran is prepared to resume nuclear talks with the United States but will not negotiate over its missile program or defense capabilities.
d66ce7f6b30b64fdab9b87aee8c7bebafc8b5a6b.headline: Iran Open to Nuclear Talks With U.S

71fb2fe469aa8a9a2a22168f603734bb37c10562.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt's Creek,' 'Home Alone,' and 'Beetlejuice,' died on January 30 at age 71 after a brief illness. Her career spanned 50 years and included collaborations with Christopher Guest.
71fb2fe469aa8a9a2a22168f603734bb37c10562.headline: Catherine OHara Emmy Winning Actor Dies at 71

18f7ec0f3e7f886d0454b8e57e8160ce32256b49.summary: Panama's supreme court has ruled against a Chinese company's concession to operate ports at each end of the Panama Canal, supporting US policy objectives. Panama's president stated the canal will continue to operate normally. The decision is seen as a victory for President Trump, who has advocated for greater US control over the canal.
18f7ec0f3e7f886d0454b8e57e8160ce32256b49.headline: Panama Court Ends Chinese Port Concession

bc44174f4346a5bdb1b294d003847ba6fcf6a2d8.summary: The US Department of Justice released over three million documents related to Jeffrey Epstein, including emails between Epstein and a person referred to as 'The Duke' and photos showing Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor in compromising positions. Mountbatten-Windsor continues to deny any wrongdoing amid renewed scrutiny.
bc44174f4346a5bdb1b294d003847ba6fcf6a2d8.headline: DOJ Releases Epstein Files Including Photos of Andrew Mountbatten

1df3c8b2a920f25c225ae384938cd8114aaf76d5.summary: Thousands of people in Minnesota and other U.S. cities protested as part of a national shutdown, calling for an end to immigration enforcement operations by ICE.
1df3c8b2a920f25c225ae384938cd8114aaf76d5.headline: Protests Held Nationwide Against ICE Immigration Enforcement

b0b73425619f6d739350d09ed2c4cf155573a4ef.summary: Nationwide protests took place on January 30, 2026, following the fatal shootings of Renee Good and Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis. Demonstrators gathered in multiple cities to express opposition to the actions of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).
b0b73425619f6d739350d09ed2c4cf155573a4ef.headline: Nationwide Protests Erupt Over Fatal ICE Involved Shootings

bf25afe37a252c559116cee09625d8b29493b32d.summary: Blue Origin announced it will pause its space tourism flights for at least two years to concentrate resources on developing its lunar landing capabilities.
bf25afe37a252c559116cee09625d8b29493b32d.headline: Blue Origin Pauses Space Tourism Flights to Focus on Lunar Projects

17c2931d1e4aced6bb1eacffb0ca4057ce99f804.summary: Israel will reopen the Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt on Sunday, allowing people to travel through the crossing for the first time since its closure in May 2024, according to a government agency.
17c2931d1e4aced6bb1eacffb0ca4057ce99f804.headline: Israel to Reopen Rafah Border Crossing With Egypt on Sunday

e2d329d7c1e7f0c7d2f3614d2703cbfcb2788e01.summary: Gold and silver prices fell sharply after Trump announced Warsh as the next Fed chair. Silver dropped 30% in its worst day since 1980, and gold also declined, reversing recent gains as investor concerns about Fed independence eased.
e2d329d7c1e7f0c7d2f3614d2703cbfcb2788e01.headline: Gold and Silver Prices Plunge After Trump Names Warsh as Fed Chair

b35946a1328b2d47484a566890fdc3f5703881cc.summary: Newly released files reveal that Bill Gates requested antibiotics to secretly give to his then-wife, Melinda, according to a recently disclosed email. The files also mention Elon Musk, the former Prince Andrew, and other prominent individuals.
b35946a1328b2d47484a566890fdc3f5703881cc.headline: Files Reveal Bill Gates Sought Antibiotics for Ex Wife Without Her

3220fd6f86af6c089e9e45aef2d29b5d4f20851e.summary: Islamic State in the Sahel has claimed responsibility for an attack on the international airport and air force base in Niamey, Niger's capital. Militants used heavy weapons and drones, damaging planes from Ivorian and Togolese airlines. The assault resulted in fatalities.
3220fd6f86af6c089e9e45aef2d29b5d4f20851e.headline: Islamic State Claims Deadly Attack on Niamey Airport and Air Base

005370401aba256d358d1d9d8190b665b66b99bd.summary: Over 200 people were killed this week in a collapse at the Rubaya coltan mine in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, according to Lumumba Kambere Muyisa, a spokesperson for the rebel-appointed government. The mine supplies about 15% of the world's coltan, a mineral used in mobile phones. Rights groups have raised concerns about working conditions at the site.
005370401aba256d358d1d9d8190b665b66b99bd.headline: Over 200 Killed in Rubaya Coltan Mine Collapse in Eastern Congo

f30dd6596d9daa0545cfe96a9ac42c3372d2c148.summary: Russia is experiencing increasing financial pressure to fund its war in Ukraine, with a widening budget gap. As a result, President Vladimir Putin faces a limited timeframe to secure a peace agreement, as peace talks have resumed.
f30dd6596d9daa0545cfe96a9ac42c3372d2c148.headline: Russia Faces Budget Strains as Ukraine Peace Talks Resume

7a5baa861d492bcff56a725d5fa3aa893fafdd5e.summary: The United States and Argentina are in advanced negotiations on an agreement that would allow the U.S. to deport immigrants from other countries to Argentina, according to reports from the New York Times and Reuters.
7a5baa861d492bcff56a725d5fa3aa893fafdd5e.headline: U.S. and Argentina in Advanced Talks on Deportation Agreement

93161feb23a605e3b7c07380d57f24f983f5dbf0.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have agreed to extend a ceasefire into a permanent truce, establishing a framework for integrating Kurdish forces into the state. This agreement follows a period of uncertainty after rebel forces led by Ahmed al-Sharaa, now president, seized power in December 2024.
93161feb23a605e3b7c07380d57f24f983f5dbf0.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Agree to Permanent Truce

671d578f0388a3a76b9d32c9a8b913ea74842f3d.summary: The US Department of Justice has opened a federal civil rights investigation into the shooting death of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis, according to officials.
671d578f0388a3a76b9d32c9a8b913ea74842f3d.headline: Justice Department Opens Civil Rights Probe Into Alex Pretti Shooting

83c2dff463127658614b6ee39d166efb93c42a01.summary: Philadelphia 76ers forward Paul George has been suspended without pay for 25 games after violating the NBA's anti-drug program. The league did not specify the substance involved. George stated he took an improper medication and accepted responsibility. The suspension begins Saturday.
83c2dff463127658614b6ee39d166efb93c42a01.headline: 76ers Paul George Suspended 25 Games for Anti Drug Policy Violation

aa2b3e32fa6cac68860ee9dbd9fcdbce110a8c5c.summary: The Buffalo Bills have reached an agreement to hire Jim Leonhard as their defensive coordinator under new head coach Joe Brady. Leonhard, previously the Denver Broncos' assistant head coach and defensive pass game coordinator, has not yet signed a contract, according to sources cited by multiple outlets.
aa2b3e32fa6cac68860ee9dbd9fcdbce110a8c5c.headline: Bills Reach Agreement to Hire Jim Leonhard as Defensive Coordinator

b94063cca725364b1715f9a3da08c9526a9ac2d2.summary: Israeli strikes on Gaza killed at least 30 Palestinians, including women and children, according to Gaza's Health Ministry. The Israeli military confirmed the strikes, stating they targeted Hamas militants and weapons sites. The attacks occurred amid a ceasefire that both Israel and Hamas accuse each other of violating.
b94063cca725364b1715f9a3da08c9526a9ac2d2.headline: Israeli Strikes Kill at Least 30 in Gaza Amid Ceasefire Accusations

6254aaf7a16caddfbf3a8d297f8bbc060bd744e6.summary: Venezuela's acting President Delcy Rodríguez has announced an amnesty bill that could result in the release of hundreds of people detained for political reasons. The proposed legislation aims to address the issue of political prisoners in the country.
6254aaf7a16caddfbf3a8d297f8bbc060bd744e6.headline: Venezuela Announces Amnesty Bill for Political Prisoners

ff727ceabd6db7602a8be619d898f54780caf858.summary: Elena Rybakina won her first Australian Open title, defeating world number one Aryna Sabalenka 6-4, 4-6, 6-4 in the final. This marks Rybakina's second Grand Slam title, following her Wimbledon victory in 2022. Sabalenka, the reigning champion, has now lost consecutive Australian Open finals.
ff727ceabd6db7602a8be619d898f54780caf858.headline: Elena Rybakina Defeats Aryna Sabalenka to Win Australian Open Title

438b241208fe825927ac55ac6521cfe8474b56ef.summary: A partial US government shutdown has begun as the House prepares to vote on a Trump-backed funding deal already passed by the Senate. The House is expected to consider the measure on Monday.
438b241208fe825927ac55ac6521cfe8474b56ef.headline: Partial US Government Shutdown Begins as House Awaits Funding Vote

df28d2114f6d3b98b5a5984e0214f2898f8f0489.summary: The Justice Department released three million pages from its files on Jeffrey Epstein, including references to Trump and emails involving a person called "The Duke." Lawmakers and advocacy groups allege that about half of the records remain withheld despite legal requirements for full disclosure.
df28d2114f6d3b98b5a5984e0214f2898f8f0489.headline: Justice Department Releases 3 Million Epstein Files

3aa3d639c765e727906ef4dfe674c0e4622987c8.summary: Teofimo Lopez and Shakur Stevenson are scheduled to fight for the Ring Magazine and WBO super lightweight titles at Madison Square Garden on Saturday, with ring walks expected at 10:50 p.m. ET.
3aa3d639c765e727906ef4dfe674c0e4622987c8.headline: Teofimo Lopez and Shakur Stevenson Set for Title Fight at MSG Saturday

6966316f38876b3856d3ff51d67ab2301cb6f158.summary: Canadian actress Catherine O'Hara, known for roles in Home Alone and Schitt's Creek, died in Los Angeles at age 71 after a brief illness. Tributes have been paid by actors, politicians, and Canadian prime minister Mark Carney.
6966316f38876b3856d3ff51d67ab2301cb6f158.headline: Catherine OHara Dies at 71

048ef1fb45607e4d3ee3b8a9d1d545163d7fbcf8.summary: A U.S. judge has declined to block the Biden administration's increase of immigration agents in Minnesota. Attorney General Pam Bondi praised the decision as a significant legal victory for the Justice Department.
048ef1fb45607e4d3ee3b8a9d1d545163d7fbcf8.headline: Judge Allows Minnesota Immigration Agent Increase to Proceed

b38f2f10a6eabfaeeba171306e3863b6b3ad342d.summary: Chelsea defeated West Ham 3-2 at Stamford Bridge after coming back from a 2-0 halftime deficit in the Premier League. Goals from Joao Pedro, Marc Cucurella, and Enzo Fernandez secured the win. This marks Chelsea's first comeback from two goals down at home in the Premier League and their sixth win in seven matches under coach Liam Rosenior.
b38f2f10a6eabfaeeba171306e3863b6b3ad342d.headline: Chelsea Overcomes 2 Goal Deficit to Beat West Ham 3 2 at

c6374060020083af7b12bc33584f620a0444db3d.summary: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks will face each other in Super Bowl 60 on Sunday, February 8, marking a rematch of their game 11 years ago. Final injury reports for both teams have been released, and details about the event, including uniforms and betting predictions, are available.
c6374060020083af7b12bc33584f620a0444db3d.headline: Patriots and Seahawks Set for Super Bowl 60 Rematch on February 8

3b620fcbdba14b0dcef12fe2c56882b81cf5d05f.summary: Federal judge Kate M. Menendez denied Minnesota officials' request to temporarily halt Operation Metro Surge, a federal immigration operation in Minneapolis. The operation has led to the deaths of two people and weeks of protests, but the judge's ruling allows it to continue.
3b620fcbdba14b0dcef12fe2c56882b81cf5d05f.headline: Judge Denies Minnesota Request to Halt Operation Metro Surge

87622049a66de5f5a26ca45c02ebcf5ed63b74e2.summary: Austin Hays has agreed to a one-year deal with the Chicago White Sox, according to multiple reports. The veteran outfielder joins the team as a free agent to add depth to their roster.
87622049a66de5f5a26ca45c02ebcf5ed63b74e2.headline: Austin Hays Agrees to One Year Deal With White Sox

0fe0ac79f04759a2052e06f9b7aee1792967e597.summary: More than 200 people were killed in a collapse at the Rubaya coltan mine in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo this week, according to a spokesperson for the rebel-appointed government. The collapse occurred after heavy rains on Wednesday.
0fe0ac79f04759a2052e06f9b7aee1792967e597.headline: Over 200 Dead in Eastern Congo Coltan Mine Collapse After Heavy Rains

10f8c50a8fb0d8fdc70321905ee0bea0da532b09.summary: Carlos Alcaraz advanced to the Australian Open final after a challenging match. He will face Novak Djokovic, who is aiming for his 25th Grand Slam title. The final sets up a highly anticipated contest between Alcaraz and Djokovic.
10f8c50a8fb0d8fdc70321905ee0bea0da532b09.headline: Alcaraz to Face Djokovic in Australian Open Final Showdown

e0d5a7c685bf4195f41a5463a2284e7e033ceb61.summary: Lord Triesman, a former Labour minister and chair of the Football Association, has died at the age of 82. The Labour party stated he passed away peacefully at home on Friday night. Tony Blair paid tribute, calling him a vital part of the New Labour movement.
e0d5a7c685bf4195f41a5463a2284e7e033ceb61.headline: Lord Triesman Former Labour Minister Dies at 82

fa5ace514630ec30d249fbb022aa7cb1029e4892.summary: Journalist Don Lemon and another reporter were arrested and charged with federal civil rights crimes after covering an anti-ICE protest at a Minnesota church. Both journalists have been taken to court in connection with their reporting on the protest.

984b87cddddec94a8894370a34de27dae15bf250.summary: NASCAR has postponed its preseason exhibition race at Bowman Gray Stadium to Monday night due to ice and snow in the Winston-Salem area. The event, originally scheduled as a two-day competition starting Saturday with the main event on Sunday, was delayed for safety reasons.
