ca1a546a50da2eb0a59fb40aa7aacea8c4b6d8ba.summary: A drone strike in Ethiopia's Tigray region killed one person and injured another, according to Reuters. The incident follows recent clashes between government troops and Tigrayan forces, raising concerns about renewed conflict in the area.
ca1a546a50da2eb0a59fb40aa7aacea8c4b6d8ba.headline: Drone Strike in Tigray Kills One

a628e72d032ec3202bfc8083de8c59a3133e64ea.summary: Recently released Justice Department documents include images appearing to show Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and emails indicating he invited Jeffrey Epstein to Buckingham Palace after Epstein's release from house arrest.
a628e72d032ec3202bfc8083de8c59a3133e64ea.headline: Documents Show Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Invited Epstein to Palace

f2efea80839b1c480b2db977c272b2e4ac288a22.summary: Thousands of Danish veterans and supporters protested outside the US embassy in Copenhagen, responding to Donald Trump's recent comments that allied NATO troops stayed back from the front lines during the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.

f438e535b3c29a7e5bad910a746f0ef95da09e7c.summary: A gas leak caused an explosion in a residential building in Bandar Abbas, Iran, according to Iranian media reports. The blast resulted in four deaths.

72863f1c3c4e35aa49d3551407addddb5419bc01.summary: A weaker U.S. dollar, described by Donald Trump as a 'yo-yo,' is creating new challenges for stock investors, prompting some to look for investment opportunities overseas.
72863f1c3c4e35aa49d3551407addddb5419bc01.headline: Weaker Dollar Drives U.S. Stock Investors to Seek Overseas Options

1395724298cecb9d9898654f780ca38be57d1f8b.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt's Creek' and 'Home Alone,' has died at the age of 71.

2d5a726101e2401145321653c15e65da2261de95.summary: A federal judge has ordered the release of five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father from ICE detention in Texas, following their arrest during an immigration raid in Minnesota. The judge criticized the deportation quotas that led to their detention and previously blocked their removal from the U.S. The case drew national attention after images of Liam in detention were widely circulated.

Volkanovski won on all three judges’ scorecards, continuing his championship reign in front of his hometown fans.
4f20ee420f373393c5e76221c5d8c67f25259475.headline: Volkanovski Defeats Lopes to Retain Featherweight Title at UFC 325

Trump expresses hope for a deal and indicates discussions are ongoing as a US naval group approaches the region.
77433b2b6f70115139ec9975d40ea4ebb44ef59d.headline: Iran Plans Naval Exercise Amid Ongoing Talks With US

7ea157461bb441c65359af03d0b01634f3c48162.summary: The Cleveland Cavaliers, Sacramento Kings, and Chicago Bulls completed a three-team trade. The Cavaliers received Keon Ellis and Dennis Schroder from the Kings, sending De'Andre Hunter to Sacramento. The Bulls acquired Dario Saric and two second-round picks from the Kings. The deal was finalized ahead of the Feb. 5 trade deadline.

0882b009b99e3d0cec8e666f7a63aa7299f5fef6.summary: Iran has declared European Union armies as 'terrorist groups' in response to the EU's decision to designate Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps as a terrorist organization.

d38a40139dec3d3f89f9fc5385ddbabc15434519.summary: Donald Trump stated that he welcomes investment by China and India in Venezuela's oil sector and said India will buy oil from Venezuela. Exxon and Chevron remain cautious about expanding operations in Venezuela as Trump urges increased oil production.

411626124a6c0b2087e2f90e76210dd6423ede99.summary: Israeli strikes in Gaza killed at least 30 Palestinians, including women and children, according to local hospitals and the Gaza Health Ministry. The Israeli military confirmed the strikes, stating they targeted Hamas militants and weapons sites. The violence occurred as both Israel and Hamas accused each other of violating the ongoing ceasefire.

44254ceed7933f6ecb767fdbba2cec95c3686871.summary: The San Francisco Giants have agreed to a one-year, $12 million contract with infielder Luis Arráez, a three-time MLB All-Star and batting champion, ahead of the 2026 season.
44254ceed7933f6ecb767fdbba2cec95c3686871.headline: Giants Sign Luis Arráez to One Year

2af369df281a1b5409f464ef1886df5ba3b8c1d5.summary: Jarrell Miller defeated Kingsley Ibeh by split decision in their heavyweight boxing match, despite experiencing a wardrobe malfunction when a punch from Ibeh knocked off Miller's hairpiece during the second round.

Despite George's absence, the 76ers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 124-114, with Joel Embiid scoring 40 points.

Triesman joined Blair's government in 2004 and held prominent roles in politics until his death.

The pair have returned to Minneapolis following the judge's decision, which criticized federal enforcement tactics.

Meanwhile, the Arizona Cardinals are set to hire Los Angeles Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as their new head coach, replacing Jonathan Gannon, according to multiple reports.
36f0ee6ebbf63c7b89def1841f327e86cdb6e194.headline: Raiders and Cardinals Set to Hire New Head Coaches After Super Bowl

667d31a8fb35d539484977ee4a82dfd3b014e418.summary: Amazon's documentary 'Melania' earned $7 million at US and Canadian theaters in its opening weekend, surpassing box office expectations and marking the strongest debut for a documentary in over a decade. Despite this, the film's earnings are modest compared to Amazon MGM's $75 million total investment in production and marketing.

56de0400b64247770be333dfe48dee7d857972e5.summary: Carlos Alcaraz won the Australian Open by defeating Novak Djokovic, becoming the youngest man to complete a career Grand Slam at age 22. This victory marks his seventh major singles title and ends Djokovic's perfect record in ten previous Australian Open finals.

The shutdown began after Senate Democrats sought changes to a spending package. House Republicans plan to vote, but Democratic leaders said they will not support an earlier reopening.

President Trump has threatened military action, and both sides remain in serious discussions.

72fc0e7d9d0e90a1aa6995c34daa4fd394292a15.summary: Israel has announced that Gaza's Rafah border crossing will reopen for some pedestrian traffic on Monday. The crossing, which has been mostly closed since May 2024, will allow Palestinians to travel on foot. Preparations are underway for the reopening, according to officials.

0ceaaef4b899c2c4b354227032586a79bb035035.summary: Investors linked to Sheikh Tahnoon bin Zayed al-Nahyan of Abu Dhabi have invested $500 million in World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture associated with Trump. Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren criticized the deal, calling it 'corruption.'

51343e7e1e54bc9df8fe71d281c4e06c5f40ec59.summary: UK's Starmer has called for Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor to testify before the US Congress regarding his connections to Jeffrey Epstein. Mountbatten-Windsor was stripped of his royal titles in October by King Charles III amid increasing scrutiny of his ties to Epstein.
51343e7e1e54bc9df8fe71d281c4e06c5f40ec59.headline: Starmer Urges Mountbatten Windsor to Testify Before US Congress on

26507300e7ec282fb900d175046b86b9a50e3491.summary: A strike near a bus carrying workers on Sunday injured seven people. The incident occurred amid a winter freeze and ongoing efforts by President Trump and others to encourage negotiations between the two countries for a truce.

9ac41143ae4bea6cc8dd8cb205e9fa2357237bd7.summary: Ahead of the Milan Cortina Winter Games opening ceremony, IOC president Kirsty Coventry addressed media focus on U.S. issues related to ICE and the Epstein files, calling them unwelcome distractions from the event.

f9639eb0be4e8c79d47de771ea4bb5bc127b7641.summary: The Canadian Football League's free agency period began on Sunday, marked by significant activity as teams and players started negotiations and signings.

0234c14e6508b1d8bf883efb8e644c7bf4fec1e9.summary: Families of six children abused by Vincent Chan are taking legal action against Bright Horizons, a north London nursery, alleging the nursery ignored concerns that allowed the offences to occur. A law firm is representing the families in their case.

e95f283c08621a38309b50bf7c7b267b05082887.summary: Costa Ricans are voting in a presidential election where Laura Fernandez, a close ally of President Chaves and former chief of staff, is the leading candidate. If Fernandez secures enough votes, she could win outright and avoid a run-off scheduled for April 5.
e95f283c08621a38309b50bf7c7b267b05082887.headline: Costa Ricans Vote as Laura Fernandez Leads Presidential Election

828fe736f5298ba980f7e43f06cb39f7f7d3a9b8.summary: Democrat Taylor Rehmet won a special election for the Texas state Senate in Tarrant County, flipping a district previously held by Republicans and won by Donald Trump by 17 points in 2024.
828fe736f5298ba980f7e43f06cb39f7f7d3a9b8.headline: Democrat Taylor Rehmet Wins Texas Senate Seat in GOP Leaning District

6ef8bd4bbf35866a87e12d7e5659fc76876e571e.summary: The border crossing between Gaza and Egypt has reopened after almost a year of closure, enabling residents to access medical care outside Gaza and return to their homes as the Israel-Hamas ceasefire advances.
6ef8bd4bbf35866a87e12d7e5659fc76876e571e.headline: Gaza Egypt Border Crossing Reopens After Yearlong Closure

22552907d7ec035e5a4329c84fa88af1a83777ba.summary: Netflix will add classic films such as "Mrs. Doubtfire," "You've Got Mail," and all "The Expendables" movies to its streaming lineup in February 2026. New and returning TV shows, including "The Lincoln Lawyer," "The Night Agent," and "Monarch: Legacy of Monsters," are also set to premiere on the platform this month.
22552907d7ec035e5a4329c84fa88af1a83777ba.headline: Netflix Adds Classics and New Shows to February 2026 Streaming Lineup

cb060881d5b90172d461aa96d4de8af9c78fa10e.summary: Donald Trump stated that he welcomes investment by China and India in Venezuela's oil industry and indicated that India will buy oil from Venezuela.
cb060881d5b90172d461aa96d4de8af9c78fa10e.headline: Trump Welcomes China and India Investment in Venezuela Oil

241deb7e5c3d227c9d97559a175a0bb2032ffabf.summary: India's government has presented its annual budget for 2026, emphasizing increased domestic manufacturing and measures to sustain economic growth amid ongoing financial market volatility and trade uncertainties.
241deb7e5c3d227c9d97559a175a0bb2032ffabf.headline: India Unveils 2026 Budget to Boost Manufacturing and Support Growth

5d6705bac31decf28d87b002afb0186e48bc48ad.summary: India's latest federal budget allocates nearly $133 billion for infrastructure and manufacturing development, targeting sectors such as textiles and electronic components. The government also increased taxes on equity futures trading to discourage speculation.
5d6705bac31decf28d87b002afb0186e48bc48ad.headline: India Unveils $133 Billion Infrastructure Plan

ec19c2dac6a87c65bf4764d361fc6b018a75390d.summary: The Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt has reopened for limited foot traffic under strict security and international monitoring, nearly a year after its closure in May 2024. Only dozens of Palestinians are allowed to cross daily, mainly for medical evacuations, as part of the second phase of a US-brokered ceasefire.

438ed5513d9de528dd9cf0366416007803eb6ec9.summary: Eugenio Suárez and the Cincinnati Reds have agreed to a one-year, $15 million contract with a mutual option for the 2027 season, according to multiple sources. Suárez, who hit 49 home runs in 2025, returns to Cincinnati as part of the deal.
438ed5513d9de528dd9cf0366416007803eb6ec9.headline: Eugenio Suárez Signs One Year

f2e9380453ffb9430d0aa9770b969f7a2937683a.summary: At the 2026 Grammy Awards, Bad Bunny won Album of the Year for 'Debí Tirar Más Fotos,' marking the first time a Spanish-language album received the honor. Other winners included Billie Eilish, Olivia Dean, and Lady Gaga. Several winners, including Bad Bunny and Billie Eilish, used their acceptance speeches to criticize ICE and address immigration issues.
f2e9380453ffb9430d0aa9770b969f7a2937683a.headline: Bad Bunny Makes History at 2026 Grammys as Winners Criticize ICE

ffb8e5ed9af6a7274b5363e0f17b25966f9aa147.summary: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father, Adrian, who were detained by immigration officers in Minnesota and held in Texas, have been released by a judge's order and have returned to Minnesota. They were accompanied home by Texas Democratic Representative Joaquin Castro.
ffb8e5ed9af6a7274b5363e0f17b25966f9aa147.headline: Five Year Old and Father Released From ICE Detention

273cafda572876d04fa67cdb8918c75f236dc393.summary: Iran's supreme leader warned that any U.S. military attack would trigger a regional war in the Middle East. The warning comes as Donald Trump has renewed threats to strike Iran, while also stating he hopes for a new deal with the country. Tensions remain high following recent protests in Iran.
273cafda572876d04fa67cdb8918c75f236dc393.headline: Iran Warns U.S. Attack Would Trigger Regional War Amid Renewed

340462c80efae51063d9a898ae4eb969671f794b.summary: US House Speaker Johnson says he has enough votes to end the partial government shutdown by Tuesday, despite lacking Democratic support. The shutdown began Saturday after Senate Democrats sought changes to a spending bill following the killings of U.S. citizens in Minnesota.
340462c80efae51063d9a898ae4eb969671f794b.headline: Speaker Johnson Plans House Vote to End Shutdown by Tuesday

d5a5c0a33cbb3543037b39462dc705bf96f3d087.summary: LeBron James has been selected as an NBA All-Star for the 22nd consecutive year, extending his record. Toronto Raptors forward Scottie Barnes was named an All-Star reserve for the 2026 game, as announced by the league on Sunday.
d5a5c0a33cbb3543037b39462dc705bf96f3d087.headline: LeBron James and Scottie Barnes Named 2026 NBA All Stars

2c7ebdb4430a9effc49bf267516d6cf5524ddc30.summary: Premier League clubs are finalizing player transfers as the winter window closes at 7 p.m. GMT on February 2, 2026. Teams continue to negotiate deals, with speculation around players such as Jean-Philippe Mateta and Chelsea's pursuit of Tati after missing out on Jacquet.
2c7ebdb4430a9effc49bf267516d6cf5524ddc30.headline: Premier League Clubs Finalize Transfers as Winter Window Closes

78a7c503f4c8ac6f3e38f36e6f36660baa78d7b4.summary: Denver Nuggets guard Jamal Murray has been selected for his first NBA All-Star Game in his ninth season. He joins Nikola Jokic, who was named a starter, marking the first time since 2010 that two Nuggets teammates have been chosen for the All-Star Game.
78a7c503f4c8ac6f3e38f36e6f36660baa78d7b4.headline: Jamal Murray Earns First NBA All Star Selection Alongside Nikola Jokic

aa3410738a4fa3bf32392f9878eb77534b9aa2d4.summary: The Arizona Cardinals have hired Rams offensive coordinator Mike LaFleur as their new head coach, replacing Jonathan Gannon. LaFleur joins the Cardinals after coaching with the Rams and draws inspiration from both the Rams and 49ers. Arizona was the last NFL team this offseason to fill its head coach position.

a9b0610f28403315cc73d1176b04cd606a2f22b5.summary: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks have arrived for the final week of preparations ahead of Super Bowl 60, which will determine the NFL champions on February 8.
a9b0610f28403315cc73d1176b04cd606a2f22b5.headline: Patriots and Seahawks Prepare for Super Bowl 60 Showdown

0fc3046bbbd1ad262d82cce03f78ca14ae99d181.summary: The New York Knicks defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 112-100, marking their sixth consecutive win. OG Anunoby scored 25 points and Landry Shamet added 23. The Knicks' victory followed a recent 2-9 stretch and a reported players-only meeting. Poor third quarter and 3-point shooting contributed to the Lakers' loss.
0fc3046bbbd1ad262d82cce03f78ca14ae99d181.headline: Knicks Beat Lakers 112 100 for Sixth Straight Win

1404b66ef66e13938b3fb69ee10ab95e92d598ed.summary: Moltbook, a new social media platform, has launched for AI agents to interact and post content, with humans limited to observer roles. The site is designed for artificial intelligence bots built by humans and is being compared to Reddit, but exclusively for AI participation.
1404b66ef66e13938b3fb69ee10ab95e92d598ed.headline: Moltbook Launches Social Platform Exclusively for AI Agents

e55dc1d34058a155bf85fe4b4f7c6384e33f7653.summary: Dozens of people protested outside the U.S. Consulate in Montreal in response to recent U.S. immigration enforcement actions, following the deaths of two Americans during federal operations in Minneapolis.

d1a4b21776ea6ac0f6a27ee2af42c4232f79112f.headline: 49ers Hire Raheem Morris as Defensive Coordinator for 2026

387b2c87425d4f444a2ddf13ad928745e1dd4859.summary: Liverpool have agreed a deal worth up to £60 million with Rennes for defender Jeremy Jacquet. The player is expected to join Liverpool in the summer after undergoing a medical.

A manhunt is ongoing in the southwestern province following the attacks.

44cf5ba95a31f692f25d4be63a32d9556830e631.summary: Peter Mandelson has resigned from the Labour Party following new revelations about his links to Jeffrey Epstein. Mandelson stated he stepped down to prevent further embarrassment to the party.
44cf5ba95a31f692f25d4be63a32d9556830e631.headline: Peter Mandelson Resigns From Labour Party After Epstein Revelations

95cfb1d427013d370cb7341c5bd98e74f75a09fb.summary: Oracle plans to raise up to $50 billion in debt and equity in 2026 to support its cloud expansion, following an $18 billion bond offering last fall.
95cfb1d427013d370cb7341c5bd98e74f75a09fb.headline: Oracle to Raise Up to $50 Billion in 2026 for Cloud Expansion

17b5739b2432751544392de83246602ffbd8cb49.summary: Mr. Mountbatten-Windsor was stripped of his royal titles in October by King Charles III amid increasing scrutiny over his connections to Jeffrey Epstein, according to released files naming several prominent individuals.
17b5739b2432751544392de83246602ffbd8cb49.headline: Mountbatten Windsor Loses Royal Titles Over Epstein Links

212d2d5141362c097346615819ce5e8622322128.summary: The 2026 Grammys red carpet in Los Angeles featured standout fashion choices, strong personal styles, and visible displays of political activism by attendees.
212d2d5141362c097346615819ce5e8622322128.headline: Bold Fashion and Activism Highlight 2026 Grammys Red Carpet

72854838547d3f8f2c449853b884243a87a2c853.summary: A powerful snowstorm brought subzero temperatures and nearly half a meter of snow to southern U.S. states, causing travel disruptions and high winds. In Florida, cold weather led to iguanas falling from trees as they became stunned by the unusual chill.
72854838547d3f8f2c449853b884243a87a2c853.headline: Snowstorm Disrupts Southern U.S

aec7b5f5c461599204c957d3d7e97c1d34cc7f8b.summary: Swiss prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into the owners of Le Constellation bar in Crans-Montana after a fire during New Year's celebrations killed 41 people. The latest victim, an 18-year-old Swiss national, died in hospital, raising the death toll. Authorities in Wallis canton are overseeing the case.
aec7b5f5c461599204c957d3d7e97c1d34cc7f8b.headline: Death Toll in Crans Montana Bar Fire Rises to 41 as Probe

d5cf5f21a6db8c01a7790c757d0a8dc080212b52.summary: A Russian strike on Ukrainian coal mining facilities killed at least 12 miners, according to DTEK. The attack occurred amid ongoing winter conditions and recent efforts by President Trump and others to encourage negotiations between Russia and Ukraine.
d5cf5f21a6db8c01a7790c757d0a8dc080212b52.headline: Russian Strike on Ukrainian Coal Mines Kills at Least 12 Miners

b7d72352a5d7effc58d231a34f34561870fe17c4.summary: Gold, silver, and copper prices fell sharply after reaching record highs in January, with analysts attributing the decline to market fallout and heavy speculation by Chinese investors.
b7d72352a5d7effc58d231a34f34561870fe17c4.headline: Gold Silver and Copper Prices Drop Sharply After January Highs

866c5429db9c919c7f75df4712a24653a0fc977b.summary: Mehdi Mahmoudian, co-writer of the Oscar-nominated Iranian drama 'It Was Just an Accident,' was arrested in Tehran after signing a letter criticizing the government's response to protests. He is among several individuals detained in connection with the letter.

bed82f46dc0ce7f14e2b524f0c09f950724cc3f3.summary: At the 2026 Grammys, artists including Bad Bunny and Billie Eilish used the event to protest immigration enforcement, while stars like Sabrina Carpenter were noted for standout fashion.

8f27da52907aa90acc56cb16f386820b90face7a.summary: Asia's factory activity increased in February 2026, driven by strong global demand. In China, export-oriented manufacturers reported growth, reflecting improved international orders across the region.
8f27da52907aa90acc56cb16f386820b90face7a.headline: Asias Factory Activity Grows on Strong Global and Export Demand

40c2c4e3afcb55e9c0c64c964ca37550c049d7bf.summary: A bomb cyclone caused freezing temperatures and heavy snow across the eastern US, with about 150 million people under cold weather advisories. Two people died in storm-related incidents in North Carolina. Southern Florida recorded its coldest temperatures since 1989.

The crossing, closed since May 2024, now permits only dozens of people to cross daily with no goods allowed. The move is part of efforts linked to the second phase of a U.S.-backed ceasefire deal.

21d611392008a9a2cf3302683875cb212037940f.summary: The Bureau of Labor Statistics announced that the January 2026 jobs report will be delayed due to a partial government shutdown. Tax refunds and air travel are also being affected. The BLS will reschedule the release of the jobs report and other economic data originally planned for this week.

0d1a35e5e51b95fa72530298557522d1016e56b4.summary: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks are set to face each other in Super Bowl 60 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California, on Sunday, February 8, 2026. This marks a rematch of their previous Super Bowl meeting 11 years ago. Betting odds, prop bets, and predictions are available, and the event will feature pregame performances and a halftime show.
0d1a35e5e51b95fa72530298557522d1016e56b4.headline: Patriots and Seahawks to Meet in Super Bowl 60 Rematch on Feb.

19f05dbb66a2bfe7786725c3ec174dc62c5bdfd5.summary: Marius Borg Høiby, son of Norway's crown princess, has been remanded in custody for four weeks following new allegations. His detention comes just before his scheduled trial on charges including rape.
19f05dbb66a2bfe7786725c3ec174dc62c5bdfd5.headline: Marius Borg Høiby Detained on New Allegations Before Rape Trial

The closure is part of a planned reconstruction effort and follows backlash from performers. Lawmakers are also addressing a partial government shutdown unrelated to the Kennedy Center closure.
c9c7d172e0d587f2f4923fdd386f250e1a45d6cf.headline: Trump Announces Two Year Closure of Kennedy Center for Renovations

5469bde7d02f0725ea1f66d3fd3e28d0dbf3f806.summary: The NFL has announced a multiyear agreement to play more regular-season games at Real Madrid's Santiago Bernabeu Stadium, continuing its presence in Madrid for 2026 and beyond. The teams for the 2026 games have not yet been determined.

9820c085a4a024e112c5f2d4909bc1b5569d6e9c.summary: The NFL announced it will hold its first regular-season game in France during the 2026 season, with the New Orleans Saints set to play at the Stade de France in Paris. The opponent for the game has not yet been announced.
9820c085a4a024e112c5f2d4909bc1b5569d6e9c.headline: NFL to Hold First Regular Season Game in Paris in 2026 With

d4fffdfca657a4aab3a9dcd2c62cd8bb919cc570.summary: LeBron James has been named an NBA All-Star reserve for the 22nd consecutive year, extending his record. The league announced the All-Star reserves for the February 15 game, which will be held at the Los Angeles Clippers’ arena in Inglewood, California.
d4fffdfca657a4aab3a9dcd2c62cd8bb919cc570.headline: LeBron James Named NBA All Star for Record 22nd Straight Year

5877c8f4ee8d87ea8e87dcda09a88b712e6077b4.summary: Laura Fernández has won Costa Rica's presidential election in a landslide, according to preliminary results. Her campaign focused on addressing rising violence linked to the cocaine trade. The election comes amid record-breaking violence affecting the country's reputation for peace.

8b77694643e44adc3c75c53674a78f4eb4647c1f.summary: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu has used special constitutional powers to pass France's 2026 budget without a parliamentary vote. The minority government survived a series of no-confidence motions, ending a prolonged budget standoff.
8b77694643e44adc3c75c53674a78f4eb4647c1f.headline: Lecornu Uses Special Powers to Pass 2026 French Budget

1cf997b6851c32dc6457d9168437350501558edd.summary: Deanna Stellato-Dudek and Maxime Deschamps have withdrawn from the figure skating team event at the Milan Cortina Olympics after Stellato-Dudek was injured in training. Lia Pereira and Trennt Michaud will replace them in the team event. Stellato-Dudek's participation in the upcoming pairs competition is still being evaluated.
1cf997b6851c32dc6457d9168437350501558edd.headline: Stellato Dudek and Deschamps Withdraw From Olympic Team Event After

1fddb1771cb5a7ed7eae7eea9ec88e362e7a43e8.summary: Syrian state forces have entered a Kurdish-run city in northeastern Syria as part of a ceasefire agreement, replacing the Kurdish-led SDF's control in the area.

42f4007b6823bcf12565f7f384f6feff95b0df03.summary: Vladimir Motin has been convicted of gross negligence manslaughter after a crew member died when his vessel collided with a tanker carrying fuel for the US military.
42f4007b6823bcf12565f7f384f6feff95b0df03.headline: Vladimir Motin Convicted in Fatal US Tanker Collision

bb4c6ac7669548c135cf7a722261dea7196c016e.summary: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have been released from a US immigration detention facility in Texas and have returned to Minnesota.
bb4c6ac7669548c135cf7a722261dea7196c016e.headline: Liam Conejo Ramos and Father Released From ICE Facility

ad40069d6b9084be5bd4c49614f8426680005da5.summary: Trump has launched a $12 billion critical minerals stockpile to reduce US reliance on China and support domestic manufacturing. The US Export-Import Bank will provide $10 billion in debt financing for Project Vault, which is part of this effort.
ad40069d6b9084be5bd4c49614f8426680005da5.headline: Trump Launches $12B Minerals Stockpile

d64aee7996af05947a4174bfcbc6c2ec74a29133.summary: British Medical Association members in England have voted to authorize further strike action for another six months in their ongoing dispute with the government over pay and jobs.

36a1b3f6e385c826ab1b0c1f659d564dbf64cb1e.summary: The 68th Grammy Awards were held in Los Angeles on February 2, 2026, with winners announced across major categories. Prominent artists such as Beyoncé, Jay-Z, Stevie Wonder, and Paul McCartney remain among the top Grammy winners of all time.
36a1b3f6e385c826ab1b0c1f659d564dbf64cb1e.headline: Winners Announced at 68th Grammy Awards in Los Angeles

Officials have identified her and are treating her home as a crime scene. Signs indicate she did not leave alone. The investigation is ongoing.

e7d588d26ec6e1333399d9fc6c9f28864596dc08.summary: An urgent investigation has been ordered into Lord Mandelson's contact with Jeffrey Epstein during Mandelson's time as a minister. The prime minister faces criticism from opponents for not acting against the Labour peer earlier.

5e187ac0c67eb93abc66d7ed3e503dec319a87c6.summary: Keir Starmer has ordered an inquiry into Peter Mandelson's conduct as business secretary after reports surfaced that Mandelson appeared to leak government information to Jeffrey Epstein.

8cec496568a7a47e640ecf1a5b5caff6ca5bf14e.summary: U.S. and Iran are scheduled to hold nuclear talks on Friday, with regional powers facilitating the meeting to help prevent further conflict in the Middle East. The talks come amid a recent military buildup in the region.

3d054aeea56738b1f2117a86e8cedec577ebb701.summary: Silver and gold prices continued to decline after last week's historic drop, extending losses that followed a record-breaking rally in precious metals.
3d054aeea56738b1f2117a86e8cedec577ebb701.headline: Silver and Gold Prices Continue Decline After Historic Drop

The Mandarin transliteration of his name is considered auspicious for the Year of the Horse, driving the trend.

The map, approved by voters, is expected to favor Democrats and could give them five additional seats in the U.S. House of Representatives.

93016f3e108f2eddf11e0104ba147078814794e4.summary: Brad Karp has resigned as chairman of the Paul Weiss law firm following the release of Department of Justice documents revealing his communications with Jeffrey Epstein. Karp cited the resulting distraction as the reason for stepping down. Scott Barshay will take over as chairman.

The deal comes a year after Dallas traded Luka Doncic to the Los Angeles Lakers for a package led by Davis. The Mavericks are moving on from the criticized Doncic-for-Davis trade, which was made by former general manager Nico Harrison.

f32075b23bd9f03108756974a700a04c95467abb.summary: Ukrainian and Russian negotiators have begun a second day of US-led peace talks in Abu Dhabi, following what both sides described as a productive first round. Despite ongoing obstacles, Volodymyr Zelenskyy expects the negotiations to soon result in another prisoner exchange.

896d99bb8e657ec6d1892fb1a7c958eca1f6b546.summary: Matvei Gridin recorded his first multi-point NHL game with a goal and an assist, helping the Calgary Flames defeat the Edmonton Oilers 4-3 on Wednesday. Ryan Lomberg scored the go-ahead goal in the third period, while Jonathan Huberdeau and Connor Zary also contributed goals for Calgary.
896d99bb8e657ec6d1892fb1a7c958eca1f6b546.headline: Gridin Leads Flames to 4 3 Win Over Oilers With First Multi

d401926cb836385580820dedcbe2284254a46ef3.summary: Portland defeated No. 6 Gonzaga 87-80 on Wednesday, marking the Pilots' first win over a top-10 team and ending Gonzaga's 15-game winning streak. Joel Foxwell led Portland with 27 points. The upset came shortly after Portland coach Shantay Legans suffered an Achilles injury in practice.

c7a7a6f660dc15371e6aa85be542d20b78e02bbb.summary: Mickey Lolich, the 1968 World Series MVP who led the Detroit Tigers to victory with three complete-game wins, died Wednesday at age 85 after a short stay in hospice care. The cause of death was not specified.
c7a7a6f660dc15371e6aa85be542d20b78e02bbb.headline: 1968 World Series MVP Mickey Lolich Dies at 85

130f613ed4af2480cbdd1b19091ea546709244e1.summary: Savannah Guthrie and her siblings released a video statement urging the safe return of their mother, Nancy Guthrie, 84, who police say was taken by force from her Tucson area home. Authorities have not identified any suspects. The family acknowledged media reports about a ransom letter related to the case.
130f613ed4af2480cbdd1b19091ea546709244e1.headline: Savannah Guthrie Appeals for Safe Return of Mother Amid Abduction

a31e4bcaa51b08cc867506cd836413f925ee14a6.summary: Ryan Routh was sentenced to life in prison by Judge Aileen Cannon for attempting to assassinate President Trump on his Florida golf course in September 2024. Prosecutors stated that Routh showed no remorse for the incident.

8fce3af4147f923d4df1f655da3da4bccba99fa7.summary: Ukrainian and Russian negotiators held US-brokered talks in the UAE, completing a 'productive' first day. Discussions focused on the status of eastern Ukrainian territory and security guarantees for Ukraine. No details or outcomes have been made public.
8fce3af4147f923d4df1f655da3da4bccba99fa7.headline: Ukraine and Russia Hold US Brokered Talks in UAE Amid Ongoing Conflict

7f49bd34f0c6c30f86b1410b1c7ac0efaf29b184.summary: Isiah Kiner-Falefa and the Boston Red Sox have agreed to a one-year contract, according to multiple reports. Miguel Andujar has also agreed to a one-year, $4 million contract with the San Diego Padres.
7f49bd34f0c6c30f86b1410b1c7ac0efaf29b184.headline: Red Sox Sign Kiner Falefa

a5bb0b8be5ba5116e675d7e90fd13860336f1c19.summary: Images reviewed by BBC Verify show partially clothed women with their faces and bodies unredacted, contributing to ongoing public scrutiny and questions about a developing scandal.
a5bb0b8be5ba5116e675d7e90fd13860336f1c19.headline: Unredacted Images Emerge in Ongoing Scandal

3f63b240c738876695f9a30259749fed85e5da08.summary: Ken Wiebe discussed the possibility that Winnipeg Jets forward Jonathan Toews may be open to a trade to a contender before the deadline, if it would also benefit the Jets. No trade has been made yet.
3f63b240c738876695f9a30259749fed85e5da08.headline: Jonathan Toews May Consider Trade From Jets If Mutually Beneficial

3357ba748f83bbd78ff4695bc102aa31d3518c26.summary: An individual has been charged in Western Australia for allegedly throwing a homemade bomb at a crowd protesting Australia Day. This is the first time someone has been prosecuted for this specific offense in the state.
3357ba748f83bbd78ff4695bc102aa31d3518c26.headline: First Charge Filed in WA for Homemade Bomb Attack at Australia Day

b74413937fe4e30a769a2c8d20658f7ee22af910.summary: The US has proposed forming a preferential trade bloc with allies, including Mexico, to coordinate policies and establish a price floor system for critical minerals. The initiative aims to reduce reliance on China and strengthen supply chains among participating countries.
b74413937fe4e30a769a2c8d20658f7ee22af910.headline: US Proposes Trade Bloc With Allies to Strengthen Critical Minerals

64b135d28511f720bed4d5e7d8d7af7603dec829.summary: Illinois and New York City have announced they will join the World Health Organization’s Global Outbreak Alert and Response Network. This move follows the earlier withdrawal of the United States from the WHO and aligns with similar actions taken by California.
64b135d28511f720bed4d5e7d8d7af7603dec829.headline: Illinois and New York City Join WHO Global Outbreak Response Network

085773d797af4fe231d130af5ee022c39619a38c.summary: Qualcomm's stock declined as a persistent memory chip shortage negatively impacted its sales forecast and smartphone chip market performance. Concerns also affected Arm, with both companies experiencing pressure from the ongoing supply issues.
085773d797af4fe231d130af5ee022c39619a38c.headline: Qualcomm Shares Fall Amid Ongoing Memory Chip Shortage

92c62740501a70e8660a176bb751cf84e213e19e.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor has moved out of his Windsor residence and relocated to King Charles III's private estate following renewed scrutiny over his association with Jeffrey Epstein. He was stripped of his titles in 2025 and required to leave his official home.
92c62740501a70e8660a176bb751cf84e213e19e.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Leaves Windsor Home After Epstein

26adb2d90690e0f13a33065b396d42683cc3b5ba.summary: An email believed to be from Ghislaine Maxwell, released in the latest Epstein files, appears to confirm the authenticity of a photograph showing Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor with Virginia Giuffre. Andrew had previously questioned whether the image was doctored and denied meeting Giuffre.
26adb2d90690e0f13a33065b396d42683cc3b5ba.headline: Maxwell Email Appears to Confirm Authenticity of Andrew Giuffre Photo

2b53c222a46835b2f5ccfcbb7a347f5621ca1bac.summary: Israeli airstrikes in Gaza killed at least 21 Palestinians, according to Gaza officials. Israel reported that one of its soldiers was critically wounded in an attack by Palestinian gunmen.
2b53c222a46835b2f5ccfcbb7a347f5621ca1bac.headline: Israeli Airstrikes Kill at Least 21 in Gaza

1165599c3d33d685f759d791a2fd0983381dd344.summary: Arm Holdings shares declined after the company reported licensing sales below expectations, even as overall revenues reached record highs driven by AI demand.
1165599c3d33d685f759d791a2fd0983381dd344.headline: Arm Holdings Shares Drop After Licensing Sales Miss Estimates

d21162415a6b35c90ddadf2563cc3b6823c069c8.summary: The Trump administration has withdrawn 700 immigration agents from Minnesota, according to multiple sources. The removal is effective immediately, but thousands of immigration officers remain in the state.

456791a1318e2fa256eb2160bb6bbb39743c0e00.summary: AMD shares fell 17% after its latest earnings report. While AMD reported results that beat expectations, the gains were less impressive than anticipated, and high operating expenses raised concerns among investors.
456791a1318e2fa256eb2160bb6bbb39743c0e00.headline: AMD Stock Drops 17% After Earnings Report Raises Cost Concerns

972bbf6c149130147e14b965b81f3f40bf09a7b7.summary: The Green Bay Packers ended the 2025 season with a five-game losing streak, culminating in a 31-27 loss to the Chicago Bears in the NFC Wild Card game.
972bbf6c149130147e14b965b81f3f40bf09a7b7.headline: Packers End 2025 Season With Five Game Losing Streak and Playoff Exit

4b0456f87e1032d222b099dce28b92731907414a.summary: Donald Trump stated that Iran's supreme leader should be 'very worried' ahead of talks scheduled for Friday. Following his remarks, oil prices rose.
4b0456f87e1032d222b099dce28b92731907414a.headline: Trump Warns Iran Ahead of Talks

2879230b5d335eb2c10242c6ee06f843f3783cb5.summary: Seattle Seahawks safety Nick Emmanwori injured his ankle during Wednesday's practice but is expected to play in Super Bowl LX. Coach Mike Macdonald and Emmanwori both indicated there is little concern about his availability for Sunday's game.
2879230b5d335eb2c10242c6ee06f843f3783cb5.headline: Seahawks Expect Nick Emmanwori to Play in Super Bowl LX After Ankle

481d0a154c8d7aff05fb25f0251e4b34ef675eb5.summary: The Milwaukee Bucks have confirmed they will keep Giannis Antetokounmpo through the NBA trade deadline and have started making other trades. While speculation about his future continues, Antetokounmpo will remain with the Bucks for the rest of the season. The team completed a three-team trade involving Cole Anthony, Amir Coffey, Nigel Hayes-Davis, Ousmane Dieng, and Nick Richards.
481d0a154c8d7aff05fb25f0251e4b34ef675eb5.headline: Bucks Keep Giannis Antetokounmpo Through NBA Trade Deadline

05192322c75a9e416090489e3e129266ee6b323d.summary: Tarik Skubal won his salary arbitration case against the Detroit Tigers and will receive a record $32 million for the 2026 season, surpassing previous arbitration salary records. The arbitration panel ruled in Skubal's favor after the Tigers had offered $19 million, resulting in a $13 million difference.
05192322c75a9e416090489e3e129266ee6b323d.headline: Tarik Skubal Wins Record $32 Million in Arbitration With Tigers

c3f06e83b7a191f2c9e4deb7b1fdb61983f48821.summary: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has apologized for appointing Peter Mandelson as US ambassador after newly released documents revealed Mandelson's close ties to Jeffrey Epstein. Starmer expressed regret over the decision, apologized to Epstein's victims, and stated he was unaware of the full extent of Mandelson's relationship with Epstein at the time of the appointment.
c3f06e83b7a191f2c9e4deb7b1fdb61983f48821.headline: UK PM Starmer Apologizes for Mandelson US Envoy Appointment Over

bffb060cb57c601dc00fdd7aba160985d54be752.summary: The Trump administration has finalized a rule that removes job protections for up to 50,000 federal employees, making it easier to hire and fire senior staff. The Office of Personnel Management stated the change targets officials who intentionally subvert presidential directives and alters protections for whistleblowers.
bffb060cb57c601dc00fdd7aba160985d54be752.headline: Trump Administration Finalizes Rule Easing Firing of Senior Federal

193c35fdaba5dfc6e08d2e873f87ecd39147ee0f.summary: The US and Iran have agreed to hold nuclear talks in Muscat on Friday, following days of uncertainty over the location and format. The White House confirmed the meeting after Arab states intervened to keep negotiations on track, salvaging the talks that were initially set for Turkey.
193c35fdaba5dfc6e08d2e873f87ecd39147ee0f.headline: US and Iran to Hold Nuclear Talks in Muscat After Location Dispute

87af10635cafc1f4b99fc9097d26efd344f914bd.summary: The Los Angeles Rams will play the San Francisco 49ers in the first-ever NFL regular-season game in Australia. The matchup is scheduled for the 2026 season at Melbourne Cricket Ground in Melbourne and will be one of nine international games on the NFL's 2026 schedule.
87af10635cafc1f4b99fc9097d26efd344f914bd.headline: Rams and 49ers to Play NFLs First Regular Season Game in Australia

7a04defd617c3b36448e5684fdd1e6aa4d1953c1.summary: The 2026 Winter Olympics began in Milan with the opening ceremony at San Siro stadium, which is expected to be demolished soon. The snowboard competition is underway, while ski jumping faces scrutiny over unproven doping allegations involving acid injections. The World Anti-Doping Agency stated it will investigate if credible evidence emerges.
7a04defd617c3b36448e5684fdd1e6aa4d1953c1.headline: 2026 Winter Olympics Open in Milan Amid Doping Scrutiny in Ski Jumping

958acb256bb43c99fe1d7dc9c7b7626ee6e1f46c.summary: The United States and Russia have agreed to reestablish high-level military-to-military talks for the first time since 2021, despite ongoing challenges in Ukraine-Russia peace negotiations. Communication channels had been suspended prior to Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

024ce40932c52bdadca6942b46e43122930dd646.summary: The Minnesota Timberwolves acquired guard Ayo Dosunmu and Julian Phillips from the Chicago Bulls in exchange for Rob Dillingham, Leonard Miller, and four second-round picks. Dosunmu is averaging 15 points, 3 rebounds, and 3.6 assists this season. The move aims to strengthen the Timberwolves' roster for the playoff race.

Paul Weiss stated that Karp did not participate in any misconduct. The resignation comes after the Department of Justice released documents related to Epstein.
5f255be3f8da1f8cd24b92a038561c8fd4a69dec.headline: Brad Karp Resigns as Paul Weiss Chairman After Epstein Email Release

5d4bac918b4e3aa1c4ec27accd6b6c000559dc45.summary: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks are set to face each other in Super Bowl 60 on Sunday, February 8, 2026, in Santa Clara, California. Sports analysts and models have released their predictions and betting picks for the matchup. Details about pregame performances and halftime entertainment have also been announced ahead of the event.
5d4bac918b4e3aa1c4ec27accd6b6c000559dc45.headline: Patriots and Seahawks to Meet in Super Bowl 60 on February 8

21f2d75d2e3fdc87b2d63fd8844ade961a1a54cf.summary: The Los Angeles Lakers have acquired guard Luke Kennard from the Atlanta Hawks in exchange for guard Gabe Vincent and a 2032 second-round draft pick. The trade was made ahead of the NBA trade deadline and is pending league approval.
21f2d75d2e3fdc87b2d63fd8844ade961a1a54cf.headline: Lakers Trade Gabe Vincent and Pick to Hawks for Luke Kennard

a5a3ed781a4d4d0637b255fe985af7032f03b47c.summary: Novo Nordisk has announced it will take legal action against Hims & Hers over the sale of compounded versions of its weight loss drug Wegovy. Hims & Hers recently began offering a similar pill for $49 per month, compared to Novo Nordisk's $149 price for the branded product.
a5a3ed781a4d4d0637b255fe985af7032f03b47c.headline: Novo Nordisk Sues Hims & Hers Over Compounded Wegovy Sales

1b128840f0f0917cb39cece64f05c7a2792a36df.summary: Trump stated that Bondi instructed Gabbard to be present at the Georgia raid.
1b128840f0f0917cb39cece64f05c7a2792a36df.headline: Trump Says Bondi Told Gabbard to Attend Georgia Raid

7f5a91228ea2be55e5b9d496ff8a6e5cfaf1fe68.summary: US companies announced more job cuts in January 2026 than in any January since 2009, according to new data, indicating increased layoffs and signs of further weakness in the labor market.
7f5a91228ea2be55e5b9d496ff8a6e5cfaf1fe68.headline: US Job Cuts in January 2026 Reach Highest Level Since 2009

041f3ef49cfa534530a55aed8e1855a62e805faf.summary: An inquiry led by Sir Ross Cranston found that systemic failures by authorities contributed to the 2021 Channel small-boat disaster, in which about 30 people died while attempting to reach Britain from France. The report also blamed people smugglers for the incident.
041f3ef49cfa534530a55aed8e1855a62e805faf.headline: Inquiry Finds Systemic Failures Led to 2021 Channel Boat Tragedy

6849f481d3460fdade16e8a727c1ba889d984072.summary: Ilia Topuria is expected to fight interim lightweight champion Justin Gaethje next, following news that Topuria is preparing to return to training.
6849f481d3460fdade16e8a727c1ba889d984072.headline: Ilia Topuria Set to Face Justin Gaethje After Return to Training

cd44c473b6b91b37db46b5758db149d599a21a97.summary: Ukraine and Russia exchanged 157 prisoners of war each during talks in Abu Dhabi, marking their most significant contact in months. Despite the exchange, negotiations ended without progress toward ending the conflict.

c5180b0a3b91d867d7f7449e0a6fe45e7c47090e.summary: The US has cut contact with the Polish parliament speaker after remarks described as insulting to President Trump. US Ambassador Tom Rose stated that the US will not allow harm to US-Polish relations or disrespect toward President Trump.

2b53c222a46835b2f5ccfcbb7a347f5621ca1bac.summary: Israeli airstrikes in Gaza killed at least 21 Palestinians, according to Gaza officials. Israel reported that one of its soldiers was critically wounded after an attack by Palestinian gunmen. The violence follows continued clashes in the region.
2b53c222a46835b2f5ccfcbb7a347f5621ca1bac.headline: Israeli Airstrikes Kill at Least 21 in Gaza

64ef514b48602fab5751bd7c7539dfa7141342bf.summary: Anthropic has released Opus 4.6, describing it as its most capable AI model for businesses and knowledge work. The company says the model offers improved coding, can sustain tasks for longer periods, and produces high-quality professional output.
64ef514b48602fab5751bd7c7539dfa7141342bf.headline: Anthropic Launches Opus 4.6 AI Model With Enhanced Business Features

f6df1202414376468df1e1e8753b2c6ef22f7006.summary: The Bank of England has kept interest rates unchanged at 3.75%, stating it needs stronger evidence that inflation will fall to its 2% target. The bank noted that anti-inflation measures in Rachel Reeves’s budget could support rate cuts in the coming months. UK inflation rose to 3.4% in December, marking its first increase in five months.

afcbb5c5c9731e47a49ea9e0146e324fd3ce9be3.headline: U.S. Job Openings Fall to Lowest Level Since 2020

fb7a88c5f58f1fe6a3bde5829b4fbf81126aea7b.summary: Bitcoin fell below $70,000, erasing gains made since Trump's win. The cryptocurrency's value returned to its November 2024 level amid a broader sell-off in tech stocks.
fb7a88c5f58f1fe6a3bde5829b4fbf81126aea7b.headline: Bitcoin Falls Below $70

3d6bdcebcb04ed2613f7ca8245ff9ba66a5f39b8.summary: NASA and ESA released the sharpest Hubble Space Telescope image of NGC 7722, a lenticular galaxy about 187 million light-years away in the constellation Pegasus. The image, published on January 30, 2026, highlights concentric rings of dust and gas around the galaxy's bright center.
3d6bdcebcb04ed2613f7ca8245ff9ba66a5f39b8.headline: Hubble Captures Sharpest Image Yet of Galaxy NGC 7722

9890d48ba82c6477e212cfa5edb883264a0c727f.summary: The Trump administration is withdrawing 700 immigration officers from Minnesota effective immediately, as confirmed by multiple sources.
9890d48ba82c6477e212cfa5edb883264a0c727f.headline: Trump Administration Withdraws 700 Immigration Officers from Minnesota

c4d4451169a29d46e15f484c26520c5130125095.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor has relocated to King Charles III's private estate after losing his titles and residence last year, following increased scrutiny over his connections to Jeffrey Epstein.
c4d4451169a29d46e15f484c26520c5130125095.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Moves to King Charles IIIs Estate

e1cdf110128fce796cde0d493ce6f39bfbd29195.summary: Democrats have sent a letter to Republican leaders outlining ten demands as part of ongoing negotiations over funding for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), emphasizing a 'law and order' approach in the debate over a potential ICE shutdown.
e1cdf110128fce796cde0d493ce6f39bfbd29195.headline: Democrats Issue Ten Demands in ICE Funding Negotiations

b75cfc88a1e9187deb4d5d89f4aef4b664026f6a.summary: The United States and Iran have begun high-level talks in Oman focused on Iran's nuclear program, with the U.S. seeking 'zero nuclear capability' from Iran. The negotiations come amid heightened tensions, increased U.S. military presence in the region, and recent unrest in Iran. Both sides confirmed the meeting after days of uncertainty about its timing and location.
b75cfc88a1e9187deb4d5d89f4aef4b664026f6a.headline: US and Iran Begin Nuclear Talks in Oman Amid Rising Tensions

c4593b1902d7a784f802d8cf6f78e102ac59e69b.summary: Lieutenant General Vladimir Alekseyev, a deputy chief of Russian military intelligence, was shot several times outside his apartment in Moscow and is in critical condition. The unidentified attacker fled the scene. Authorities are investigating the incident, which follows similar attacks on senior Russian military figures.
c4593b1902d7a784f802d8cf6f78e102ac59e69b.headline: Russian Military Intelligence Deputy Chief Shot and Critically

e6dabb4a174ea4507c30f0d4624f24b042fd5142.summary: TrumpRx, a new website offering discounted prices on select drugs from companies like Novo Nordisk and Eli Lilly, has launched. The platform aims to match the lowest international prices for certain medicines, including weight-loss and fertility drugs. It remains uncertain if all patients, especially those with insurance, will benefit from additional savings.
e6dabb4a174ea4507c30f0d4624f24b042fd5142.headline: TrumpRx Drug Discount Website Launches With Lower Prices on Select

During his acceptance speech, Stafford announced he will return to play for the Los Angeles Rams in the 2026 season. He led the league in passing yards and touchdowns during the 2025 season.
dd16b60983c57a05be0a6d9b979c3828d781ea54.headline: Matthew Stafford Wins NFL MVP and Confirms Return to Rams in 2026

Drew Brees and Larry Fitzgerald were selected in their first year of eligibility, joined by Adam Vinatieri, Luke Kuechly, and Roger Craig. Bill Belichick was not selected. The five inductees will be honored in Canton, Ohio this summer.
be6abf823c740a20ff7cd3a3f5c697cd72a7f7d8.headline: Brees Fitzgerald Lead Five Inductees in 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame

ae17fc63b937155afafacaabde37f8cb9789f4fa.summary: A new agreement between the two countries cuts hundreds of reciprocal tariffs and increases quotas for key goods, such as Argentine beef, addressing a major concern for American ranchers.
ae17fc63b937155afafacaabde37f8cb9789f4fa.headline: Two Countries Sign Deal to Cut Tariffs and Expand Trade Quotas

b05c2ac7cc26d5e0801d35233a3ee133d15e3422.summary: The 2026 NBA trade deadline has passed, with several teams making significant roster changes. Analysts have identified various winners and losers from the trade period, highlighting the impact of recent player movements across the league, including changes to the Boston Celtics roster.
b05c2ac7cc26d5e0801d35233a3ee133d15e3422.headline: 2026 NBA Trade Deadline Ends with Major Roster Changes Across League

0265cfd36acceee27f7367ff2f774c3ff1f63868.summary: Cleveland Guardians pitcher Emmanuel Clase is accused of rigging pitches to benefit bettors in at least 48 games over two years, according to a court document. This is a higher number than the nine games initially identified by prosecutors in their indictment.
0265cfd36acceee27f7367ff2f774c3ff1f63868.headline: Emmanuel Clase Accused of Rigging Pitches in 48 Games

c0e79c483473c56cad1b7c628be1b6552cfa7b3f.summary: The average UK house price exceeded £300,000 for the first time in January 2026, according to Halifax. Property prices rose by 0.7% in the month, marking the fastest rate of increase since November 2024.

79102a80bf7fbb19c4ca702ea321ee2d9492c571.summary: The US and Russia have agreed to reestablish high-level military-to-military talks for the first time in over four years. The decision follows discussions on ending the Ukraine war and comes as a key nuclear treaty between the two countries has expired.

This move would keep Pickens with the team for the 2026 season, guaranteeing him $28 million. The result marks the largest parliamentary majority in decades, with markets reacting positively and stocks reaching record highs.

Seattle's defense dominated the game, with Kenneth Walker III earning Super Bowl MVP honors after gaining 161 yards from scrimmage. Jason Myers set a Super Bowl record with five field goals, and Uchenna Nwosu sealed the win with a late interception return for a touchdown.

Lai, who pleaded not guilty, received the longest sentence so far under the law. The verdict has drawn international criticism and prompted the UK to expand visa eligibility for Hongkongers.

65b540088df429e7f5378218dbb3b12381908c75.summary: US forces boarded a Venezuela-linked oil tanker in the Indian Ocean without incident, citing enforcement of a US-imposed quarantine on oil tankers departing Venezuela. The Pentagon stated it will continue to uphold the blockade as ordered by Trump.

408cb7315198e387d45bf5f0e267c2dd5b6f64b8.summary: Super Bowl LX commercials attracted about 130 million viewers, with several ads featuring celebrities and artificial intelligence drawing particular attention. Analysts and commentators highlighted standout commercials and ranked their favorites following the game between the Seattle Seahawks and the New England Patriots.

e60502fe982803d47fe391547d8fe8149cae721d.summary: Lindsey Vonn's father said she will not return to the Winter Olympics and will no longer race following her recent leg injury during the downhill event, if he has any influence over her decision.

Only two survivors were rescued. The incident is part of a wider toll of at least 484 migrant deaths or disappearances in the central Mediterranean so far this year.

f83207969d5aee439cda17f0f597012c2505419b.summary: Venezuela released at least 35 opposition members from detention, but Juan Pablo Guanipa, a prominent opposition politician, was re-arrested by security forces hours after his release. The move is part of the company's efforts to raise funds for artificial intelligence investments.

b84bed0df903a2bb77b931b12ba56d62c57ad7bf.summary: In late January 2026, a prolonged cold spell caused significant ice buildup along the Hudson River near Manhattan. cfda45336ff44439f7369dcf66fd85b2c67aa3c0.summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the New England Patriots 29-13 at Levi's Stadium to win their second Super Bowl. Kenneth Walker III was named Super Bowl MVP. Fans celebrated in Seattle, and players including Sam Darnold and Walker marked the victory at Disneyland. The Seahawks' defense and key plays were highlighted as decisive factors in the win.

White underwent surgery and the team has not provided a timetable for his return. Police do not believe White was involved in the altercation that led to the shooting.

The company cited a need to strengthen its balance sheet following weaker annual profits and lower oil prices.

Civic groups criticized the police response as excessive. The visit, invited by Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, was held to honor victims of the Bondi Beach shooting. Authorities have called for calm following the unrest.

ab18984d005873ca20eeddc774b63b8d0b840d53.summary: SportsLine's model and various analysts have released predictions and betting picks for multiple NBA and college basketball games scheduled for February 10, 2026, including Pacers vs. Knicks, Bucks vs. Magic, Rockets vs. Clippers, Spurs vs. Lakers, and others. Predictions for the Winter Olympics women's hockey game between the U.S. and Canada have also been published.
ab18984d005873ca20eeddc774b63b8d0b840d53.headline: Predictions Released for NBA

Nancy Guthrie, 84 and mother of Savannah Guthrie, remains missing as authorities and her family urge the public to help with the ongoing investigation.

This marks Ingram's second All-Star selection. Ingram is averaging 22 points, 5.8 rebounds, and 3.7 assists per game this season.
fc90a616bdbd515b5df5954517e743cc0b5040a1.headline: Brandon Ingram Replaces Injured Curry in NBA All Star Game

Discovery by offering to cover Netflix break-up fees and adding a 'ticking fee' that pays shareholders extra for each quarter the deal remains unclosed. The move aims to attract investors as Warner Bros. Discovery shareholders await a vote on a separate Netflix deal, expected no earlier than March.
617fbbdea5044c97ea8a7bc97056a8974d6f0f60.headline: Paramount Enhances Warner Bros. Bid With Fees to Attract Investors

Lutnick claims he had little contact with Epstein, but newly released records indicate a more extensive relationship. He faces bipartisan calls to resign following these revelations.

4c430e39240927ff0ba47b72c1bcc86d1d1e5f4c.summary: Alphabet is raising nearly $32 billion through a bond sale to increase investment in artificial intelligence, expanding the offering amid heightened competition in the AI sector.

Wasserman has apologized for his past communication with Maxwell following public backlash.

Airlines from other countries, including Russia, China, and Spain, have also been affected.

f8c784949556cbcef6304e453fe414e9e6148be9.summary: Prime Minister says he was unaware that Matthew Doyle had campaigned for a councillor who admitted to child indecent image offences. Lord Doyle has apologized for his past association with the former Labour councillor.

82f623966c6050c4d5f0d33782e078577c7ea4e4.summary: A 15-year-old boy has been sentenced to at least 13 years in custody for murdering 12-year-old Leo Ross, who was stabbed while walking home from school in Birmingham last year. Leo is believed to be the youngest victim of knife crime in the West Midlands.
82f623966c6050c4d5f0d33782e078577c7ea4e4.headline: Teen Sentenced to 13 Years for Fatal Stabbing of Leo Ross in

1edfa95f8d80ec6508f63dae4734abab60681d75.summary: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope has captured a new image of the Egg Nebula, showing dramatic light and shadow patterns created by recently ejected stardust. The nebula, located about 1,000 light-years away in the constellation Cygnus, contains a central star hidden by a dense cloud.

Montreal's police chief acknowledged similar issues can occur in other forces, referencing past cases involving officers accused of selling information to criminal groups.
a98eb1f73f55627a8b8c5da9bd5607e99d5aae28.headline: Toronto Police Officers Charged With Aiding Organized Crime

NASA astronaut Chris Williams documented the deployment using a camera from the station's cupola.

CEO Tarek Mansour stated the platform's Super Bowl trading volume rose 2,700% year-over-year.

23083b3c908f107d7ddf66d2b926578bf5b060a2.summary: Ghislaine Maxwell invoked the Fifth Amendment and declined to answer questions during a closed-door virtual deposition before the House Oversight Committee, as shown in video released by Chairman James Comer.

ab421e45b6203d6207373089f23c5b7de57601c6.summary: Violent clashes erupted in Sydney during Israeli President Isaac Herzog's visit, prompting Australia to call for calm. The unrest occurred amid widespread rallies and heightened protest restrictions following a recent deadly attack on a Jewish celebration.

34adbb2573b5e6b2fd76c4d843d9b57fb9823381.summary: The US military's Southern Command confirmed a strike on a vessel in the eastern Pacific on Monday, resulting in the deaths of two suspected drug smugglers. Rescuers are searching for a lone survivor following the incident.

dcea773688f0d07b1986a78ddfce3a6a1041decb.summary: Authorities have renewed their investigation at the Tucson home of an 84-year-old, searching the septic tank and examining rooftop cameras. Savannah Guthrie has publicly appealed for help in the case.
dcea773688f0d07b1986a78ddfce3a6a1041decb.headline: Authorities Renew Search at Tucson Home

e60dc9b9c7f3d870ef346d4c1ca714338301179c.summary: Super Bowl LX averaged 124.9 million viewers, a 2% decrease from last year and below the record set in 2025. Bad Bunny's halftime show drew 128.2 million viewers, also short of a record. Telemundo set a new record for Spanish-language Super Bowl broadcasts in the US with 3.3 million viewers.

c4b937edb510b7f1f10ea5c9045f8701fac10ffa.summary: A shooting at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School and a nearby residence in British Columbia left at least nine people dead and over 25 injured, including two with life-threatening injuries. Authorities described the suspect as a female in a dress with brown hair. The incident has deeply affected the remote town.
c4b937edb510b7f1f10ea5c9045f8701fac10ffa.headline: Nine Killed Over 25 Injured in Tumbler Ridge School Shooting

21fb0c2cc6f2c5bc6a2cfaceb18ea3bfc4a592b3.summary: A Washington DC grand jury declined to indict six Democratic lawmakers who made a video reminding military members of their right to refuse illegal orders. The decision follows criticism from Donald Trump, who had called the lawmakers 'traitors.' Federal prosecutors will not pursue charges.
21fb0c2cc6f2c5bc6a2cfaceb18ea3bfc4a592b3.headline: Grand Jury Declines to Indict Six Democrats Over Military Orders Video

4c4e971243749ad24a5a3736c3efcd066daf0247.summary: A person was detained during a traffic stop south of Tucson, Arizona, in connection with the disappearance and reported abduction of Nancy Guthrie. The Pima County Sheriff's Department and the FBI are questioning the individual. Guthrie, 84, has been missing for nine days. Authorities have released a photo of the suspect.

The IOC has warned that this could lead to his disqualification.

cec90a58185d4b775e67fb522963b09cf830ac13.summary: Three toddlers and a 34-year-old man were found dead in the ruins of a house in north-eastern Ukraine following Russian attacks. The assaults continue as the fourth anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion nears.

Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney and British Columbia Premier David Eby expressed condolences following the incident.
75ebc4acb0d8bdb1c48fd3d19fd0f33cd65a5026.headline: Ten Dead in Tumbler Ridge

ac50f44783a95f42a6f0f1f634de0255b908138b.summary: Heineken announced plans to cut up to 6,000 jobs, or about 7% of its global workforce, following a decline in annual beer sales. The company's shares rose 4% after the announcement.
ac50f44783a95f42a6f0f1f634de0255b908138b.headline: Heineken to Cut 6

97c5ceacd029bbec83b192cc52b1d0f0a53c390e.summary: Donald Trump stated he is considering sending a second U.S. aircraft carrier to the Middle East if talks with Iran do not succeed. This follows an inconclusive meeting between U.S. and Iranian officials last week. Trump also expressed opposition to Israeli annexation steps in the West Bank.

This marks the first conviction of its kind under the local national security law.

fc673bb63234c1ea981cccef9f84746125e41970.summary: The Trump administration announced it will revoke a key scientific finding that has underpinned U.S. regulation of greenhouse gas emissions since 2009, removing the basis for federal climate change policy. Climate groups have pledged to oppose the rollback.

c9a13c4a2b55b5636ae0ffb44a061e34bb0237fd.summary: The Israeli prime minister is meeting with Trump at the White House to urge the US to seek a deal halting Iran's uranium enrichment. Tehran has warned the US not to let Israel undermine efforts to reach an agreement on Iran's nuclear program.
c9a13c4a2b55b5636ae0ffb44a061e34bb0237fd.headline: Israeli Prime Minister Presses Trump on Iran Nuclear Deal at White

c3cda3a59cc8035c9612e0f1d0070e5012e262f9.summary: President Trump has threatened to block the opening of a new bridge between the U.S. and Canada, adding to ongoing challenges facing the project.

The victory marks the Spurs' fifth straight win, with Wembanyama achieving the highest-scoring half by a Spurs player in the 21st century.
ecb8290afb6f2d1a6cac974bbe195b1660806ef3.headline: Wembanyama Leads Spurs to Fifth Straight Win Over Lakers With 40

The injury comes just before the start of Spring Training, impacting the defending American League champions' roster plans.

abc4a032c3d55186ad8ac71686bf3fd05d37895c.summary: A Russian drone strike hit a home in Ukraine's Kharkiv region, killing a father and his three children, according to reports on February 11, 2026.

f7695389893a8d4e4d61e094abc38787f20e9110.summary: U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick admitted visiting Jeffrey Epstein's island and acknowledged meetings with Epstein that were more extensive than previously claimed. Lutnick is facing bipartisan calls to resign but has downplayed the relationship, stating he had minimal involvement with Epstein.

The incident occurred after Sexton made a free throw late in the third quarter on Monday. The NBA announced the fine on Tuesday.

37f017185ba7cf2c58238c4837124a28874a7e83.summary: Charlie Woods, son of Tiger Woods, has verbally committed to play golf at Florida State University as part of the 2027 recruiting class.

975d82549900caf59303026d6305910c1372e7f9.summary: San Antonio Spurs guard Stephon Castle suffered a bruised pelvis during Tuesday's win over the Los Angeles Lakers. X-rays were negative, and Castle was ruled out for the rest of the game. He is considered a game-time decision for the Spurs' next game against Golden State.
975d82549900caf59303026d6305910c1372e7f9.headline: Spurs Stephon Castle Injured

295210b16ff8abe5e3ddabccec9f1a22f9fa9061.summary: The Trump administration has removed the rainbow Pride flag from the Stonewall monument in New York, according to multiple reports.

098928bfca0e2f2543e35b0ccbd5cd22c715ad05.summary: Atlanta Braves pitcher Spencer Schwellenbach is expected to be sidelined for an extended period due to inflammation in his pitching elbow.
098928bfca0e2f2543e35b0ccbd5cd22c715ad05.headline: Braves Spencer Schwellenbach Out Indefinitely With Elbow Inflammation

16d07b9693cca0e4f223ad04fc675a52847be068.summary: Quebec's pension fund has suspended investments and deals with DP World after reports linked the company's chief executive to Jeffrey Epstein.

1bd6a8c2cb7850fcccd1395e45b6bcefbb964cee.summary: Online prediction market Kalshi reported a record trading day on Super Bowl Sunday, with over $1 billion in trading volume and $145 million in bets on events such as Bad Bunny’s opening song and halftime guests. CEO Tarek Mansour highlighted the platform's growth and record activity.
1bd6a8c2cb7850fcccd1395e45b6bcefbb964cee.headline: Kalshi Sets Record With Over $1 Billion in Super Bowl Trading Volume

78774d2fc39251e69a432de45687f3891f0ee8c2.summary: WestJet and Air Transat have cancelled flights to Cuba, following Air Canada. The cancellations are linked to the impact of the Trump administration's restrictions on oil shipments to Cuba, which have disrupted the island's travel industry.
78774d2fc39251e69a432de45687f3891f0ee8c2.headline: WestJet and Air Transat Cancel Cuba Flights Amid Oil Restrictions

c28fad3dd3177590a3ea92cdba3e64b3a738c34c.summary: Buddhist monks completed a 2,300-mile, 15-week walk for peace, arriving in Washington, DC to conclude their journey.
c28fad3dd3177590a3ea92cdba3e64b3a738c34c.headline: Buddhist Monks Complete 2

adea3f6a51fecd01ca9d5c3e648a3e61a2f26a18.summary: A mass shooting at a secondary school in a remote British Columbia town left ten people dead and dozens injured. Police responded to the incident and an investigation is underway.
adea3f6a51fecd01ca9d5c3e648a3e61a2f26a18.headline: Ten Killed Dozens Injured in British Columbia School Shooting

120927aa9218fa6815ceeff1b8fc93455b4886a8.summary: Lindsey Vonn underwent a successful third surgery on her broken left leg after crashing during the women's Olympic downhill event. She reports making progress in her recovery following the procedure.
120927aa9218fa6815ceeff1b8fc93455b4886a8.headline: Lindsey Vonn Has Successful Third Surgery After Olympic Crash

a56cc90727c867182cda57a45980637910e8275e.summary: The NBA suspended four players following a brawl during Monday's Detroit Pistons vs. Charlotte Hornets game. Isaiah Stewart received a seven-game suspension, Jalen Duren got two games, and Hornets players Miles Bridges and Moussa Diabate were each suspended four games. All four were ejected during the Pistons' 110-104 win in Charlotte.
a56cc90727c867182cda57a45980637910e8275e.headline: NBA Suspends Four Players After Pistons Hornets Brawl

48be453a3e1286634ea181148bd83c54123709ae.summary: Ten people, including the suspect, were killed and more than 25 injured in a mass shooting at a secondary school and residence in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia. The suspect, described as female, died by apparent suicide at the scene. The attack has deeply affected the small community.
48be453a3e1286634ea181148bd83c54123709ae.headline: Ten Dead Over 25 Injured in Tumbler Ridge B.C. Mass Shooting

ce41c136192d0e95a8cbb7330666c488cba8cd7e.summary: James Van Der Beek, known for his roles in 'Dawson's Creek' and 'Varsity Blues,' died on February 11, 2026, at age 48 after a battle with colorectal cancer. He revealed his diagnosis in November 2024. Van Der Beek was recognized for his work in several popular shows and films from the late 1990s and early 2000s.
ce41c136192d0e95a8cbb7330666c488cba8cd7e.headline: James Van Der Beek Dies at 48 After Battle With Colorectal Cancer

b779c6196d3408d0997e34f3632179f74f28d187.summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi defended the Justice Department's handling of Jeffrey Epstein files during a House Judiciary Committee hearing. Bondi clashed with Democratic Representatives Jerry Nadler and Jamie Raskin, criticizing them as they questioned the lack of indictments for Epstein co-conspirators. The hearing highlighted ongoing tensions over the DOJ's approach to the case.
b779c6196d3408d0997e34f3632179f74f28d187.headline: Attorney General Bondi Defends DOJ on Epstein Files in Heated Hearing

8c4f227d411c2218f49e2ba21cef8a60fdf510a2.summary: Jordan Stolz won gold in the 1,000 meters, setting an Olympic record at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics. Chloe Kim made her debut, and Evan Bates and Madison Chock competed for gold in ice dance. The medal table and live results continue to update as events progress.
8c4f227d411c2218f49e2ba21cef8a60fdf510a2.headline: Jordan Stolz Sets Olympic Record

d6ea9c113f41cd5d5b63fed4b4b9bd0bbe2f2a95.summary: Mets shortstop Francisco Lindor will miss at least six weeks after undergoing surgery on his left hamate bone, according to manager Carlos Mendoza. Lindor is expected to miss most of spring training, but the team hopes he will be ready for Opening Day.
d6ea9c113f41cd5d5b63fed4b4b9bd0bbe2f2a95.headline: Mets Francisco Lindor to Miss Most of Spring Training After Surgery

5c7dbbf1ea178e7f4f5b16ef00baa6386512137c.summary: Caitlin Clark, Angel Reese, and Paige Bueckers have been named to the U.S. women's basketball roster for the upcoming World Cup qualifying games taking place next month in Puerto Rico.
5c7dbbf1ea178e7f4f5b16ef00baa6386512137c.headline: Clark Reese and Bueckers Named to Team USA World Cup Qualifying Roster

b9ab3c264eeae99888956ed1cd79240ea39d1cd7.summary: The FAA has reopened El Paso airspace after a 10-day closure, stating there is no threat to commercial aviation. The closure, initially attributed to foreign drone concerns, prompted questions following the Trump administration's quick reversal.

ac849a811df80d5468069df8f3c699a09c960f52.summary: A shooter killed nine people and injured 25 others at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School and a residence in British Columbia. Police reported the suspect died from a self-inflicted injury. Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney expressed devastation over the incident.
ac849a811df80d5468069df8f3c699a09c960f52.headline: Shooter Kills 9 Injures 25 in Tumbler Ridge British Columbia

6d8e3c76e2e5cfdf7fee64c3ec8cf49da91320f8.summary: Adam Mosseri, head of Instagram, is scheduled to testify in a major trial addressing claims about social media's impact on minors, as Google and Meta challenge allegations of addiction.
6d8e3c76e2e5cfdf7fee64c3ec8cf49da91320f8.headline: Instagram Head to Testify in Trial on Social Media Impact on Minors

d29c7260db94f3ae3f32dd4d45911470129616c3.summary: Sergey Lavrov did not explain his belief that the US would respect New START treaty limits. Meanwhile, Benjamin Netanyahu met with Donald Trump as Israel made a related pledge.
d29c7260db94f3ae3f32dd4d45911470129616c3.headline: Lavrov Silent on US Compliance With New START

066d2f0dad26b8b354e992d6fd8f6aac394c38e9.summary: Sports betting analysts and models have released NBA predictions and prop bets for multiple games on Wednesday, February 11, including Bulls vs. Celtics, Bucks vs. Magic, Pistons vs. Raptors, and others. Key player absences, such as Giannis for Milwaukee and Domantas Sabonis for Sacramento, are noted as impacting team outlooks and prop bet opportunities.
066d2f0dad26b8b354e992d6fd8f6aac394c38e9.headline: Analysts Release NBA Predictions and Prop Bets for February 11 Games
