69698fa1210b37092621d29015509b6b1a4efd8b.headline: Orioles Jackson Holliday to Miss Opening Day After Hand Surgery

a4dcdefca9dcb36a5b0e6fc1b8877eaea417a813.summary: U.S. employers added 130,000 jobs in January, surpassing projections. The unemployment rate fell to 4.3% from 4.4% in December. Annual revisions indicate that job growth in 2025 was weaker than previously reported, but the January data shows recent improvement in the labor market.
a4dcdefca9dcb36a5b0e6fc1b8877eaea417a813.headline: U.S. Adds 130000 Jobs in January as Unemployment Rate Falls to 4.3%

8b50b56b172c3a185c42b68d035271ae52a8ec7a.summary: Carlos Palazuelos was detained and questioned in connection with the disappearance of 84-year-old Nancy Guthrie, mother of Savannah Guthrie, but has since been released. The FBI continues its search near Nancy Guthrie's Arizona home and has released images of an armed individual related to the case.
8b50b56b172c3a185c42b68d035271ae52a8ec7a.headline: Man Released After Questioning in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance Case

9ae44a8a05c83b58e5b93200ab79def154a82c35.summary: Kraft Heinz has paused plans to split the company, with CEO Steve Cahillane stating that many of the company's problems are 'fixable.' The company will now focus on improving profitability instead of pursuing a separation.
9ae44a8a05c83b58e5b93200ab79def154a82c35.headline: Kraft Heinz Halts Split to Focus on Profitability

422cf7eea5f10a373e7dc10e904624c1eb94fde3.summary: An 18-year-old killed her mother, stepbrother, and seven people at a school, with one victim dying en route to the hospital. In a separate incident, Calgary police are searching for suspects after a man was hospitalized following a shooting on Macleod Trail Tuesday evening.
422cf7eea5f10a373e7dc10e904624c1eb94fde3.headline: Nine Killed in School Attack

9f67b7df37a5d9a868de0b56baf77c168e689012.summary: Real Madrid and Uefa have announced they are set to end their legal dispute over the failed European Super League project, following an agreement of principles aimed at supporting European club football.
9f67b7df37a5d9a868de0b56baf77c168e689012.headline: Real Madrid and Uefa to End Legal Dispute Over Super League Project

df925ff7cfaf1e85a0ab3744beedf4ec0e2d6984.summary: A group of Buddhist monks completed a 15-week walk for peace from Texas to Washington, D.C., arriving on Tuesday. They were welcomed by large, supportive crowds as they concluded their journey.
df925ff7cfaf1e85a0ab3744beedf4ec0e2d6984.headline: Buddhist Monks Complete 15 Week Peace Walk in Washington

fa734a10027c1823ef1c9272eaa1f717a5bf20e5.summary: A British coroner ruled that Lucy Harrison, 23, was unlawfully killed by her father, Kris Harrison, who acted with gross negligence when he accidentally shot her in the chest at his Texas home after an argument in 2025.
fa734a10027c1823ef1c9272eaa1f717a5bf20e5.headline: Coroner Rules Lucy Harrison Was Unlawfully Killed by Father in Texas

1ee5745083966f85292e1ca44bded35e07cf2ce8.summary: Switzerland will hold a national vote in June on a proposal to cap the country's population at 10 million. The country currently has 9.1 million permanent residents. Some experts warn the measure could restrict companies' ability to hire foreign talent.
1ee5745083966f85292e1ca44bded35e07cf2ce8.headline: Switzerland to Vote in June on 10 Million Population Cap

e297e8c1de79eafece52e89b0a93e11294412e44.summary: Pershing Square, led by Bill Ackman, disclosed that it had invested about 10% of its capital in Meta as of December 31, 2025.
e297e8c1de79eafece52e89b0a93e11294412e44.headline: Pershing Square Invests 10% of Capital in Meta by End of 2025

0f39a01d40d93114642b3f4dbb1c52e5465579d5.summary: A shooting at a secondary school in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, resulted in seven deaths, including the suspected shooter, according to authorities. Two additional people were found dead at a nearby home. Police say the woman believed to be the shooter is among the deceased.
0f39a01d40d93114642b3f4dbb1c52e5465579d5.headline: Nine Dead After School Shooting and Nearby Incident in British

a051116e372c358bfb283596d8853cda3caa7586.summary: Heineken announced plans to cut up to 6,000 jobs, or about 7% of its workforce, citing declining beer demand. The company said AI will be used to help achieve ongoing productivity savings.
a051116e372c358bfb283596d8853cda3caa7586.headline: Heineken to Cut Up to 6

07d7db89cd15e041fef6055d4b0321f1544695d8.summary: A mass shooting at a secondary school in a remote British Columbia town left ten people dead and dozens injured. Police responded to the incident and are investigating the circumstances surrounding the attack.
07d7db89cd15e041fef6055d4b0321f1544695d8.headline: Ten Killed Dozens Hurt in Mass Shooting at British Columbia School

2e7c6c533ce98d4a37a0b19c45d68b191d392bb4.summary: NASA’s SpaceX Crew-12 members—Andrey Fedyaev, Jack Hathaway, Jessica Meir, and Sophie Adenot—were photographed with their mission insignia inside the Astronaut Crew Quarters at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center ahead of their upcoming mission.
2e7c6c533ce98d4a37a0b19c45d68b191d392bb4.headline: SpaceX Crew 12 Astronauts Pose with Mission Insignia Before Launch

b82216ef2790b292fdbf84b766fe65645a126638.summary: A grand jury declined to indict Democratic lawmakers over a video alleging illegal military orders. Slotkin criticized the Trump administration following the decision.
b82216ef2790b292fdbf84b766fe65645a126638.headline: Grand Jury Declines to Indict Democrats Over Military Orders Video

c74058592b799997ffd12ff181abf079c083a334.summary: The Trump EPA is preparing to repeal the 2009 scientific finding that allows the US government to regulate carbon dioxide and other greenhouse gases as harmful to health. Climate groups have pledged to oppose the rollback.
c74058592b799997ffd12ff181abf079c083a334.headline: Trump EPA Plans to Repeal Key Climate Change Policy Finding

a478669e63a3ced44f2577cccbe1d6659763b2ff.summary: Bangladesh held its first election since the 2024 Gen Z-led uprising that removed Hasina from power. Voter turnout was reported as strong by the chief election commissioner. Tarique Rahman, returning from 17 years in exile, is the main contender for prime minister, promising reforms and a new direction for the country.
a478669e63a3ced44f2577cccbe1d6659763b2ff.headline: Bangladesh Holds First Election Since 2024 Uprising With High Turnout

9359b1c8eff13a1d0a480ee8b849602e0ab45869.summary: The US House has passed a bill requiring voters to provide proof of US citizenship ahead of the midterm elections. The legislation, backed by House Republicans, now moves to the Senate, where it faces opposition.
9359b1c8eff13a1d0a480ee8b849602e0ab45869.headline: US House Approves Proof of Citizenship Requirement for Voters

5784310f0eb8ecd3eb9b351cc08da0afadf0b608.summary: Joey Porter Sr. criticized Ben Roethlisberger during a podcast in Super Bowl week, saying the quarterback, with whom he won a Super Bowl at the Pittsburgh Steelers, was not a good teammate or a good person.
5784310f0eb8ecd3eb9b351cc08da0afadf0b608.headline: Joey Porter Sr. Criticizes Ben Roethlisbergers Character on Podcast

3f5a3a3c64011c8693617d905d6b09e23f0eff22.summary: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych was disqualified from the 2026 Winter Olympics after refusing to stop wearing a helmet honoring athletes killed during Russia's invasion of Ukraine. The helmet, which features images of the victims, was banned by Olympic officials, leading to his exclusion from the competition.
3f5a3a3c64011c8693617d905d6b09e23f0eff22.headline: Ukraines Heraskevych Disqualified from Olympics Over Tribute Helmet

43f5894c15c6720d9dbc4954fc693a4b68350feb.summary: South Korea's spy agency reports that Kim Jong Un is positioning his daughter, Kim Ju Ae, as his successor, citing her increased public appearances since 2022.
43f5894c15c6720d9dbc4954fc693a4b68350feb.headline: South Korea Says Kim Jong Un Positions Daughter as Successor

ec1a587d29c7bf9adf34d83e89a4b92ea1986764.summary: SoftBank reported a profit for the latest quarter, driven by a $4.2 billion gain from its 11% stake in OpenAI. The valuation increase in its OpenAI investment offset losses in other areas, resulting in a $2.4 billion gain at its Vision Fund.
ec1a587d29c7bf9adf34d83e89a4b92ea1986764.headline: SoftBank Reports Profit Boosted by Gains From OpenAI Investment

5206bc2eb84cf3fd6d479367efbebc5ae3efa0aa.summary: BYU wide receiver Parker Kingston has been charged with first-degree felony rape in Utah following a nearly yearlong investigation. Kingston, 21, was arrested and is being held without bail in St. George, according to Washington County prosecutors. BYU has released a statement regarding his arrest.
5206bc2eb84cf3fd6d479367efbebc5ae3efa0aa.headline: BYU Receiver Parker Kingston Charged With First Degree Felony Rape

4d0a5c7e7b9b116ff39a67ec48a3837221949e30.summary: The U.S. House of Representatives voted to rescind tariffs imposed by Donald Trump on Canadian goods, marking a rare bipartisan rebuke of his trade policy. The measure passed with support from both Republicans and Democrats, but is unlikely to take effect as Trump is expected to veto it if it reaches his desk.
4d0a5c7e7b9b116ff39a67ec48a3837221949e30.headline: House Votes to Rescind Trumps Tariffs on Canada in Bipartisan Rebuke

ce4c425ca7127f4ab98ba4e7beba231ff9f9d19f.summary: Switzerland will hold a referendum in June 2026 on a proposal from the Swiss People's Party to cap the population at 10 million by limiting immigration. Businesses warn the measure could impact agreements with the EU and harm the economy.
ce4c425ca7127f4ab98ba4e7beba231ff9f9d19f.headline: Switzerland to Hold June Referendum on 10 Million Population Cap

b5f521ec74d5864f5a607ce95643f573c7b4bbf4.summary: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych was disqualified from the Winter Olympics after refusing to remove a helmet honoring Ukrainian athletes killed in the war with Russia, despite warnings from Olympic officials that it violated rules against political speech.
b5f521ec74d5864f5a607ce95643f573c7b4bbf4.headline: Ukrainian Skeleton Racer Disqualified Over Helmet Honoring War Dead

968eda2b8b2db0402a79fd4f0c782890c607522d.summary: James Van Der Beek, the actor best known for his role in the 1990s TV drama 'Dawson's Creek' and films such as 'Varsity Blues,' has died at age 48. He had revealed a cancer diagnosis in 2024. Tributes have been paid by colleagues, including Katie Holmes.
968eda2b8b2db0402a79fd4f0c782890c607522d.headline: James Van Der Beek

d55d3ef991e25ce63cc43e3d3d5411a74a56e739.summary: Canadian police have identified an 18-year-old woman as the suspect in a school shooting in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, where six people, including a teacher and five students, were killed and dozens injured. A candlelit vigil was held Wednesday night to honor the victims.
d55d3ef991e25ce63cc43e3d3d5411a74a56e739.headline: 18 Year Old Identified as Suspect in Tumbler Ridge School Shooting

5619a8e992af3fd3cc04a3b36924806fe381b7d4.summary: The Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame announced the finalists for its 2026 class, including Candace Parker, Elena Delle Donne, Blake Griffin, Amar’e Stoudemire, Doc Rivers, Mike D’Antoni, Jamal Crawford, and Joe Johnson. The inductees will be revealed during Final Four weekend.
5619a8e992af3fd3cc04a3b36924806fe381b7d4.headline: Naismith Hall of Fame Announces 2026 Finalists

406602442ee9a4ed055a8b76a130d2de2347f3a2.summary: Jim Ratcliffe, Manchester United co-owner, faces widespread criticism from political leaders and supporters groups after saying the UK has been 'colonized' by immigrants. Labour leader Keir Starmer and the mayor of Greater Manchester called the comments offensive, and supporters groups condemned his remarks.
406602442ee9a4ed055a8b76a130d2de2347f3a2.headline: Jim Ratcliffe Criticized Over Remarks on Immigration

7d70eab99506afe83bdd4f0369777a35a409390e.summary: The UK economy grew by 0.1% in the fourth quarter, according to official figures. This growth was below expectations and followed a year of sluggish performance. Manufacturing was the main contributor to the modest increase.
7d70eab99506afe83bdd4f0369777a35a409390e.headline: UK Economy Grows 0.1% in Fourth Quarter

68f877e13342a74e0859713dc1a75f505a85f041.summary: James Harden contributed 13 points and 11 assists in his Cleveland Cavaliers home debut, helping the team secure a win over the Wizards. In his first two games with Cleveland, Harden demonstrated his ability to make key plays and facilitate team performance.
68f877e13342a74e0859713dc1a75f505a85f041.headline: James Harden Leads Cavaliers to Win in Home Debut Against Wizards

f05a24b69b71629721397b05a7edb2eb75e13b35.summary: The FAA abruptly closed airspace over El Paso, Texas, citing security reasons linked to Defense Department anti-drone operations targeting cartel drones. The closure, initially announced for 10 days, was lifted within hours. Lawmakers have requested a classified briefing on the incident, which highlighted coordination issues between the FAA and the Pentagon.
f05a24b69b71629721397b05a7edb2eb75e13b35.headline: FAA Quickly Reopens El Paso Airspace After Brief Security Shutdown

1fedc20b290d0c8ea7459214af87be2a0ecd903e.summary: Russia is evacuating its tourists from Cuba and will suspend airline operations to the island due to a fuel crisis. Two major Russian airlines are operating one-way return flights for tourists as part of the evacuation effort.
1fedc20b290d0c8ea7459214af87be2a0ecd903e.headline: Russia Evacuates Tourists From Cuba Amid Fuel Crisis

31dd3b2af5188e75dfc48c5b372b43ab698735f9.summary: Dallas Mavericks rookie Cooper Flagg has been diagnosed with a left midfoot sprain following an MRI. He will miss the team's final game before the All-Star break and will not participate in the NBA Rising Stars Game. The injury occurred during a game against the Phoenix Suns. Flagg is expected to be sidelined through at least All-Star Weekend.
31dd3b2af5188e75dfc48c5b372b43ab698735f9.headline: Mavericks Cooper Flagg Out Through All Star Weekend With Foot Sprain

5e856027ecf4774d1a628ca0da3e2610164846b5.summary: Lindsey Vonn had a third surgery on her broken left leg after crashing during the women's Olympic downhill event. Vonn described the procedure as successful and shared an update from the hospital.
5e856027ecf4774d1a628ca0da3e2610164846b5.headline: Lindsey Vonn Undergoes Third Surgery After Olympic Downhill Crash

755eb99843bce87b7607194ea89f1a9e25b561a8.summary: Donald Trump has ordered the Pentagon to purchase electricity from coal plants, aiming to support the coal industry. This directive follows his previous declaration of coal as essential to national and economic security and is part of ongoing efforts to promote fossil fuels.
755eb99843bce87b7607194ea89f1a9e25b561a8.headline: Trump Directs Pentagon to Buy Power From Coal Plants

5214f166e3ba3b29907b6ea59f8f17fa767782d0.summary: US asset manager Nuveen has agreed to acquire UK-based Schroders for $13.5 billion (£9.9 billion). The deal marks a significant move in the finance sector, as a longstanding City of London firm is set to be bought by an American company.
5214f166e3ba3b29907b6ea59f8f17fa767782d0.headline: Nuveen to Acquire Schroders for $13.5 Billion

e824f3f4c3fa0fc642d2da9bea86736347e5119e.summary: Nottingham Forest have dismissed Sean Dyche as head coach after 114 days following a draw with Wolves. The club is in discussions with Vitor Pereira, previously with Wolves, to become their fourth head coach of the season.
e824f3f4c3fa0fc642d2da9bea86736347e5119e.headline: Nottingham Forest Sack Sean Dyche

46d500f31d80ca45976c0334e69831094b50bf3e.summary: A 13-year-old boy has been charged with attempted murder after two pupils were stabbed at a secondary school in north-west London. The victims are in stable condition in hospital. The boy is also accused of possessing a knife and allegedly spraying a substance at a third child.
46d500f31d80ca45976c0334e69831094b50bf3e.headline: 13 Year Old Charged With Attempted Murder After London School

27a9f55ff4ecbe1843909caaff707b3f7934d548.summary: The FAA imposed a 10-day airspace closure over El Paso but lifted the restriction less than eight hours later. Local officials reported major disruptions and said residents are still seeking explanations for the sudden changes.
27a9f55ff4ecbe1843909caaff707b3f7934d548.headline: FAA Quickly Lifts El Paso Airspace Closure After Causing Disruptions

b29382bcd2c2a72dd7c3658534027d6081aecc64.summary: Orioles second baseman Jackson Holliday will have surgery Thursday to repair a broken hamate bone in his right hand and is expected to miss Opening Day, according to team president Mike Elias.
b29382bcd2c2a72dd7c3658534027d6081aecc64.headline: Orioles Jackson Holliday to Miss Opening Day After Hand Surgery

f6817e1a4da823f284d729dfe43e155881a74bf5.summary: Donald Trump stated that no final decisions were made on Iran during his meeting with Netanyahu. He emphasized that negotiations with Iran will continue and mentioned ongoing progress regarding Gaza.
f6817e1a4da823f284d729dfe43e155881a74bf5.headline: Trump Says No Final Iran Decision

d709d5ee5bf61d3f8e2bf8d4b577a5baa175df51.summary: During a hearing, Attorney General Pam Bondi exchanged heated words with Democratic Rep. Jerry Nadler and another Democratic colleague, resulting in angry outbursts in the session.
d709d5ee5bf61d3f8e2bf8d4b577a5baa175df51.headline: Pam Bondi Hearing Disrupted by Heated Exchange With Lawmakers

e0c7cd80bb01ab8fb9e4263bf4e6085500573482.summary: Bill Ackman's hedge fund Pershing Square has taken a major stake in Meta and has exited its investment in Hilton, according to recent disclosures.
e0c7cd80bb01ab8fb9e4263bf4e6085500573482.headline: Pershing Square Invests in Meta

08bb3be28648c6f86edb7b9d562ca7642b01441b.summary: NATO has launched the Arctic Sentry mission to reduce tensions and address issues following disputes related to Trump's push regarding Greenland.
08bb3be28648c6f86edb7b9d562ca7642b01441b.headline: NATO Launches Arctic Sentry Mission After Greenland Dispute

c6f4a025433390abfb20a63755989102b805e99e.summary: A shooting at a secondary school and residence in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia left nine people dead and more than 25 injured, including two with life-threatening injuries. Police have identified the suspect. The incident has drawn national attention due to the rarity of such violence in Canada.
c6f4a025433390abfb20a63755989102b805e99e.headline: Nine Killed Over 25 Injured in Tumbler Ridge School Shooting

e7fbdfc6310b4dad97f1978710ae344efbd9931b.summary: Canada's men's hockey team defeated Czechia 5-0 in their opening game at the Milan Cortina Winter Olympics, marking the return of NHL players to the tournament after 12 years. Macklin Celebrini scored the first goal, and Jordan Binnington made 26 saves for the shutout. Connor McDavid contributed three assists.
e7fbdfc6310b4dad97f1978710ae344efbd9931b.headline: Canada Shuts Out Czechia 5 0 in Olympic Hockey Opener

c3fa69e4dde16b53b2aca59417ee1371d82db7b2.summary: Chloe Kim is competing in the women's halfpipe at the 2026 Winter Olympics, aiming to win her third consecutive gold medal. As of day six, Kim remains in contention, but the final results have not yet been announced. Japan's Sena Tomita, the defending bronze medalist, had difficulties in her run and will not count this attempt.
c3fa69e4dde16b53b2aca59417ee1371d82db7b2.headline: Chloe Kim Competes for Third Straight Gold in Olympic Halfpipe

d8cb70180056ee375b4cbdfc3ea40d8e7d4d8b5b.summary: EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin has revoked the endangerment finding, removing the scientific basis for regulating greenhouse gas emissions in the U.S. This action, announced by the Trump administration, marks a significant rollback of federal climate regulations.
d8cb70180056ee375b4cbdfc3ea40d8e7d4d8b5b.headline: EPA Revokes Endangerment Finding

c1a0a166f8c2b7c9fd7a947f4816cd000c27c8b0.summary: Utah Jazz forward Jaren Jackson Jr. will undergo surgery to remove a growth in his left knee and is expected to miss the rest of the season. The decision follows a post-trade physical that revealed the issue, and Jackson played only three games with the Jazz before being sidelined.
c1a0a166f8c2b7c9fd7a947f4816cd000c27c8b0.headline: Jaren Jackson Jr. to Miss Season After Knee Surgery

e0531bd435777a515a4844ab0d61efc2c1c4c183.summary: The U.S. House voted to end some of Donald Trump's tariffs on Canada, with many Republicans joining Democrats in a rare rebuke of Trump. Republican leaders attempted but failed to prevent the disapproval vote from proceeding. The measure to end the tariffs passed on February 12, 2026.
e0531bd435777a515a4844ab0d61efc2c1c4c183.headline: House Votes to End Some Trump Canada Tariffs in Rare GOP Rebuke

1bc8e8b9f1940a2d05b07a66a5a30288157ffda0.summary: The Trump administration is ending its immigration enforcement surge in Minnesota, following mass detentions, protests, and the fatal shooting of two U.S. citizens by federal agents in Minneapolis. Border chief Tom Homan announced that 700 immigration agents will leave the state as the operation concludes.
1bc8e8b9f1940a2d05b07a66a5a30288157ffda0.headline: Trump Administration Ends Minnesota Immigration Crackdown After

c46f027dfcc3cded01da6c05a60ad4c2246eefbd.summary: A judge has temporarily blocked Pete Hegseth's attempt to censure Sen. Mark Kelly and prevent the Pentagon from reducing Kelly's military rank and pension over a video in which Kelly told service members they can refuse illegal orders. The judge ruled the actions violated the First Amendment.
c46f027dfcc3cded01da6c05a60ad4c2246eefbd.headline: Judge Blocks Censure and Pension Cut for Sen. Mark Kelly

e63dc781988048a7a764f04886afd0ba916596f2.summary: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych was disqualified from the Winter Olympics for refusing to stop wearing a helmet honoring Ukrainian athletes and coaches killed in the war with Russia. Olympic officials said the helmet violated rules on political speech, resulting in Heraskevych's ban from competition.
e63dc781988048a7a764f04886afd0ba916596f2.headline: Ukrainian Skeleton Racer Disqualified for Wearing Tribute Helmet

99897227c279b81ccff646613ecbd7f9974f6176.summary: Gail Slater, the Justice Department's antitrust chief, has resigned after months of turmoil within the department, according to multiple sources.
99897227c279b81ccff646613ecbd7f9974f6176.headline: Justice Department Antitrust Chief Gail Slater Resigns

4b969011503a0e592e44e97ef6892d91dc3f2bac.summary: Washington Wizards center Alex Sarr will miss about two weeks due to a right hamstring strain and will not play in the Rising Stars game at All-Star weekend. The team announced that Bub Carrington will replace Sarr in the event. Sarr, averaging 17.2 points, 7.8 rebounds, and two blocks per game, will still attend the festivities in Los Angeles.
4b969011503a0e592e44e97ef6892d91dc3f2bac.headline: Wizards Alex Sarr Out Two Weeks

390806d498fe4b45d83e80258ee9aab5d005e086.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo will not play in the NBA All-Star Game due to a calf strain but will attend the weekend's events in California and help coach the All-Star Celebrity Game. De'Aaron Fox has been selected as Antetokounmpo's replacement for Sunday's All-Star Game.
390806d498fe4b45d83e80258ee9aab5d005e086.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpo Out of All Star Game

700732a10ce161e6c3a7472c81bcd9286c5e931e.summary: Johnson, who won gold in the women's downhill earlier in the Games, did not medal in the super-G on Thursday. After the event, her partner Connor Watkins proposed to her, and she accepted.
700732a10ce161e6c3a7472c81bcd9286c5e931e.headline: Johnson Accepts Proposal After Competing in Super G

1cfd8d75481503ac29bf81e25833d7a33ad5eee2.summary: Mexico has reported over 9,000 confirmed measles cases since last year, putting its measles elimination status at risk. An evaluation in April will determine whether the country retains this status as the virus continues to spread.
1cfd8d75481503ac29bf81e25833d7a33ad5eee2.headline: Mexico Faces Possible Loss of Measles Elimination Status Amid Outbreak

f897cfca159d4261e5f25c825ba6390695450478.summary: Raheem Sterling has joined Dutch club Feyenoord on a deal that runs until the end of the season after leaving the Premier League.
f897cfca159d4261e5f25c825ba6390695450478.headline: Raheem Sterling Joins Feyenoord on Short Term Deal

48b7d8a71399e9058edf9a767952e7a6334d6048.summary: Manchester United co-owner Jim Ratcliffe has apologized for his choice of language after facing backlash over his comments that the UK was being 'colonised by immigrants.' Ratcliffe said he was sorry for offending people with his remarks.
48b7d8a71399e9058edf9a767952e7a6334d6048.headline: Jim Ratcliffe Apologizes for Comments on UK Immigration

f589b27c3c62e54349a4c69e7ae469843a4dab34.summary: Unofficial results from the Bangladesh election indicate that the Bangladesh Nationalist Party is currently leading after a strong voter turnout.
f589b27c3c62e54349a4c69e7ae469843a4dab34.headline: Bangladesh Nationalist Party Leads in Early Election Results

ec9703e390650a3dc1e74a7dca6047e141665e71.summary: The UK government has announced a 3.3% pay rise for 1.4 million NHS staff in England. Health unions have criticized the increase as insufficient and accused the government of acting in bad faith, with at least one union threatening to strike over the below-inflation award.
ec9703e390650a3dc1e74a7dca6047e141665e71.headline: UK Government Announces 3.3% Pay Rise for NHS Staff Amid Union

14a61f741c0ae84ce51ee5985fca081cf1834d42.summary: Police have identified the suspect in the Canada shooting as an 18-year-old woman with a history of police visits to her home. Authorities report her firearms licence expired two years ago, and it is unclear who owned the guns used in the attack.
14a61f741c0ae84ce51ee5985fca081cf1834d42.headline: Police Identify 18 Year Old Suspect in Canada Shooting

6868693d7250832e9424ce4a3aad0fdcedde95f1.summary: Russia has fully blocked WhatsApp and is promoting a state-backed messaging app as an alternative. Rights campaigners have criticized the move, describing it as an effort to increase government control and surveillance over communications.
6868693d7250832e9424ce4a3aad0fdcedde95f1.headline: Russia Blocks WhatsApp Promotes State Messaging App

eedaeba0c2cbfb7df98dbd8cacf97686d9300792.summary: Two US Navy ships collided in the Caribbean near South America. According to US Southern Command, there were no major injuries reported as a result of the incident.
eedaeba0c2cbfb7df98dbd8cacf97686d9300792.headline: Two US Navy Ships Collide in Caribbean

aa37a9a41a85148f3bb0b3c220d0fc683e426007.summary: James Van Der Beek, best known for starring in 'Dawson's Creek' and 'Varsity Blues,' has died from cancer at the age of 48.
aa37a9a41a85148f3bb0b3c220d0fc683e426007.headline: James Van Der Beek

8e14369414e6d389e8704608a6f8357eb49c86c2.summary: Pentagon policy chief Elbridge Colby told NATO defense ministers in Brussels that the US plans to reduce its conventional forces in Europe but remains committed to the alliance. Colby called for a NATO based on partnership rather than dependency and urged European members to strengthen their combat capabilities.
8e14369414e6d389e8704608a6f8357eb49c86c2.headline: Pentagon Policy Chief Urges NATO Members to Boost Defense Capabilities

8715ca12cef99800b44d21979dc20cddc844af0e.summary: A civilian and a military reservist have been charged with security offences, bribery, and obstructing justice after allegedly placing bets on future military operations. Authorities say the case involves online gambling that crossed a 'red line' concerning national security.
8715ca12cef99800b44d21979dc20cddc844af0e.headline: Civilian and Reservist Charged Over Bets on Military Operations

8d3bd5d33c9254cd742b88dd956c5938b3976e0f.summary: Barbados Prime Minister Mia Mottley and the Barbados Labour Party have won all 30 seats in the House of Assembly, securing a third term in office, according to state TV and Reuters.
8d3bd5d33c9254cd742b88dd956c5938b3976e0f.headline: Mia Mottley and BLP Win All 30 Seats in Barbados Election

c4eb2760f987a0da4f2d1f4241fa1ce5991bd7bc.summary: A UN report states that five ISIL assassination plots against Syrian President Ahmed al-Sharaa and top ministers were foiled. Meanwhile, Syrian government forces have taken control of a base in eastern Syria previously operated by U.S. troops, according to the defence ministry.
c4eb2760f987a0da4f2d1f4241fa1ce5991bd7bc.headline: UN ISIL Plots Foiled as Syrian Forces Seize Former U.S. Base

b4a503b9961b5c6236b50c9c2fd8a3be631d36df.summary: NASA released a new image from the Hubble Space Telescope on February 10, 2026, showing the clearest view yet of the Egg Nebula. Captured with Hubble’s Wide Field Camera 3, the image highlights detailed structures of gas and dust created by a dying star about 1,000 light-years away in the constellation Cygnus.
b4a503b9961b5c6236b50c9c2fd8a3be631d36df.headline: Hubble Captures Clearest Image Yet of Egg Nebula

6f1992c7313321853cb30e4fc69bd2a47ede6777.summary: Bangladesh has held its first election since the 2024 Gen Z uprising that removed Hasina from power. Tarique Rahman, who returned from 17 years of exile in London, was the main contender for prime minister and has pledged to address corruption and reform the country.
6f1992c7313321853cb30e4fc69bd2a47ede6777.headline: Bangladesh Holds First Election Since 2024 Uprising

9cddc17bba0707da1cc4a6624423cde1ec95e5cd.summary: Countdown lexicographer Susie Dent says children's vocabulary is shrinking as reading is replaced by screen time. Dent urges families to read together, talk, and play word games to support language development.
9cddc17bba0707da1cc4a6624423cde1ec95e5cd.headline: Susie Dent Warns Screen Time Is Reducing Childrens Vocabulary

ff6ad7710c0ad2a0bc7ab2557c355a257463d3ec.summary: An 18-year-old suspect is believed to have fatally shot eight people at a secondary school and a private residence in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, before killing herself. Police have identified the suspect, and the community remains in shock following the attack.
ff6ad7710c0ad2a0bc7ab2557c355a257463d3ec.headline: Eight Killed in Tumbler Ridge

be4c62863f919fc72baeaa6c82509b852bfcf938.summary: Oil prices fell by more than $1 after the International Energy Agency lowered its forecast for global oil demand growth, citing slower-than-expected increases as prices have recently risen.
be4c62863f919fc72baeaa6c82509b852bfcf938.headline: Oil Prices Drop Over $1 After IEA Reduces Demand Forecast

67550d20501a384c7b5b6a33f1a6c7f639e373fa.summary: A federal judge has blocked the Pentagon from punishing Senator Mark Kelly for his call to resist unlawful orders. The same ruling also temporarily stops the Trump administration from cutting $600 million in public health grants to four Democratic-led states.
67550d20501a384c7b5b6a33f1a6c7f639e373fa.headline: Judge Blocks Pentagon Action Against Mark Kelly and Halts Health Fund

3b790316a70860b4621c3ff4c793ff4556acf6d3.summary: The Bangladesh Nationalist Party, led by Tarique Rahman, has claimed victory in Bangladesh's first election since the 2024 uprising. Voting was largely peaceful, and supporters celebrated the result in Dhaka. The election was viewed as a significant test for the country's democracy after years of political turmoil.
3b790316a70860b4621c3ff4c793ff4556acf6d3.headline: Bangladesh Nationalist Party Claims Victory in First Post Uprising

454af0c2002dc522f73ffdfdc780400853d33cfb.summary: LeBron James became the oldest player in NBA history to record a triple-double, achieving 28 points, 12 assists, and 10 rebounds in the Los Angeles Lakers' 124-104 win over the Dallas Mavericks. At 41 years and 44 days old, James broke the previous record held by Karl Malone.
454af0c2002dc522f73ffdfdc780400853d33cfb.headline: LeBron James Sets NBA Record as Oldest Player With Triple Double

7fe0957e1ccaebc146e11dde934b5cea7b4a1fee.summary: The NBA fined the Utah Jazz $500,000 and the Indiana Pacers $100,000 for allegedly prioritizing draft position over winning by sitting healthy players in recent games. The league cited concerns over roster management and emphasized enforcing rules against tanking.
7fe0957e1ccaebc146e11dde934b5cea7b4a1fee.headline: NBA Fines Jazz and Pacers for Sitting Healthy Players in Recent Games

46a600d67fb8a6a079cc6ac29f61931275563e52.summary: Zimbabwe defeated Australia by 23 runs in the T20 Cricket World Cup in Colombo. Blessing Muzarabani took 4-17 and Brad Evans 3-23, helping bowl out Australia for 146 in 19.3 overs. Matt Renshaw scored 65 for Australia, but Zimbabwe secured their second consecutive Group B win.
46a600d67fb8a6a079cc6ac29f61931275563e52.headline: Zimbabwe Upsets Australia by 23 Runs in T20 World Cup

a2ae2f73aac3d2e7ec7842ca90305cb13df071bc.summary: Kathryn Ruemmler, the top lawyer at Goldman Sachs, has announced her resignation following the release of emails revealing her close relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. The emails, disclosed in recent files, showed Ruemmler referring to Epstein as 'Uncle Jeffrey' and led to her decision to step down from the bank.
a2ae2f73aac3d2e7ec7842ca90305cb13df071bc.headline: Goldman Sachs Top Lawyer Kathryn Ruemmler Resigns Over Epstein Emails

44ea9ae60dd9284c272184dca6ca9152609d136e.summary: A judge has ordered the Department of Homeland Security to provide Minnesota detainees with prompt access to lawyers before transferring them, after finding that ICE blocked detainees' access to legal counsel.
44ea9ae60dd9284c272184dca6ca9152609d136e.headline: Judge Orders DHS to Ensure Legal Access for Minnesota Detainees

fc0d4bfce46dbb2217792ab92e967e64e0fd8e2c.summary: New York officials raised the Pride flag at the Stonewall National Monument after the Trump administration removed it. The flag's return was described as a response to the administration's action.
fc0d4bfce46dbb2217792ab92e967e64e0fd8e2c.headline: Pride Flag Raised Again at Stonewall After Removal by Trump

58404cf0a5a9d76cf8a76ec892bae4f9ae96db1a.summary: The FBI has increased the reward for information on Nancy Guthrie, the 84-year-old mother of 'Today' show host Savannah Guthrie, who has been missing for nearly two weeks. Authorities have shared new details about a suspect, and a black glove was found near her home as part of the ongoing investigation.
58404cf0a5a9d76cf8a76ec892bae4f9ae96db1a.headline: FBI Raises Reward in Nancy Guthrie Disappearance

0d242dd13bc060c9b4df042aa90d67830a167e62.summary: The Philadelphia Phillies released outfielder Nick Castellanos on Thursday after failing to trade him. Castellanos, now a free agent, admitted he was previously benched for bringing beer into the dugout during a game, an incident he referred to as 'The Miami Incident.'
0d242dd13bc060c9b4df042aa90d67830a167e62.headline: Phillies Release Nick Castellanos After Dugout Incident Admission

11c1a6f0f0ffa78eb5c714aa3c0ef6beb0c2e54b.summary: Nikola Topic made his NBA debut for the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday night, scoring seven points and recording seven assists after recovering from a knee injury and undergoing treatment for testicular cancer. Topic, the 12th pick in the 2024 NBA draft, had missed last season and had not played this season until now.
11c1a6f0f0ffa78eb5c714aa3c0ef6beb0c2e54b.headline: Nikola Topic Makes NBA Debut for Thunder After Cancer Recovery

8a779a3aa112c9f59d5b39d5a62bf8aec1e6472b.summary: The US and Taiwan have signed a trade agreement that lowers tariffs to 15% and commits Taiwan to purchase over $84 billion of US goods, including energy, aircraft, and equipment. The deal aims to increase trade and investment between the two sides.
8a779a3aa112c9f59d5b39d5a62bf8aec1e6472b.headline: US and Taiwan Sign Trade Deal to Lower Tariffs and Boost Purchases

092f2b28ccdf4a06f47cf9271260e4d3ba5ab1fe.summary: European leaders are preparing for the Munich Security Conference, where Rubio is expected to attend amid concerns over transatlantic relations following recent comments by Trump. German chancellor Friedrich Merz is among the key speakers at the three-day event.
092f2b28ccdf4a06f47cf9271260e4d3ba5ab1fe.headline: Europe Prepares for Munich Security Conference Amid Transatlantic

88215fa9131d5c169698f4f05bff536d1f7c178e.summary: James Van Der Beek's family has thanked donors after a GoFundMe campaign organized by his wife raised $2 million to help cover expenses following the actor's death from colorectal cancer at age 48.
88215fa9131d5c169698f4f05bff536d1f7c178e.headline: James Van Der Beeks Family Thanks Donors After $2M Fundraiser

1c945ab0a0d04e68f03ede1d656c386aed32ecbe.summary: Donald Trump plans to reduce certain tariffs on steel and aluminium goods, according to reports. The move comes as concerns about affordability remain among US voters.
1c945ab0a0d04e68f03ede1d656c386aed32ecbe.headline: Trump Plans to Reduce Tariffs on Steel and Aluminium Goods

c5d21d57c94099dd4dc3498b28cf1a458e7e1073.summary: Japan has seized a Chinese fishing boat and arrested its captain after the vessel allegedly violated Japan's exclusive economic zone near Nagasaki. The fisheries agency stated the boat did not comply with orders to stop. The incident follows recent diplomatic tensions between Japan and China.
c5d21d57c94099dd4dc3498b28cf1a458e7e1073.headline: Japan Seizes Chinese Fishing Boat

bd1f906a321855b0f2a496d1538aa3dec31839df.summary: President Trump stated that he has not disciplined or fired the staffer responsible for posting a video with a racist animation of the Obamas, as confirmed by both Trump and the White House.
bd1f906a321855b0f2a496d1538aa3dec31839df.headline: Trump Says Staffer Not Disciplined Over Racist Obama Video

a627f5805bf24556e5d75e218eed28f2ba2274ad.summary: A second US aircraft carrier is being deployed to the Middle East as tensions with Iran continue, according to US media and Al Arabiya English.
a627f5805bf24556e5d75e218eed28f2ba2274ad.headline: US Sends Second Aircraft Carrier to Middle East Amid Iran Tensions

4bd111925f17fd1ed2f37f04bcd1559afe5f83d6.summary: Waymo has offered DoorDash drivers $11.25 to close open robotaxi doors, highlighting ongoing human involvement in its autonomous vehicle operations. A Reddit post by a DoorDash rider revealed the offer, showing that Waymo still relies on people for some tasks.
4bd111925f17fd1ed2f37f04bcd1559afe5f83d6.headline: Waymo Pays DoorDash Drivers to Close Robotaxi Doors

cd50cd407b06c1abf9ef1be710735f722af863f9.summary: EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin has revoked the scientific endangerment finding that provided the legal basis for regulating greenhouse gas emissions, marking a significant setback for U.S. climate change efforts.
cd50cd407b06c1abf9ef1be710735f722af863f9.headline: EPA Revokes Key Climate Change Finding

d41a996c1438b5fa1367333540ad3ef0c13ef253.summary: The Patriots are moving Terrell Williams to a high-ranking role on coach Mike Vrabel's staff in 2026, opening the defensive coordinator position. Zak Kuhr is the leading candidate to fill the role.
d41a996c1438b5fa1367333540ad3ef0c13ef253.headline: Patriots Move Terrell Williams

510fcd43798033e26d96e32ff40bb44677bb8766.summary: The Pittsburgh Steelers have finalized their new coaching staff under head coach Mike McCarthy, following the departure of Mike Tomlin. The staff is larger than under Tomlin, and Robert Kugler has joined McCarthy's ranks.
510fcd43798033e26d96e32ff40bb44677bb8766.headline: Steelers Complete Coaching Staff Under Head Coach Mike McCarthy

5038b3899373e930328f0c126841df2a052e5a30.summary: A shooting on the campus of South Carolina State University on Thursday night resulted in two people killed and one person wounded, according to the school.
5038b3899373e930328f0c126841df2a052e5a30.headline: Shooting at South Carolina State University Leaves Two Dead

1c99f3c0ea1775a6df94af77ffc72499c2f8dde5.summary: The Trump administration is taking steps to narrow the scope of steel and aluminum tariffs, responding to concerns from companies and the European Union. The move comes amid criticism over tariffs on Canada and growing political pressure ahead of the midterm elections.
1c99f3c0ea1775a6df94af77ffc72499c2f8dde5.headline: Trump Administration Moves to Narrow Steel and Aluminum Tariffs

d4bfa71e2f74ff1284a27e61a1ed45fb0575c9df.summary: An 18-year-old suspect fatally shot eight people, including six children and an assistant teacher, at a secondary school and a private residence in Tumbler Ridge, British Columbia, before killing herself. Prime minister Mark Carney is scheduled to meet with mourners as the community grieves one of Canada's deadliest mass shootings.
d4bfa71e2f74ff1284a27e61a1ed45fb0575c9df.headline: Eight Killed in Tumbler Ridge Shooting

f01e14e5967e68750ea1b148c7515c1638127474.summary: The CIA has released a new YouTube video providing instructions on how Chinese military officers can contact the agency securely using the encrypted Tor Browser, as part of efforts to recruit informants.
f01e14e5967e68750ea1b148c7515c1638127474.headline: CIA Releases Video Aimed at Recruiting Chinese Military Informants

2a22902fb49acfccd7c083f20a2277c54b3f5ca9.summary: Ontario will end its freeze on domestic postsecondary tuition fees, allowing schools to increase tuition for the first time since 2019. This decision is part of a broader plan to increase funding for higher education in the province.
2a22902fb49acfccd7c083f20a2277c54b3f5ca9.headline: Ontario to End Tuition Freeze for Postsecondary Schools

3244c328d4f000da4420d8e62e2ba380de3f810f.summary: Taylor Swift has requested that the US government block a bedding company's attempt to trademark 'Swift Home,' arguing the designs resemble her trademarked signature.
3244c328d4f000da4420d8e62e2ba380de3f810f.headline: Taylor Swift Seeks to Block Swift Home Trademark Application

5ff4df6c97508ed1aa1a73b14483fca39161fa3b.summary: York Knights began their first Betfred Super League season with a 19-18 win over Hull KR, the defending champions. A drop goal by Hingano secured the comeback victory in the opening match of the campaign.
5ff4df6c97508ed1aa1a73b14483fca39161fa3b.headline: York Knights Defeat Hull KR 19 18 in Super League Debut

9a028e6cc2f29fb79891374714b2b7bf7e5857a8.summary: During a Senate hearing, Trump immigration officials were shown video footage of Alex Pretti's death. The presentation of the video led to a tense exchange between the officials and senators.
9a028e6cc2f29fb79891374714b2b7bf7e5857a8.headline: Senate Shows Pretti Shooting Video to Trump Immigration Officials
